descrip: **English text below**   **Bezichtigingen ook  online in  te plannen via de  website  van De Makelaars van Amsterdam**   Deze stijlvolle benedenwoning is gelegen aan  de  Asingaborg  9, in een  opvallend groene en rustige wijk vlak aan de overkant van de bruisende Zuidas, aan de rand van Buitenveldert. Uniek aan de woning zijn de twee slaapkamers, de ruime living, de goed uitgeruste keuken en een onderhoudsvriendelijke achtertuin. Kortom, je komt hier helemaal niets te kort! Tevens is de woning ideaal voor starters en jonge gezinnen.  De woning bevindt zich in een rustige Amsterdamse buurt en op fietsafstand van het centrum. Verder wonen hier relatief veel jongere inwoners. Alle benodigde voorzieningen zoals supermarkten, gezellige restaurants, de Zuidas, het Gelderlandplein, winkels en de Vrije Universiteit van Amsterdam liggen op loopafstand. Met het Amsterdamse Bos en het Beatrixpark op fietsafstand kun je ook de natuur altijd opzoeken. Tevens is Schiphol met de auto op 20 minuten afstand gelegen. Daarnaast is de bereikbaarheid uitstekend met het openbare vervoer (NS station Amsterdam Zuid, bus- en tramhaltes) en uitvalswegen (de Ring A1, A2 en A10) in de buurt.   Benedenwoning Het gebouw is via een centrale entree met intercom te betreden van waaruit je toegang hebt tot de woning. Je komt binnen in een hal van goed formaat. De hal leidt naar twee slaapkamers, een badkamer en middels een open toog naar een woonkamer. De woning is recent vernieuwd met een eiken parketvloer.  De riante woonkamer biedt met dank aan de raampartijen veel natuurlijk daglicht inval. Daarnaast is het hier ideaal om gezellig te dineren en loungen. Vanuit de woonkamer kun je een achtertuin betreden. Verder loopt de woonkamer naadloos door in een open keuken.  In de open leefkeuken tref je landelijke, crèmekleurige keukenkasten met  RVS handvatten en een licht keukenblad aan. Tevens ben je hier voorzien van een SMEG fornuis, een afzuigkap, een recent aangeschaft vaatwasser, een magnetron, een spoelbak en een SMEG koelkast. Verder is er een onzichtbare, ingebouwde en recent aangeschaft wasmachine aanwezig in de woning.  De lichte badkamer is goed uitgerust middels een 8 mm glazen douchecabine met chroom scharnieren, schitterende lichtspots, een zwevend Villeroy & Boch toilet en een wastafel in meubel. Daarnaast tref je hier een authentieke zwart/witte Villeroy & Boch tegelvloer aan met witte wandtegels.   Momenteel zijn beide kamers ingedeeld als slaapkamers. De master bedroom is zeer ruim en voorzien van een recent aangeschaft uitgeruste 6 deurs ikea pax kast. Verder is via  deze slaapkamer de woonkamer middels openslaande deuren met glas in lood te betreden. Ook heb je met dank aan de raampartijen genoeg natuurlijk daglicht inval in de slaapkamers. De tweede slaapkamer is uiteraard ook ideaal om bijvoorbeeld als werkkamer, kinderkamer of inloopkast te gebruiken.  Buitenruimte In de achtertuin vind je nette tuintegels, welke in een mooi patroon om het volwassen groen heen liggen, waardoor de tuin onderhoudsvriendelijk is. Je hebt hier uitzicht over een grasveld en een speeltuin. Tevens kun je hier uitstekend loungen en dineren.   Bijzonderheden - Kindvriendelijke buurt - Goed onderhouden benedenwoning - Twee slaapkamers. - Onderhoudsvriendelijke achtertuin - Zeer ruime berging op begane grond - Voorzieningen nabij - Erfpacht afgekocht tot en met 15-03-2053 - Gezond en professioneel beheer VVE - VVE kosten €156.00  **Viewings can also be scheduled online through the website of De Makelaars van Amsterdam**  This stylish ground floor apartment is located at Asingaborg 9, in a remarkably green and quiet neighborhood just across the street from the bustling Zuidas, on the edge of Buitenveldert. Unique to the house are the two bedrooms, the spacious living room, the well-equipped kitchen and a maintenance-friendly backyard. In short, you will not be short of anything here! The house is also ideal for starters and young families.  The house is located in a quiet Amsterdam neighborhood and within cycling distance of the center. In addition, relatively many younger residents live here. All necessary facilities such as supermarkets, cozy restaurants, the Zuidas, Gelderlandplein, shops and the Free University of Amsterdam are within walking distance. With the Amsterdamse Bos and the Beatrixpark within cycling distance, you can also always visit nature. Schiphol Airport is also 20 minutes away by car. In addition, the accessibility is excellent with public transport (Amsterdam Zuid railway station, bus and tram stops) and roads (the A1, A2 and A10 ring road) nearby.  Downstairs apartment The building can be entered through a central entrance with intercom from which you have access to the house. You enter a good sized hall. The hall leads to two bedrooms, a bathroom and through an open bar to a living room. The house has recently been renovated with an oak parquet floor.  Thanks to the windows, the spacious living room offers plenty of natural daylight. In addition, it is ideal here for cozy dining and lounging. From the living room you can enter a backyard. Furthermore, the living room continues seamlessly into an open kitchen.  In the open kitchen you will find rustic, cream-colored kitchen cabinets with stainless steel handles and a light kitchen worktop. You are also equipped with a SMEG stove, an extractor hood, a recently purchased dishwasher, a microwave, a sink and a SMEG refrigerator. There is also an invisible, built-in and recently purchased washing machine in the house.  The bright bathroom is well equipped with an 8 mm glass shower cubicle with chrome hinges, beautiful light spots, a floating Villeroy & Boch toilet and a washbasin in furniture. You will also find an authentic black/white Villeroy & Boch tiled floor with white wall tiles.  Currently, both rooms are classified as bedrooms. The master bedroom is very spacious and equipped with a recently purchased equipped 6-door Ikea Pax wardrobe. Furthermore, through the largest bedroom you can enter the living room through patio doors with stained glass. Thanks to the windows, you also have enough natural daylight in the bedrooms. The second bedroom is of course also ideal for use as an office, children's room or walk-in closet, for example.  Outdoor space In the backyard you will find neat garden tiles, which are arranged in a beautiful pattern around the mature greenery, making the garden easy to maintain. Here you have a view over a lawn and a playground. You can also enjoy excellent lounging and dining here.  Particularities - Child-friendly neighborhood - Well maintained ground floor apartment - Two bedrooms. - Low maintenance backyard - Very spacious storage room on the ground floor - Facilities nearby - Annual lease payments surrendered up to and including 15-03-2053 - Healthy and professional VVE management - VVE costs € 156.00

address: Tweede Jan van der Heijdenstraat 20 III
descrip: Dit appartement, gelegen  op  eigen grond,  ligt op  de derde en vierde  woonlaag  met entree vanaf de tweede  etage  en past als een warme jas  in de  winter. Het appartement heeft de ideale mix van luxe, comfort en leven op een bruisende plek in Amsterdam. Het dubbele bovenhuis is ca 128 m² en in 2020 grotendeels gerenoveerd.   Een rondleiding  Derde verdieping  De dubbele stoere stalen deuren scheiden het trappenhuis en hal met toilet, een statement naar de living. De living is over de gehele derde verdieping met aan de voorzijde het zitgedeelte met sfeervolle gashaard. Aan de zijkant is er een op maat gemaakte kastenwand geplaatst met een bureau. Een perfecte werkplek.  De luxe keuken, ook met gashaard, is een ware eyecatcher waar gebruik gemaakt is van warme en stoere materialen. De keuken is uiteraard voorzien van moderne inbouwapparatuur zoals 6-pitsfornuis met oven, combimagnetron, vaatwasser, koel/vriescombinatie en quooker. Het eetgedeelte is aan de achterzijde, naast de openslaande deuren naar het zonnige terras met automatische zonwering. Het terras van ca 8 m² is gelegen op het zuiden.  Vierde verdieping De royale overloop met lichtinval vanaf het dak geeft deze verdieping een ruimtelijk gevoel.   De master slaapkamer is aan de voorzijde met een op maat gemaakt walk-in gedeelte.  Aan de achterzijde zijn twee goede slaapkamers, waarvan één wederom met prachtige maatwerkkasten. De luxe en eigentijdse badkamer is ruim opgezet met een vrijstaand ligbad, inloopdouche en maatwerk wastafel meubel.   De buitenruimte Aan de achterzijde, grenzend aan het eetgedeelte is het ruime terras. Het terras van circa 8 m² ligt op het zuiden en is een waar verlengstuk van de living. De openslaande deuren staan bij een klein beetje zon al open en maakt dit terras tot een zeer kwalitatieve buitenruimte. De automatische zonnewering, geplaatst in 2021, zorgt voor schaduw.  Het gebouw  De bebouwing rond het park dateert, een enkele uitzondering daargelaten, uit de jaren rond 1890 en bestaat uit etagewoningen die rijker gedecoreerd zijn dan de woningen in de rest van De Pijp. De gevel heeft kenmerken van de neorenaissance stijl zoals de hardstenen- en de witte banden. Het schilderwerk aan de achterzijde is in 2020 uitgevoerd evenals het reinigen van de gevel. Het trappenhuis is in 2020 voorzien van nieuwe vloerbekleding. Tevens is er in 2021 een automatische zonwering op het terras geplaatst alsmede een video intercomsysteem op beide verdiepingen.  De bijzonderheden   •	Gebruiksoppervlakte wonen ca. 128 m² •	In 2020 goed en luxe (grotendeels) intern gerenoveerd •	Ruim terras op het zuiden aan living •	Gelegen op eigen grond •	Servicekosten VvE € 207,80  per maand •      Energielabel C  Meer ontdekken? Ervaar de volledige woonbeleving op onze Broersma website of download onze brochure.  Deze informatie is door ons met de nodige zorgvuldigheid samengesteld. Onzerzijds wordt echter geen enkele aansprakelijkheid aanvaard voor enige onvolledigheid, onjuistheid of anderszins, dan wel de gevolgen daarvan. Alle opgegeven maten en oppervlakten zijn slechts indicatief De Meetinstructie is gebaseerd op de NEN2580. De Meetinstructie is bedoeld om een meer eenduidige manier van meten toe te passen voor het geven van een indicatie van de gebruiksoppervlakte. De Meetinstructie sluit verschillen in meetuitkomsten niet volledig uit, door bijvoorbeeld interpretatieverschillen, afrondingen of beperkingen bij het uitvoeren van de meting

A townhouse that  has  many furnishing  and layout  options  Bright and  extra  wide 5-room apartment with two  floors  of a total of 174 m²  with a large roof terrace.  Perfect to inhabit as a spacious family home with plenty of space for growing children. It is also the ideal home to keep a combined home office and/or to rent out partly.  Due to the architectural design, there are good possibilities to arrange the floor plan entirely according to your living wishes.   The fourth floor can be used as an independent home office, as a cozy floor for growing children, but can also be occupied separately. If desired, separate access to this floor is possible.  This layout concept makes the house extra special, in addition to the presence of no less than two kitchens, two bathrooms, and an all-around free-looking roof terrace.   There is a possibility of making an open kitchen at the front or the rear of the house. An extra bedroom can be created on both the second and fourth floors.  This beautiful house is situated on a beautiful, wide street in Amsterdam South with ample parking with almost always space to practically put the cars in front of the door.  Ideal location The Courbetstraat is situated at an excellent location in Amsterdam South, nearby the main highways, the chic Beethovenstraat, the Minvervaplein, and the Zuidas where station Zuid/WTC is based, from which many trains, busses, and trams depart. The entire Zuidas is easily reachable by either foot or bicycle. The Gelderlandplein offers a variety of high-quality shops with shops such as l’Amuse, Le Fournil, and the Marqt as well as excellent restaurants such as l’Arena, Neni, and Wils within walking distance.  There are multiple possibilities when it comes to culture, for example, the Concertgebouw, the Rijksmuseum, and the Van Gogh museum. Enjoying nature is possible at the nearby Beatrix Park.  The best schools in Amsterdam, including various elementary schools, high schools, the British School, and the International AICS-school can be found nearby.  A prime location to live safely and comfortably in Amsterdam.  Layout 2nd floor (115,4 m²): Spacious lobby; toilet; cozy room en suite with wide balcony (6,6 m²) to the inner area; large room; well-equipped kitchen; bedroom with access to bathroom with walk-in shower and bathroom cabinet with extra wide sink.  4th floor (56.6 m²): Accessible from the 2nd floor via an internal staircase with skylight; corridor/hallway; separate toilet; kitchen; storage room with the central heating boiler; bathroom with shower, sink, and washing machine connection; two spacious bedrooms with closets, both currently used as office space; access to large roof terrace.  The roof terrace (32.6 m²): Perfect place to enjoy the sun or to BBQ with friends. 360 degrees view and built with permission of the VvE and municipality. Access to the roof terrace with a fixed staircase is structurally easy to achieve.  Due to the surrendered leasehold, individual heating installation, energy label C and modest service costs due to good maintenance condition, the additional costs are small for comparable homes.  Info about the owners association (VvE): - Small association with 8 quiet members and a good atmosphere - Management is done by the VvE itself - Service costs are € 97,50 per month - MJOP (multi-year maintenance plan) drawn up, there is a large accumulated reserve  Architectural information: - High ceiling on 2nd floor - Beautiful wooden floorboards on 2nd floor - Kitchens on 2nd floor and 4th floor and the bathroom on 2nd floor are renewed in 2008 - In 2019 the back side of the apartment was painted and double glazing installed  - 2nd floor is heated via a central heating boiler from 2017, on the 4th floor is the central heating boiler from 2011 - Fully double glazed - Energy label C - Measurement certificate available  Details: - Leasehold is bought off until 2063 - Deed of conversion to perpetual leasehold with annual canon is already signed - AB 2016 applicable - Complex is a national monument by architect Dick Greiner - Located in a Protected Cityscape - No waiting list for a parking permit, two permits are possible - Delivery in consultation with owners  This information has been compiled by us with the necessary care. However, we accept no liability for any incompleteness, inaccuracy, or otherwise, or consequences. All dimensions and surface areas stated are indicative. Buyer has his duty to investigate all matters of interest to him or her. In this property, the broker is an advisor to the seller. We advise you to use an expert (NVM) broker who will guide you through the purchase process. If you have specific wishes regarding the house, we advise you to make these known to your purchaser and to carry out (or have carried out) research into this independently. If you do not engage the services of an expert representative, you are legally considered to be expert enough to be able to oversee all relevant matters. The NVM conditions apply.

Licht en ruim  vierkamer  maisonnette van  circa 68  m² woonoppervlakte met balkon  en  een ruime tuin met uitzicht  op  het Gebrandypark!  Dit leuke appartement  is  gelegen in een rustige  en groene buurt in Amsterdam Nieuw West met vele voorzieningen in de directe omgeving. Zo is er een groot diversiteit aan winkels met o.a. winkelcentra Plein ’40 – ’45 en het Bos en Lommerplein in de buurt. Er zijn uitstekende openbaar vervoer voorzieningen zo bent u met de bus, tram of met de trein vanuit station Sloterdijk zo op plaats van bestemming. De uitvalswegen zijn snel bereikbaar vanaf de Ring A-10 kun je alle kanten op zoals richting het ’t Gooi, Haarlem en Schiphol. Voor recreatie kan men terecht aan de nabij gelegen Sloterplas en het Rembrandtpark. Zelfs het centrum van Amsterdam is vanuit hier goed te bereiken.  Indeling:  Beletage: Entree op de eerste etage. Hal, kast met opstelling voor de CV-ketel, separaat toilet, halfopen keuken met keukenblok en wasmachineaansluiting. Vanuit de keuken heeft u toegang tot het balkon, welke gelegen is op het westen. Vanuit de hal is er toegang tot de eerste slaapkamer en lichte woonkamer van circa 17 m². De woonkamer beschikt over veel ramen en daardoor is er veel lichtinval. In zowel de woonkamer en slaapkamer bevindt zich een ruime bergkast. Vanuit de hal kunt u met de interne trap naar de beneden verdieping.   Begane grond: Overloop met toegang tot alle ruimtes. Badkamer met douche en wastafel. Aan de achterzijde bevinden zich 2 slaapkamers waarvan de grootste slaapkamer toegang geeft tot de ruime tuin (ca. 35 m²), welke ook gelegen is op het westen.   Eigen berging op de begane grond.  Bijzonderheden: - Woonoppervlakte 68,4 m² (conform NEN2580);  - Bouwjaar 1953;  - Balkon op het westen;  - Ruime achtertuin van circa 35 m² op het westen; - Servicekosten bedragen circa € 183,-- per maand (bijdrage juni 2022);  - Actieve VvE, beheerd door VvE Beheer Amsterdam; - Erfpacht is vooruitbetaald tot en met 31-10-2054;  - Intergas HRE C.V.-ketel (2014);  - In verband met groot onderhoud aan de achtergevel wordt er in het voorjaar van 2023    een eenmalige bijdrage in rekening gebracht van € 5.699,13; - Verkoop is alleen bedoeld voor eigen hoofdbewoning door kopers of eigen kind vanaf 18 jaar.    De eigenaar/eigen kind vanaf 18 jaar, dient zich in te schrijven op het adres als hoofdbewoner.    In de akten wordt een verkoop- en verhuur belemmerende bepaling opgenomen; - Projectnotaris Hartman LMH te Amsterdam; - Oplevering per direct.

*** this property  is  listed by  a MVA  Certified Broker ***  Living  on the beautiful Egelantiersgracht in  the  middle of the Jordaan! This apartment  has  a  total living  area of 115m2 divided over the 2 top floors, so no upstairs neighbours. Both floors are characterised by high ceilings of 2.60m. Also, the property is located on private land and has a large private storage as well as a communal bicycle storage in the basement.  LAYOUT Via the stairwell, you reach the apartment on the 2nd floor. Upon entering the kitchen diner, you immediately notice the loggia. This brings in a lot of daylight and offers a beautiful view over the courtyard gardens. The living room is located at the front and has a unique view over the Egelantiergracht where you can also see the Westertoren in winter. The 2 large windows, with the glass surface running from the ceiling to the floor, have a turn / tilt position on both sides.  There is a separate toilet on this floor.  Via the fixed staircase, you reach the top floor. There is a spacious hallway that could ideally be used to place storage cupboards. There are two spacious bedrooms, one at the front and one at the back of the house. The bathroom is equipped with a toilet, walk-in shower, sink and the washing machine connection is also located here.  There is another loft ladder to the one-storey attic. As a result, there is always enough storage space. The height of the attic is 1.21 m. In the basement there is a private storage room and communal bicycle storage available.  The entire house is characterised by high ceilings of 2.60 m.  DETAILS - Located on own ground - Second and third floor (also the last ones) - Separate storage room and communal bicycle storage - Homeowners' association contribution is € 140,- per month - 2 very spacious bedrooms - One-storey attic, height 1.21 m. - High ceilings of 2.60 m  LOCATION AND ACCESSIBILITY Egelantiersgracht is a beautiful quiet canal in the bustling Jordaan neighbourhood. Within walking distance you will find numerous nice shops and cosy terraces, restaurants and cafés as well as a wide choice of shops for daily groceries. In addition, on Mondays and Saturdays there are lively markets on the Westerstraat, Noordermarkt and Lindengracht. Sights such as the Anne Frank house and the Westertoren are also within walking distance. Within a few minutes' cycling you can reach the Westerpark.  The apartment has an excellent location in relation to public transport, both bus and tram. Central Station is less than a 10-minute bike ride away. The apartment is also easily accessible by car via the A10 ring road. The spacious car park ''Singelgrachtgarage'' on Marnixskade is likely to be completed in 2024.

Fantastic apartment with  a  breathtaking view  over the  IJ and the Pontsteiger!  This  fine house (84m² according to  BBMI  standard) has two spacious bedrooms with  access to  a loggia and a spacious living room with a custom-made open kitchen. From all rooms you have a beautiful view over the water through the large windows, a view that never gets boring! The Silodam is an iconic building, designed by architectural firm MVDRV. The building has a communal roof terrace, jetty, sports room and music room that residents can use. The house also has its own private storage room in the basement. As soon as you enter the Silodam, the hustle and bustle of the city falls away. Does this sound like the home for you? Please contact us quickly for a viewing!  Layout  First floor Through the well-maintained communal hall you reach the front door of the house. The front door takes you first into the hall, which provides access to all rooms on this floor and also the stairs down. The two bedrooms are at the front and are both of very good size. Both rooms have access to a loggia, from where you have a beautiful view over the water. In the current layout, a wall has been placed here, but this can of course be easily adapted so that the loggia is once again a whole. Both bedrooms have enough space for a double bed, wardrobe and home office. The bathroom has a shower cabin and sink. The toilet is separate and can also be entered from the hall.  Ground floor Through the stairs you reach the spacious living room. When you enter the room, you immediately notice the beautiful view and the light. Here you look out over the water and the Oude Houthavens through the 4 large windows from floor to ceiling. This space is very light and you have the sun here almost all day long. The two middle windows can be opened completely, so that you can enjoy the sun from the house and thus really bring the outside feeling inside. The living room has enough space for a cozy sitting and dining area.  The custom-made open kitchen has various built-in appliances, including an oven, fridge/freezer, dishwasher (all Bosch), ceramic hob and extractor hood. The kitchen has a lot of storage space and a lot of work space due to the large counter top. You will also find a handy built-in cupboard under the stairs, ideal for use as a pantry. There is room for the washing machine and dryer in a handy storage room.  In the basement you will find a private storage room of approximately 3m². The residents of the Silodam are allowed to use the Silogym and the music room. On the seventh floor is a large communal terrace, the Kraaiennest, where you have a beautiful view over the IJ and the Pontsteiger. The jetty may also be used by residents, and you can also go here in the summer for a refreshing swim.  Owners Association The Home Owners Association consists of 159 apartment rights and is healthy and active. Meetings are held annually, there is a multi-year maintenance plan, reserve fund and home insurance. The monthly service costs are € 157.  Environment and Accessibility The Silodam is located on the edge of the Houthavens, near Bickerseiland adjacent to the IJ. Historical and modern buildings come together beautifully in this environment. The Westelijke Eilanden and the Haarlemmerbuurt are also increasingly emerging as popular neighborhoods with shops and restaurants. For a good dinner or night out you can go to BAK, Meneer Nieges or the Gouden Reael. You can reach the NDSM site in Amsterdam Noord in no time by taking the ferry. The Westerpark is the perfect place for a nice walk or a summer barbecue. The Jordaan is a few minutes' walk away. You can find the real Jordanian cosiness in the Westerstraat and the Noordermarkt is of course a must on Saturdays. From the city beach 'het Stenen Hoofd', next door, you can take a dip in the IJ, a popular place for many Amsterdammers. And finally, you are front row at the Sail spectacle. The tenth edition of Sail will start in August 2025!  The accessibility is excellent; you can reach the A10 ring road within a few minutes by car. There is also an underground parking garage under Silodam. There are regular parking spaces for sale (from €21,000) or for rent. The connection with public transport is also good, Amsterdam Central can be reached by bus, on foot or in a few minutes by bike. From there you have a fast connection to Schiphol and the Zuidas.  Ground lease The house is located on Municipal Leasehold Land. The ground rent has been surrendered until November 30, 2049. The application to switch perpetual leasehold has been made under the favorable conditions of 2019.  Particularities - 84m² (according to BBMI standard); - From the house phenomenal view over the water and on the Pontsteiger; - Building designed by MVDRV; - A+ energy label;  - 2 spacious bedrooms with access to loggia; - Very bright house due to large windows; - Common roof terrace; - Residents may use the Silogym, music room and the jetty; - Private storage room in the basement; - VVE service costs are €157; - Active VVE, multi-year maintenance plan available; - Non-occupancy clause will be included in the deed of sale; - Delivery in consultation; - There is only an agreement when the purchase deed has been signed; - Deed of sale is drawn up by a notary in Amsterdam.  "This information has been compiled by us with the necessary care. However, we do not accept any liability for any incompleteness, inaccuracy or otherwise, or the consequences thereof. All specified sizes and surfaces are indicative. The NVM conditions apply."

This 4-bedroom house  with  a playful  layout and  a semi-circular facade (bay  window)  is sublimely located in the  popular  quiet and child-friendly neighborhood "Vogeltjeswei", one  of the  nicest parts of Amsterdam Southeast. On one side the peace and nature of the recently beautifully renovated Nelson Mandela Park and on the other side the busier bustling Amsterdamse Poort. At the Amsterdamse Poort you will find the market on Mondays, a diversity of shops, eateries and large and small retail chains for daily shopping. Enough choices for primary and secondary schools, all of which are within cycling distance. Entertainment with many fun events is also within easy reach, such as: De Afas Live, the Johan Cruijff Arena, Pathe Arena and Ziggo. The house is conveniently located for public transport and the roads, the metro and bus, but also the highways A1, A2, A9 and A10. With metro line 54, Amsterdam CS can be reached within fifteen minutes. You can reach the A1, A2, A9 and A10 in a few minutes by car.  Layout:  You can enter the house from the well-kept and sunny front garden. The entrance gives access to the toilet with washbasin, the meter cupboard and the living room. The living room with bay window is wonderfully light because of the high windows. The bay window has French doors so that the front garden, which faces South, is also easily accessible. Furthermore, the living room has a spacious storage closet underneath the stairs, a modern, maintenance-friendly tiled floor with underfloor heating and there is air conditioning. The spacious living room offers space for a large lounge corner at the front and a spacious dining table.  The modern, open kitchen is located at the garden side and has a kitchen unit with a semi-cooking island, a granite worktop, storage space in drawers and cupboards, an induction hob, an extractor hood and a dishwasher. On the other side of the kitchen, tall cupboards have been placed with plenty of storage space, a combination microwave, a separate oven at eye level and a fridge freezer. Just like the living room, the kitchen has high windows.  The backyard is accessible from the kitchen. The backyard faces North, is easy to maintain and tiled with colorful cobblestones. Between the barn and the house there is a sheltered terrace where you can relax. In the back of the garden there is a wooden shed and a back entrance. Behind the house there is a closed courtyard that is only accessible for residents and offers a nice, safe playground for children.  From the back room there is an intermediate hall with stairs to the 1st floor. The 1st floor is divided with a spacious landing that provides access to two bedrooms, a separate toilet, an indoor storage room and the bathroom. All rooms are spacious.  Just like the living room, the bedroom at the front has an attractive round bay window. The washing machine connection is available in the storage room.  The newly renovated, luxuriously finished modern bathroom (2022) is fully tiled with a modern color tile and flagstones. You will also find a wonderful walk-in shower with a rain shower and glass splashback, a black design radiator, a washbasin furniture in wood color with beautiful robust washbasins on it. The mirrors with LED lighting are heated.  The separate toilet with fountain is located next to the bathroom.   From the landing you can reach the 2nd floor via a fixed staircase. The 2nd floor really completes the house with 2 more spacious bedrooms and a wonderfully large roof terrace on the South. From the roof terrace there is a beautiful view of the surroundings. The roof terrace is accessible from the landing.  Details: Living area is 118 m² Roof terrace is 20 m² Storage room is 6 m² Contents house: 390 m³ Delivery in consultation. Built in 1999. A parking permit is required for parking. The costs for the parking permit are € 34,88 per 6 months. The house has 6 groups, 1 cooking group and 1 earth leakage circuit breaker. As a real  estate  agent, we  see a  lot of homes passing  by  every day, but sometimes our  heart  beats a bit faster from a  home.  This  cool apartment,  located in a prime location in Buiksloterham, is one of them! The location is hip and in full development, which in itself is worth quite a bit of enthusiasm, but this house offers so much more.  This spacious apartment with high ceilings has been laid out entirely according to your own wishes and furnished with sustainable and high-quality materials. Here there is a cool, chic atmosphere where you can live. Here you have a spacious and bright living room, luxury kitchen, office space, 3 bedrooms, a bathroom and various closets.  Wondering if you and this home are a match? Make an appointment quickly with one of our brokers, they will be happy to show you the inside of the house!  living Because the current residents have been allowed to arrange everything according to their own wishes, a unique whole has been created. A sturdy, modern, industrial but also homely style has been chosen. The concrete beams on the ceiling, the steel doors and the neutral tones on the walls form the modern framework of the interior, while the rustic oak wooden floor provides a warm effect. The living room is wonderfully light thanks to the large windows with French balconies and the two sliding doors to the balcony.  Through the beautiful steel sliding doors you have access to a room that is currently used as an office / study. Of course you can furnish and use this space entirely according to your own wishes. To cook Autumn and winter symbolize long, cold, dark evenings. And what better way to spend it than with friends and family? Nice long dinner together. Enjoy delicious food, fine wines, good conversations and a phenomenal view of the illuminated city. The kitchen is the right place for this!  The custom-made kitchen (made by JORO Maatwerk Interieur) forms the beating heart of the house with natural materials: an oak bar on the one hand where visitors like to sit, a hard white composite worktop on the other, topped with sturdy steel handles. There is an induction hob with extractor, 1 microwave/oven combination and a steam oven/oven combination, dishwasher and large fridge. There is sufficient space under the sink and an empty pipe has been laid for a possible Qooker.  outdoor living With two lovely balconies, the absorption of vitamin D will be fine. From the living room and from the bedrooms you have access to a balcony. These are of a spacious size and offer a great panoramic view that you can enjoy every day.  Place a nice garden set on the balconies, sit back and enjoy!  To sleep The bedroom is a room where you spend on average a third of your day, so it's not unimportant what it looks like! The patio doors to the balcony and the large window in all 3 bedrooms provide a pleasant incidence of daylight. There is a custom-made walk-in closet in the master bedroom.  to bathe Gone are the days when the bathroom was a purely functional space. The bathroom should be a place to start your day in a pleasant way or to end it relaxed. Making the most of every centimeter while creating a pleasant atmosphere; it certainly succeeded in this bathroom!  The bathroom has a walk-in shower, a custom-made washbasin and a wonderful bath in which you can end the day in a relaxed manner. Both the toilet and the extra spacious bathroom have a stylish appearance with matching tile motif.  Particularities:  - sustainable and future-proof; - sufficient storage space in the house; - own parking space available; - real steel doors (welding company Blokker); - black stone floor in kitchen, toilet and laundry room; - custom washbasin furniture (JORO); - custom-made walk-in closet (JORO); - all windows fitted with custom-made Duettes; - HRV installation of Zehnder & heat pump; - underfloor heating and cooling throughout the apartment; - the building is equipped with solar panels; - long lease € 2,682 per year. 25 years fixed. Permanently fixed after 50 years at € 402.37 (arranged by a civil-law notary); - parking lot bought off for 50 years, then 23 euros annual canon.  Location We can hardly imagine it, but if the apartment has not convinced you yet, the location will certainly convince you. This is located in a prime location in Buiksloterham, close to the NDSM wharf and the van der Pek market. For daily shopping you can go to the NDSM wharf and the Mosplein, which is located around the corner. You are on the Ring A10 and out of the city in no time, and by bike you are at the ferry in 7 minutes, so in no time in the center.  The house has a definitive energy label, namely A++. This expires on 21-10-2032.

Van der Hoopstraat  126-3,  1051 VN  Amsterdam  We are offering this  apartment  of approx. 43 m² in  the  vibrant Westerpark district, in a beautiful  spot. This  freehold apartment enjoys both the peace & quiet of this neighbourhood as well as the dynamic city centre of Amsterdam.  Location and accessibility: The apartment is located in Amsterdam West and is close to the much loved Westerpark. The Westerpark offers culture, sports and recreation. A petting zoo, a paddling pool and the Woeste Westen playground which offers a natural environment for children to play - one of the many amenities of the Westerpark. The home is very centrally located: the centre of Amsterdam is literally within one's doorstep. This neighbourhood offers many shops, restaurants and cafés. Charming streets and open-air markets such as the Westerstraat, Noordermarkt, Lindengracht and the Haarlemmerstraat are also to be found in the immediate vicinity. The bustling Jordaan district is also just a stone's throw from the apartment. In short: this neighbourhood is a very much sought-after location.  Even the accessibility is excellent with various bus and tram stops (e.g. tram line 3 and 5, bus line 18 and 21) all close by. This is also a favourable location to reach by car: via exit S-103 the ring road A10, is easily accessible, as are the A7, A4 A2. Parking places are easy to find in the immediate surroundings of the apartment and/or you can apply for a parking permit.  Layout: Third floor: Entrance hall. The bathroom is fitted with a walk-in shower and a toilet. The kitchen is situated at the rear of the apartment and is fitted with a 4-burner gas hob, dishwasher, microwave and oven combination, and fridge/freezer combination. Here, you also find the central heating system. The kitchen accesses the balcony. The bedroom is located at the rear and has a washbasin. Through the French windows you reach the balcony. The hall offers access to the spacious and bright living room. At the front there is a lovely Juliette balcony. The entire apartment is fitted with a beautiful wooden floor.  Van der Hoopstraat: Joan Cornelis van der Hoop (1742-1825) - after the revolution of 1813, Van der Hoop became the chairman of the temporary administration of Amsterdam. In 1814, he held the position of 'Minister of the Navy', nowadays known as the Minister of Defence. (Source: Stadsatlas).  Details: - Apartment right of approx. 43m² (NEN-2580 measurements report available) - Freehold building - Lovely and bright apartment - Small, dormant owners' association - Monthly service charge: €121.48 - Energy label D - Non-self-occupancy clause applies  - Civil-law notary: Seinstra van Rooij notarissen - Parking via the Amsterdam permit system (Source: Parking and Traffic, the city of Amsterdam) - Transfer in consultation. Modern finished 4  room  apartment (ca98m2)  located on  the top (10th) floor  of  the recently (2015) renovated apartment  complex  Kleiburg. This house has a nice surprise!! Namely  the option  to have a spacious roof terrace built!!  Modern kitchen, spacious and luxurious bathroom, HR ++ glazing, smooth plastered walls and ceiling, district heating, bought off leasehold canon up to and including 2054, separate large storage room, free parking and last but not least ... the metro station is a 3-minute walk away and with 15 minutes you are in the center of Amsterdam.  The accessibility is excellent, both by public transport and by car. Metro station Kraaiennest is right outside the door and the roads (A1, A2, A9 and ring A10) can be reached quickly. In the immediate vicinity are: schools, shops, sports facilities. There is plenty of opportunity for sports in front of the door. There is, among other things, an athletics track, a tennis court, a basketball court and a football field, which can be used free of charge. The Diemerbos and the Gaasperplas are nearby for a wonderful walk in nature. For daily shopping you can go to the Kameleon Shopping Center. In the area you will find various entertainment venues such as: the AFAS Live, Pathé Arena, Ziggo Dome and the Johan Cruijff ArenA, where many concerts are given.  First floor 10th floor: House entrance, spacious modern kitchen with various built-in appliances, living room with access to the balcony with beautiful panoramic views. The entire house is neatly finished with smooth plastered walls and ceilings. The floor has a sturdy parquet with a 3mm oak top layer. There are 3 well-sized bedrooms, 2 with access to the balcony and 1 with sturdy black steel frames with glass. The comfortable bathroom is very spacious and equipped with a walk-in shower, bath, thermostatic taps, towel radiator and a double washbasin. The toilet room is separate and the district heating unit is concealed in a cupboard behind the toilet. In addition, there is also a separate functional laundry room.  Salvage: The house has a very large storage room (approx. 9m²) on the same floor. At the bottom of the complex is a (closed) general bicycle shed.  Balcony There is a spacious balcony that runs the entire width of the house with a wide view. What makes this house extra interesting is the possibility to have a very spacious roof terrace built. A staircase can be made in the house to the roof, where you can then build a terrace over the entire living area.  Features - Completely renovated complex with HR ++ glass (2015) - Spacious external storage space (approx.9m2) - Access to a general bicycle shed - Hot water and heating through district heating - The service costs are: € 129.96 p/m excluding heating costs: € 262 p/m - The leasehold canon has been bought off up to and including 31-12-2054 (general determination 2000) The application for the perpetual leasehold surrender has been made!! - Energy label C - Surprise!!!: option to build a roof terrace on the flat roof with access from the house.

Nu in de  verkoop  deze sfeervolle  3-kamer eengezinswoning  in het geliefde ‘Blueband  dorp’.  De bekende ‘zaagtandwoningen’ zijn gebouwd  door  architect Frans van Gool, en hebben  inmiddels in  Amsterdam een monumentale status. De hofjes ademen een dorpse sfeer met ruimte voor tuintjes en plantsoenen.  De omgeving Het Sierplein ligt om de hoek met niet alleen twee grote supermarkten, maar ook goede buurtwinkels met groenten en fruit, een drogisterij, slager, bakker, dus van alle gemakken voorzien.  De tramlijnen 1 en 2 hebben hun haltes op loopafstand, en ook de trein stopt op station Lelylaan. Met de auto ben je in 2 minuten op de ringweg A 10. Het Vondelpark ligt op 10 minuten fietsen, evenals de Sloterplas of de Nieuwe Meer, dus ook in de vrije tijd kan je alle kanten op.  De woning De huidige bewoners hebben de woning onder architectuur laten verbouwen tot een huis dat beantwoordt aan de wensen van deze tijd. De benedenverdieping is voorzien van een gietvloer met vloerverwarming.  De uitgebreide keuken loopt over in de ruime lichte woonkamer die uitkijkt op de tuin. Een handige garderobekast zorgt voor een speelse scheiding tussen keuken en woonkamer. De moderne keuken heeft extreem veel kastruimte, en alle benodigde inbouwapparatuur: 5-pits gasstel, afzuigkap, vaatwasser, oven, koelkast met 2 vrieslades  Op de eerste verdieping: - 2 Ruime slaapkamers - Toilet met wastafel - Moderne badkamer met doucheruimte, wastafel en ligbad, en gebouwde lichtkoepel  - Washok voor wasmachine en c.v. Installatie - Vaste kast in de slaapkamer aan de voorzijde  - Vaste kast op de overloop  Bijzonderheden: - Voortdurend recht van erfpacht, afgekocht tot 01-09-2060 - Aanvraag voor overstap naar eeuwigdurende erfpacht is gedaan - Woonruimte 77 m2 - Dubbelglas - Nieuw dak i.v.m. verduurzaming van Blueband dorp - Vloerverwarming - Tuin van 9 meter op het zuidwesten - Monumentale status - Onder architectuur verbouwd - Kindvriendelijke buurt en gelegen aan rustig plantsoen - Oplevering in overleg  Notaris: De koper heeft de keuze voor een Amsterdamse notaris welke een koopakte zal opstellen conform Amsterdams Model.

EEN PARELTJE! KARAKTERISTIEKE  3-KAMER  BENEDENWONING MET  TUIN OP  POPULAIRE LOCATIE. UITBOUWEN MOGELIJK  &  GELEGEN OP EIGEN GROND. Plug & Play! - Vergunning beschikbaar voor uitbouw - EIGEN GROND - Fundering vernieuwd 2006 - Nieuwe CV uit 2023 - Actieve en gezonde VvE - Servicebijdrage € 82,- per maand - Energiekosten € 78,- per maand  - Ouderdomsclausule van toepassing - Oplevering in overleg  Op een geweldige locatie in de populaire Indische buurt, bevindt zich een goed onderhouden benedenwoning met 2 slaapkamers en tuin. Deze zeer functionele woning bestaat uit de woonkamer aan de voorkant, een open keuken met inbouwapparatuur, waaronder een combimagnetron, een vaatwasser en koel-vriescombinatie, gevolgd door een halletje dat toegang geeft aan de badkamer, de twee slaapkamers en een wasmachinekast. In de woonkamer bevindt zich een opbergkast voor handige extra opbergruimte. De achtertuin is ca. 48m2 groot voor de lekkere zomerse middagen. Voor het appartement ligt een zeer karakteristieke en rustige straat. Door de hele woning ligt een laminaatvloer. De woning verkeert in een goed onderhouden staat, maar er zou vanwege de grote potentie eventueel nu of op termijn een modernisering gewenst kunnen zijn. Makelaar J-oost heeft een projectteam samengesteld dat u daarbij zou kunnen helpen, inclusief het realiseren van de reeds extra vergunde vierkante meters aan de achterkant van het appartement.   Omgeving: Het appartement is gelegen in het charmante stukje van de Indische buurt, dat alles wat u nodig op loopafstand heeft. Dat maakt het een erg aantrekkelijke buurt om in te wonen!!  Gezelligheid is om de hoek te vinden bij Studio K (bioscoop, café & eetgelegenheid), op de Javastraat of op het Javaplein. Maar ook op 5-10 minuten loopafstand richting het centrum bij de Plantagebuurt of onderweg Brouwerij 't IJ, maar zeker ook naast het Oosterpark Louie Louie of bijvoorbeeld de Biertuin. Kortom, heel veel keus. Voor de dagelijkse boodschappen kunt u terecht op de Dappermarkt of vlakbij, de Albert Heijn. Maar natuurlijk ook de zeer bekende Javastraat, die echt alles te bieden heeft en waar mensen uit de omtrek naartoe komen. Ook is het mooie van de Indische buurt dat het tussen twee prachtige parken in ligt. De woning ligt op 10 minuten loopafstand van zowel het Flevopark als het Oosterpark.  Ten slot een zeer goede bereikbaarheid: Openbaar vervoer is op loopafstand te vinden, tram en bus. Station Muiderpoort is naast de deur en Centraal station is eenvoudig te bereiken met bus 22. Daarnaast is de RING A10 is ook zeer makkelijk bereikbaar.  Technisch: Verwarming en warm water d.m.v. een nieuwe HR cv-ketel (2023). De meterkast is voorzien van 7 groepen met 2 hoofdschakelaars. De woning is voorzien van een mechanische en natuurlijke ventilatie.  Vereniging van Eigenaren: Er is sprake van een actieve vereniging van eigenaren. De servicebijdrage is € 82,- per maand. In de servicebijdragen zijn o.a. opgenomen de opstalverzekering, administratiekosten, elektra trappenhuis, onderhoudskosten en reservering groot onderhoud. De VVE heeft een meerjarenonderhoudsplan opgesteld.  Eigendomssituatie: Eigen grond  Onderhoud: De woning verkeert van buiten in goede staat van onderhoud en van binnen goed onderhouden en kan desgewenst zo worden betrokken. Het appartement is niet recent gerenoveerd, wat als een kans gezien kan worden om er een gloednieuwe woning van te maken.  De grote potentie voor nu of in de toekomst: De grote bonus! In de fotoserie zijn impressies verschaft van één uitbreidingsmogelijkheid van de woning. Momenteel is het mogelijk om tot 4 meter vergunningsvrij uit te bouwen. Dit breidt de woning uit naar +/-71m2. Daarnaast ligt er reeds een gemeentelijke vergunning om de woning met 6 meter uit te breiden en een souterrain te maken voor twee slaapkamers. Dit zal de woning nóg groter maken dan 71m2. Mocht een gedeeltelijke of algehele modernisatie wenselijk zijn, dan kan Makelaar J-oost dit Plug & Play beschikbaar stellen via een projectteam. Dit team bestaat uit een Single point of contact / Project Manager, Design & Styling specialist, Uitbouwspecialist en een aannemer gespecialiseerd binnenshuis. Uiteraard naar wens samen te stellen.   Kortom, wij bieden een zeer fijne woning, goede investering en professionele assistentie bij het maken van uw droomhuis.   *********************************English translation******************************************  WONDERFUL HOUSE! Lovely garden of approx 48m2, 2 bedrooms, private land and 52m2 of living space, expandable to +/- 71m2 or even +/- 97m2!! Project team available.
