Living on the  most  beautiful canal  of Amsterdam!  A perfectly arranged two-room  apartment  with a magnificent view over  the  Brouwersgracht. The apartment is located on  the  third  floor of a  monumental warehouse with elevator!  Layout: You enter the property into a beautiful hallway, here you can take the stairs or elevator to the third floor. The entrance of the house is reached via the balcony at the inner court. You enter the apartment in a hall with the separate toilet and the meter cupboard and access to the living room. The first thing you notice is the cool appearance of the apartment. The large beams breathe history! The living room is located on the canal side of the house. Three large windows offer a beautiful view over the water. The kitchen is half open and is equipped with built-in appliances.  The bedroom is at the rear of the apartment. This also has access to the balcony. The bathroom is ensuite to the bedroom and has a bath and a sink. Here is also the connection for the washing machine.  Finally, there is a communal bicycle parking in the basement of the complex and this apartment has its own storage room there.  Specs: - apartment in monumental warehouses “Liefde", "Oude Schaap" en Eendracht” - originally built in the middle of the seventeenth century - totally renovated in 1980, converted to apartments - building with elevator - apartment on the third floor - living area 65 m2 (in accordance with NEN2580) - living room with open kitchen on the canal side - romantic fire place - beautiful view over the Brouwersgracht - bedroom with en-suite bathroom - balcony at the rear - communal bicycle parking and private storage in the basement - active VVE with multi-year maintenance plan and reservation for maintenance - in 2023 the front side of the building will be painted - the backside has been painted in 2021 - monthly service costs € 220,- - communal central heating system, heating advance € 78 per month  Surroundings: The house is located on the last part of the Brouwersgracht, between the Palmgracht and the Driehoeksstraat.  Perfectly located for everything special that can be found in this neighborhood! For example, at the Noordermarkt, where the organic market is held every Saturday. Or the restaurants on Lindengracht and Westerstraat, with highlights such as Toscanini and Daalder. Enjoy all the terraces of the restaurants and bars the Jordaan is famous for. All metropolitan amenities of the center of Amsterdam are within walking distance of the house. And with Central Station, only 15 minutes walk from the apartment, accessibility is optimal! The accessibility by car is also quite good, although this location has its limitations. However, this apartment is located on the right side of the Jordaan. You can quickly leave the city via the Haarlemmerplein! The waiting time for obtaining a parking permit in this area, Centrum-2, is currently nine months.

Ruime 5 KAMER  HOEKWONING  MET GARAGE,  op een  prachtige locatie in Amsterdam  Noord.  Deze woning met diepe en  extra  brede tuin is gelegen in een  rustige  woonwijk  met veel groen  op een centrale plek gelegen. Uitvalswegen richting centrum en de Ring A-10 liggen op steenworp afstand.   De woning is in een verzorgde staat, heeft 4 slaapkamers en heeft een zeer ruime woonkamer, moderne keuken, luxe ruime badkamer en een dakterras. Daarnaast beschikt de woning nog over een garage met berging. In 2012 is de woning gemoderniseerd met onder andere een uitbreiding aan de achterzijde door middel van een serre.   Woonoppervlakte 117m2, exclusief serre van 10 m² en exclusief garage van 16 m². Perceeloppervlakte 209m². Bouwjaar 1993, Energielabel B, oplevering in overleg (kan spoedig).  Indeling; Via de ruime voortuin bereikt u de entree van de woning. Hal met meterkast met ruim voldoende groepen. Separaat toilet met fonteintje en trap naar boven. Vanuit de hal toegang tot de woonkamer.  De ruime woonkamer is licht door de zijramen en heeft aan de achterzijde een serre. Zowel de woonkamer als de open keuken aan de voorzijde zijn voorzien van een Jatoba hardhouten vloer.  De moderne keuken (2010) ligt aan de voorzijde van de woning en is van alle gemakken voorzien met veel kastruimte, uitgevoerd in wit hoogglans en een gemêleerd natuurstenen blad. Uiteraard de nodige inbouwapparatuur zoals vaatwasmachine, oven, 4 pits gaskookplaat en een afzuigkap.  Tuin: De woning kent een ruime voor- zij- en achtertuin. De op het westen gelegen achtertuin is bijna 9 meter diep en ruim 8 meter breed. De garage welke vanuit de tuin te bereiken is ligt achter de achtertuin en kent een goede aanrijmogelijkheid middels elektrische overheaddeur. Aangezien de woning op een hoek ligt is er ook nog grond aan de zijkant van de woning.   Eerste verdieping: Via de vaste trap bereikt u de eerste verdieping waar zich 3 slaapkamers en een vaste kast bevinden. Alle drie de slaapkamers zijn van goed formaat. Van de twee achtergelegen slaapkamers is één slaapkamer thans in gebruik als logeerkamer, de andere kamer als kinderkamer. De kamers hebben alle veel ramen wat veel daglicht geeft. De grootste slaapkamer ligt aan de voorzijde en ligt over de gehele breedte van de woning. De badkamer op de eerste verdieping is gemoderniseerd en ziet er fraai uit; toilet, dubbele wastafel met wastafelmeubel, handdoekenradiator en een extra ruime inloopdouche. De aparte inloopdouche is fraai afgewerkt met mooie tegels en beschikt over een stortdouche en handdouche. In de grote twee slaapkamers bevindt zich airconditioning (2010).   Tweede verdieping: Via een vaste trap bereikt u de tweede verdieping. Op de voorzolder is de wasgelegenheid gemaakt en hier bevindt zich ook de opstelling voor de cv. De 4e slaapkamer eveneens voorzien van airco is thans open en bevindt zich aan de achterzijde en heeft een grote raampartij met openslaande deur welke toegang geeft tot de het dakterras van maar liefst 14 m² groot. Aan de voorzijde op de 2e verdieping is er een Franse balkon en een ruimte voor de wasmachine/droger en een separate kast waar thans de mechanische ventilatie en de c.v. installatie zich bevindt.  Bijzonderheden: - serre (ruim 10m2) aan achterzijde van de woning; - veel raampartijen; - energielabel B; - erfpacht afgekocht tot 2042, na deze datum eeuwigdurende erfpacht met vastgestelde canon, te weten € 1.796,23 welke jaarlijks wordt aangepast aan de daadwerkelijke inflatie van het voorgaande jaar; - de gehele woning kent airconditioning, 1 op de begane grond, 2 op de 1e verdieping en 1 op de 2e verdieping (4 stuks in totaal); - de woning is voorzien van volledige isolatie, te weten vloer-, wand- en dakisolatie alsmede dubbele beglazing; - mogelijkheid om 5e slaapkamer en/of tweede badkamer te realiseren op de derde bouwlaag, uitbreiding van deze woonlaag vergunning plichtig; - garagebox vanuit de tuin bereikbaar; - schilderwerk houtwerk uitgevoerd in 2020; - parkeren in de garagebox, 2e parkeervergunning mogelijk á € 80,50 per jaar;   Locatie: De woning ligt in een rustige woonwijk aan een park met veel groen. Het pontje naar het centrum van Amsterdam is ca. 10 minuten fietsen. Bij het winkelcentrum Buikslotermeerplein kunt u terecht voor al uw dagelijkse boodschappen. Amsterdam Noord is de afgelopen jaren ontwikkelt in een aantrekkelijk gedeelte van Amsterdam om te wonen. Veel restaurants, uitgangsmogelijkheden en hotels. Het NDSM-terrein met horeca als Pllek, de IJ kantine en Noorderlicht. Door de grote nieuwbouwprojecten met woningen zijn er ook voldoende basisscholen. Uiteraard zijn alle voorzieningen zoals winkels, supermarkten en OV op loop- en fietsafstand.

*** THE SALE  HAS  BEEN STARTED!  ***  The Jacob Living in  the  green with the center around  the  corner  The sale has started! Register right  away for  your favorite De Jacob home! View the brochure, the price list with the final purchase prices per home and the 'signpost' with all information about the sales process on the website of the WONEN IN DE JACOB.NL project. From now on, the registration form is online and you can pass on your definitive preferences. This way you can complete your registration completely. Make sure you register on time, because you have exactly 10 days to complete your registration. The registration deadline is Friday, November 19 at 12:00 noon. Do not miss it!  What is the Jacob? That is living with the center around the corner and in the green. The Jacob is the icing on the cake of a larger plan in the popular Slotervaart district. It is the final piece of the renewal of the Jacob Geelbuurt. De Jacob comprises 92 owner-occupied homes spread over three residential blocks, surrounded by a beautiful communal green courtyard that is only accessible to residents. Each house has a view of this green courtyard, where you can sit outside. In addition to its own courtyard garden, the entrance to the project can also be called particularly green. The project can be reached from two closed, car-free side streets. As a result, you have a special wide sidewalk in front of the door with living space for grass, plants, shrubs, trees and play and meeting places. But this is not all. The Jacob is for everyone and consists of real city apartments with 2 to 4 rooms and family houses. Whatever type of home you choose, you can enjoy city life here and live in the middle of greenery.  92 spacious owner-occupied homes The 92 owner-occupied homes in De Jacob have a shared courtyard between the three residential blocks. Here you will also find a closed parking lot where parking spaces are for sale especially for residents. De Jacob's city apartments and family homes are spread over three residential blocks: Eduard, Ferdinand and Gerard. The family homes are located on the ground floor and the first floor, have their own front door on the street and a private garden. The surfaces of these homes vary from approximately 93 m2 to 122 m2 and there are three to four bedrooms. The city apartments are located on the higher floors. The areas vary from approximately 50 m2 to 90 m2. These have one to no fewer than three bedrooms and their own nice outdoor space at each home. There is plenty of choice in products and trends in the field of kitchens, sanitary ware and tiling. It is also possible to change interior doors and door fittings. You can choose, so that we can carry out your home entirely according to your wishes.  City Apartments & Family Homes The Jacob is for everyone. You live here in a 2-room apartment to a spacious family home. The various housing types are subdivided into: • 2-room apartments from approx. € 380,840 • 3- and 4-room apartments from approx. € 459,840 • Single-family homes from approx. € 615,840 The stated purchase prices are free in name, including 50 years of surrendered ground rent, excluding parking space and service costs.  Sustainable living In De Jacob we do various things to make living here as green as possible. With plants and trees in the area, but also in the field of sustainability! For example, there are solar panels on the roof, the other roofs are equipped with green sedum, the houses will have their own heat connection, underfloor heating instead of radiators and you can cook on an electric induction hob. And did you know that every room gets its own room thermostat? This way you can set the temperature per room. But you will also save a lot of energy with good insulation. Here you will really live sustainably.  Urban & green living The location of De Jacob is simply good. You live here close to the center of Amsterdam, but still in a green environment. In no time you cycle to the Vondelpark and a round of Sloterplas is only a few minutes away. Perfect for when you want to go for a walk, skate or jog. The accessibility by public transport, bicycle and car is also favorable. The train, bus and metro stop literally around the corner at Lelylaan or Postjesweg. In the vicinity are many restaurants, supermarkets, parks, schools and sports facilities. In short, everything you need is within reach. Wondering which places you really should visit? Check out the hotspots on the website wonenindejacob.nl.  The sale has started! Register right away for your favorite De Jacob home! View the brochure, the price list with the final purchase prices per home and the 'signpost' with all information about the sales process on the website of the WONEN IN DE JACOB.NL project. From now on, the registration form is online and you can pass on your definitive preferences. This way you can complete your registration completely. Make sure you register on time, because you have exactly 10 days to complete your registration. The registration deadline is Friday, November 19 at 12:00 noon. Do not miss it!  Do you have questions or do you want to know more? Look at WONEN IN DE JACOB.NL for all information or call Hallie & Van Klooster Makelaardij on (020) 6816 716.

Spacious 3-room corner  apartment  located on  the 11th  floor with panoramic views  of  Amsterdam and within walking distance  of  Lelylaan station!  Layout Through the  central  hall  you reach  the two elevators. The entrance of this apartment is located on the 11th floor of the apartment complex 'New York Uptown'.  Eleventh floor You enter the central hall with meter cupboard, central heating boiler and toilet with hand basin. On the left side is the master bedroom with access to the loggia. In addition, the second bedroom is located, which is currently arranged as a cinema room and study. Then you enter the spacious living room with open kitchen equipped with built-in appliances. The large windows make the apartment very light and on both sides you have fantastic views of Amsterdam. Adjacent to the kitchen you will find the convenient, spacious storage room where the washing machine connection is located. The bathroom is very spacious and equipped with a double bathtub. There is also a separate shower and a sink. The accompanying parking space is located in the parking garage located under the building. There is also a bicycle storage room in the building.  For a further impression of the layout you can view the enclosed floor plans.  Location The location of the apartment is ideal. You can walk to shopping center Sierplein where you can go for all your daily groceries and the weekly Siermarkt. But also the bustling Hoofddorplein area with a variety of stores, specialty stores, trendy restaurants and trendy bars is just around the corner.   By bike you are within 10 minutes in the center of Amsterdam and by car you are in 5 minutes on the A10 ring road. Public transportation is within walking distance; streetcar lines 2 and metro 50 are within walking distance and you are also within 5 minutes at Lelylaan station for train transportation and streetcar line 1.   Owners association The house is part of a healthy and active Owners Association. The current owner pays € 221,- per month to this association. This is among other things paid for the building insurance and maintenance of the common parts.  Details - Living area 120 m2 - Built in 2003 - Service costs € 221, - per month - Corner location with panoramic views - Healthy VvE with professional management - Central location near Lelylaan station - Various developments in the vicinity - Elevator installations present - Bicycle storage - Energylabel A - Own parking space - Leasehold purchased in perpetuity - Loggia facing west - Delivery as soon as possible  The non-binding information shown on this website is compiled by us (with care) based on information from the seller (and / or third parties). ***English translation below***   Licht en  praktisch ingedeeld  appartement van 70m2 op  de  derde verdieping met balkon op  het  zuiden! Deze woning is circa 2,5  jaar  geleden  gerenoveerd en  beschikt over een zonnig balkon waar je kunt genieten met mooie zomerse dagen. Het appartement heeft een zeer ruime en lichte woonkamer, een keuken met genoeg ruimte voor een eettafel en twee goed bemeten slaapkamers. Door de bouw uit de jaren 80 is het een relatief nieuw gebouw met het gemak van betonnen vloeren, moderne fundering, goed energielabel en het kijkt uit op een charmant deel van de straat.  Kortom; een instapklaar appartement om de hoek van de bruisende binnenstad!  Omgeving en bereikbaarheid De woning is gelegen in de populaire wijk Oud-West nabij de gezellige Ten Katemarkt, diverse koffietentjes, restaurants, traiteurs, winkels en supermarkten. De hippe Foodhallen liggen eveneens op een steenworp afstand. Het prachtige Vondelpark ligt op loopafstand en met de fiets ben je binnen vijf minuten in de prachtige Jordaan. Verder is de woning gunstig gelegen ten opzichte van openbaar vervoer en diverse uitvalswegen. Verschillende bus- en tramlijnen stoppen op loopafstand van de woning en met de auto ben je binnen 5 minuten op de ringweg A- 10.  Indeling  Begane grond Gemeenschappelijke entree met brievenbussen en het trappenhuis. De privéberging bevind zich ook op de begane grond.   Derde verdieping Bij binnenkomst in de woning betreed je de ruime hal die toegang tot alle vertrekken geeft. De ruime en lichte woonkamer beschikt over een zonnig balkon. De woning is circa 2,5 geleden onder handen genomen en zeer netjes afgewerkt. In de woonkamer ligt prachtige eikenhouten visgraatvloer. De moderne keuken (2020) is voorzien van een vaatwasser, koelkast, vriezer, 4-pits gasfornuis, afzuigkap en een bakoven.   De beide slaapkamers zijn ruim bemeten, hebben gestucte wanden en zijn eveneens voorzien van een prachtige eikenhouten vloer. De masterbedroom beschikt tevens over een inloopkast. De wanden van de badkamer zijn netjes betegeld en is voorzien een douchehoek, wastafelmeubel en een beschikt over een wasmachine aansluiting. Het toilet met fonteintje bevindt zich separaat naast de badkamer. Daarnaast beschikt de woning over een eigen berging.   Bijzonderheden • Woonoppervlakte 70 m2 (NEN-2580 meetrapport aanwezig);  • Bouwjaar 1989; • Twee goed bemeten slaapkamers;  • Energielabel A; • Gezonde en professioneel beheerde VVE; • Servicekosten €125,18 per maand; • De erfpacht is afgekocht tot 16-4-2040. Verkopers hebben de aanvraag voor de overstap op eeuwigdurende erfpacht gedaan;  • Fantastische ligging, alle voorzieningen binnen handbereik; • Oplevering in overleg; • De koopakte wordt opgemaakt bij een notaris in Amsterdam, Diemen of Amstelveen, volgens Amsterdams Ringmodel.  Interesse in dit huis? Maak dan snel een afspraak!  Wij plannen graag een moment voor je in voor de bezichtiging van dit appartement. Onze makelaar vertelt je graag van alles over dit appartement terwijl je rondkijkt. Zien we jou binnenkort?  Deze informatie is door ons met zorgvuldigheid samengesteld. Onzerzijds wordt echter geen enkele aansprakelijkheid aanvaard voor enige onvolledigheid, onjuistheid of anderszins, dan wel de gevolgen daarvan.  ***English translation***  Light and practically arranged apartment of 70m2 on the third floor with a south-facing balcony!  This house was renovated about 2,5 years ago and has a sunny balcony where you can enjoy beautiful summer days. The apartment has a very spacious and bright living room, a kitchen with enough space for a dining table and two well-sized bedrooms. Due to the construction from the 80’s, it is a relatively new building with the convenience of concrete floors, modern foundations and a good energylabel, and it overlooks a charming part of the street.  Summarizing; an apartment at a fantastic location, that can be moved in directly!  Surroundings and accessibility The property is located in the popular Oud-West district near the Ten Katemarkt, various shops, restaurants, bars and supermarkets. The trendy Foodhallen are also very close to the apartment. The beautiful Vondelpark is within walking distance and you can reach the beautiful Jordaan within five minutes by bike. Furthermore, the house is conveniently located for public transport and various roads. Several bus and tram lines stops are within walking distance of the house and you can reach the A-10 ring road within 5 minutes by car.  Layout  Ground floor Communal and spacious entrance with mailboxes and the stairwell. The private storage room is also located on the ground floor.  Third floor Upon entering the house you enter the spacious hall that gives access to all rooms. The spacious and bright living room has a sunny balcony. The house was taken care of about 2,5 years ago and very nicely finished. The living room has a beautiful oak herringbone floor. The modern kitchen (2020) is equipped with a dishwasher, refrigerator, freezer, 4-burner gas stove, extractor hood and an oven. Both bedrooms are spacious, have plastered walls and are also equipped with a beautiful oak floor. The master bedroom also has a walk-in closet. The walls of the bathroom are nice tiled and equipped with a corner shower, washbasin and a washing machine connection. The toilet with fountain is located separately next to the bathroom. In addition, the house has its own storage room.  Key facts • Living area 70 m2 (NEN-2580 measurement report available); • Year of construction 1989; • Two well sized bedrooms; • Energylabel A; • Healthy and professionally managed VVE; • Servicecosts € 125,18 per month; • The leasehold has been bought off until 16-4-2040. The owners asked the municipality for an offer to step over to prepatual groundlease;  • Fantastic location, all facililties within short distance; • Delivery in consultation; • The purchase agreement is drawn up at a notary in Amsterdam, Diemen or Amstelveen, according to the Amsterdam Ring Model.  Interested in this house? Then make an appointment quickly!  We are happy to schedule a moment for you to view this apartment. Our real estate agent will tell you all about this apartment while you look around. Do we see you soon?  This information has been compiled by us with care. Atmospheric and bright  family  home with  garden on  the west, located in  a  quiet, child-friendly and green residential  area  consisting of single-family homes, on the  edge  of  Geuzenveld-Slotermeer. The  house includes a garden-oriented living room with characteristic patio doors to the modern kitchen at the front. On the first floor, this house has three bedrooms and a bathroom and there is also a large fourth (bed) room with a dormer window on the attic floor. This house is close to a park and a sports park and shops and schools can also be found in the immediate vicinity. We are happy to show you this nice family home.  Layout:  Ground floor Entrance into the house through the front garden. Entry into the spacious and bright hall with wardrobe. Access to the kitchen at the front of the house. The modern L-shaped kitchen is equipped with a long worktop, oven, 4-burner gas stove with extractor hood, dishwasher, fridge/freezer combination and many lower and upper cabinets. There is room for a dining table and the large window provides a lot of light. Through the double stained glass doors you reach the wide living room at the rear of the house. From here there is a view of the green and sunny backyard with various seating areas and a back entrance to the communal courtyard.  First floor From the hall and via the stairs to the landing on the first floor. At the rear is a large bedroom with fitted wardrobe. Next to this is a smaller bedroom with a closet. At the front again a large bedroom with fitted wardrobe. Next door is the bathroom with shower, sink and window that can be opened. The separate toilet is located next to the bathroom.  Attic floor The large space on the attic floor has a dormer window at the rear. This space can be used multifunctionally, such as a bedroom, guest room, storage room, hobby room or office. A washing machine connection and the central heating system are also located here.  There is a private storage room in the basement of the building further down the street.  Environment:  A child-friendly and green neighborhood in Nieuw-West with nearby shopping center Osdorpplein, Plein 40-45 and Lambertus Zijplein, but also the shops in West and the Center are within easy reach. The district is also equipped with schools, childcare and playgrounds. The location is also ideal for recreation, such as the adjacent Park de Kuil, but also the Sloterplas. By car there is quick access to the highways. There are also public transport connections nearby (tram line 13 to Central Station) and there is parking with a permit or blue zone.  Recreation is possible close to home: you can cycle in ten minutes to the beautiful Sloterpark for a walk or a run and the Sloterplas for various water sports or a cozy terrace on the water. A little further is the Westerpark, where fun events are organized and include a film house and restaurants.  Whatever you want to know:  - Built in 1957 - Living area approximately 106 m² (in accordance with measurement report) - Garden-oriented living room - Lovely garden, located on the west, with a back entrance to the green court at the rear - Modern kitchen at the front with dining area and stained glass doors to the living room - 3 bedrooms on the first floor - 1 large (bed) room in the attic with a dormer window - Heating and hot water through a CV combi boiler - Fully equipped with plastic frames with double glazing - Separate storage room on the ground floor of the building at the beginning of the street. The storage room is an apartment right. The contribution to the VvE is € 10,72 per month. - Service costs for the communal garden/court at the rear are € 12.50 per month. - Continuous right of leasehold, the canon has been bought off up to and including January 31, 2054. Redemption of perpetual leasehold at a favorable rate is possible through the regret optant scheme - Located opposite Park de Kuil and sports park and various shops in the immediate vicinity - Delivery in consultation

Entire (canal house)  of  approximately 334  sq.m. on  own ground divided over  six  floors located in the vibrant  and  highly sought-after neighbourhood Plantage Weesperbuurt (Centrum-Oost)  in  Amsterdam city centre.  OBJECT  The property consists of five residential units. The residences are situated as follows:  - Nieuwe Achtergracht 85 H: (consists of two floors - the ground floor and the basement). The basement comprises two bedrooms, a bathroom and a laundry room.  The ground floor is used as living room and kitchen. The ground floor also has access to the garden. The apartement is renovated in 2003 (the paintwork was last done in 2014 and the central heating in 2020). (These floors will be vacant for new owner occupation after the sale) The possibility exists to take over the current furniture.  - Nieuwe Achtergracht 85 - 1: is situated on the first floor of the property. The apartment has two bedrooms, a living room, a separate kitchen and a bathroom. The apartment is renovated in 2020 and is upholstered and furnished) rented in the free sector.  - Nieuwe Achtergracht 85 - 2: is situated on the second floor of the property. The apartment also features two bedrooms, a separate kitchen, living room, bathroom and separate toilet. Located on one  of  Amsterdam's most  beautiful canals:  this sun-drenched and luxuriously  renovated  apartment of approx. 134 m2  with  three bedrooms, a roof terrace, and  a ceiling height of up  to 3.92 meters. The roof terrace (approx. 17 m2) offers spectacular unobstructed views of the Jordaan and the Westertoren, among others. With a gross floor area of over 170 m2, the property feels very spacious.   The apartment is located on the 4th and 5th (top) floors of a characteristic canal house. On the 4th floor, the centrally located entrance hall provides access to the living room with open kitchen. The living room is very bright and spacious with a ceiling height of up to 3.92 meters. The open kitchen with built-in SMEG appliances is made of walnut wood.  Furthermore, this floor houses the master bedroom, providing access to the adjacent balcony (located on the west) through French doors. From the hallway, you can reach the bathroom that is equipped with a bathtub, walk-in shower, and sink. A separate toilet, third bedroom (now used as walk-in closet) and an extra room (with washer-dryer connections and central heating unit) are also located on this floor.  A steel staircase leads up to the mezzanine with a partial glass floor (walkable). This area is furnished as a bedroom and has windows all around, letting in an abundance of natural light. The mezzanine offers access to the roof terrace with fantastic unobstructed views of Amsterdam and the striking Westertoren.  Currently, there are two bedrooms (with air conditioning) and one extra room (now walk-in closet), which can also be used as a bedroom. Furthermore, it is possible to split the master bedroom into two separate rooms, in order to create a 4th bedroom (see alternative floor plan).  Features -	Usable area of 133.6 m2 (in accordance with NEN2580); -	Roof terrace (partly licensed) of 16.6 m2 (in accordance with NEN2580); -	Completely renovated to a high standard (2017); -	3 bedrooms (with the possibility of four bedrooms, please refer to alternative floor plan); -	Largely double glazed; -	Storage room on ground floor of 2 m2; -	Located on freehold land; -	Active VvE, professionally managed by NL VvE; -	The service costs of the VvE are € 233.15 per month; -	Exterior maintenance is scheduled to begin in early May 2023. This involves exterior painting and roof work; -	Located in a prime location on the picturesque and quiet Bloemgracht, in the popular Jordaan area. Within walking distance of – among others – the Anne Frank House, the Noordermarkt, Nine Streets and many restaurants and cafés.

Wat een fijne  woning,  dit gelijkvloerse  appartement aan  Stadszijde van Libau Eiland.  Het  appartement bevindt zich op de  2e  verdieping van het Boeghuis, met uitzicht op het  water en  een terras op het noordwesten. Met een woonoppervlakte van circa 75 m2 en 2 slaapkamers is het een heerlijk appartement. Bovendien is een privéplaats voor de auto inbegrepen in de V.O.N.-prijs van de woning. Je woont dus in hartje Amsterdam, vlak bij de levendige Spaarndammerbuurt, maar hoeft nóóit te zoeken naar een parkeerplaats. Iets voor jou!

English translation below!   Het appartement  van maar  liefst 78m2 is gelegen  op  de 1e verdieping en heeft  een  ruim en zonnig balkon!  Met  de Sloterplas,  waar je heerlijk kunt wandelen, hardlopen of recreëren en het winkelcentrum Osdorplein om de hoek, zijn alle winkels en speciaalzaken die je nodig hebt op loopafstand. Ook beschikt het Osdorpplein over een sportschool en een theater.  In 10 minuten fietsen ben je in de stad. Tramlijnen 1 en 17 stoppen praktisch voor de deur en brengen je binnen 10 minuten richting het centrum van Amsterdam. Station Lelylaan is slechts op 5 minuten fietsafstand.  In de buurt is het parkeren d.m.v. een 'blauwe zone' vergunningsstelsel. Een vergunning kost slechts € 154,90 (tarief 2022) voor 2 jaar.  Indeling: Via de gemeenschappelijke entree met intercomsysteem en brievenbussen is er toegang tot de lift, het trappenhuis en de, in de onderbouw gelegen, bergingen.  Je komt binnen via de deur aansluitend aan de galerij. Na de voordeur vind je links direct de keuken. In de keuken bevindt zich tevens de aansluiting voor de wasmachine.  Tussen de keuken en de master bedroom is de badkamer, voorzien van een wastafel, een bad/douche en toilet.  Aan het einde van de gang links ligt de master bedroom. Aangrenzend aan de master bedroom is een groot balkon van 5m2.  Aan de andere kant van de hal bevinden zich twee kamers, waarbij de muur tussen beide kamers op dit moment open is.  Het linkerdeel van deze ruimte wordt nu gebruikt als ruime woonkamer, die beschikt over een grote raampartij. De woonkamer heeft genoeg ruimte voor een eettafel met stoelen, een grote bank en extra zitje. Het rechterdeel is een extra kamer die vrij in te richten is! Deze kamer heeft ook een grote raampartij aan de galerijkant. Door de muur tussen deze twee ruimtes te dichten, is een extra slaap- of werkkamer makkelijk te realiseren.   In de onderbouw van het complex bevindt zich een berging voorzien van elektriciteit van 6m2.  Erfpacht: Het appartement ligt op een perceel dat eigendom is van de gemeente Amsterdam. De vergoeding voor de erfpacht, de canon, bedraagt € 91,20 per jaar. Het tijdvak loopt tot en met 16-02-2037.  Vereniging van Eigenaren:   Het betreft een appartementsrecht binnen een vereniging van eigenaren. Men betaalt maandelijks servicekosten aan de vereniging, waar groot onderhoud, een voorschot voor de stookkosten en een opstalverzekering van wordt betaald. De maandelijkse kosten zijn €242,48. Inbegrepen in deze kosten zit het voorschot stookkosten van €77,74.  -	Appartement van 78 m2 -	Nu 1 slaapkamer, met extra grote woonkamer, waar eenvoudig een 2e slaapkamer van te maken is -	Balkon van 5 m2 -	Berging van 6 m2, inclusief elektra (makkelijk met de (elektrische) fiets te bereiken) -	Gelegen in een groene omgeving aan de Sloterplas -	Appartementsrecht -	Warm water d.m.v. elektrische boiler (eigendom) -	Blokverwarming -	Gratis parkeren d.m.v. blauwe zone met vergunningsstelsel, kosten € 154,90 (tarief 2022) voor 2 jaar -	Oplevering in overleg  Nieuwsgierig en enthousiast geworden? Mail of bel ons snel voor een bezichtiging.   English translation:  The apartment of 78m2 is located on the 1st floor and has a spacious and sunny balcony!  With the Sloterplas, where you can enjoy walking, running or recreation, and the Osdorplein shopping center around the corner, all the shops and specialty stores you need are within walking distance. Osdorpplein also has a gym and a theater.  You are in the city in 10 minutes by bike. Tram lines 1 and 17 stop practically in front of the door and take you to the center of Amsterdam within 10 minutes. Lelylaan station is only a 5-minute bike ride away.  Parking is available with a 'blue zone' licensing system. A permit costs only € 154.90 (rate 2022) for 2 years.  Layout: Through the communal entrance with intercom system and mailboxes there is access to the elevator, the stairwell and the storage rooms located in the basement.  You enter through the door adjacent to the gallery. After the front door you will immediately find the kitchen on the left. The connection for the washing machine is also located in the kitchen.  Between the kitchen and the master bedroom is the bathroom with a sink, a bath/shower and toilet.  At the end of the corridor on the left is the master bedroom. Adjacent to the master bedroom is a large balcony of 5m2.  On the other side of the hall are two rooms, with the wall between the two rooms currently open.  The left part of this room is now used as a spacious living room, which has large windows. The living room has enough space for a dining table with chairs, a large sofa and extra seating. The right part is an extra room that can be freely arranged! This room also has large windows on the gallery side. By closing the wall between these two spaces, an extra bedroom or office can easily be created.  In the basement of the complex is a storage room of 6m2 including electricity.  Ground lease: The apartment is located on a plot that is owned by the municipality of Amsterdam. The compensation for the ground lease, the ground rent, is € 91.20 per year. The period runs until 16-02-2037.  Owners Association: It concerns an apartment right within an association of owners. Monthly service costs are paid to the association, for which major maintenance, an advance for heating costs and building insurance are paid. The monthly costs are €242.48. Included in these costs is the advance heating costs of €77.74.  - Apartment of 78 m2 - Now 1 bedroom, with extra-large living room, which can easily be turned into a 2nd bedroom - Balcony of 5 m2 - Storage room of 6 m2, including electricity (easy to reach by (electric) bicycle) - Located in a green area on the Sloterplas - Hot water by means of electric water heater (owned) - Block heating - Free parking through blue zone with permit system, costs € 154.90 (rate 2022) for 2 years - Delivery in consultation  Curious and enthusiastic? Mail or call us quickly for a viewing.

Great apartment of  approx.  31m2 and  fully equipped,  located in the bustling  West,  a short distance from the  Erasmus  Park, but also the Bos en  Lommerweg  and the Baarsjes. The  house has a fresh look and is extra well insulated, the house has extra double glazing and there is underfloor heating/cooling.  With the elevator you arrive at the second floor and upon entering the apartment you will immediately notice the beautiful light. The studio is very practically laid out as an open space.  The modern kitchen is equipped with a fridge with freezer, 4-burner induction hob, combi oven and an extractor hood. In addition, there is sufficient work and storage space.  The bathroom is fully tiled and equipped with a floating toilet, shower and sink.  The apartment is located on the west side of the center of Amsterdam, in the West district. The many nice restaurants, bars, shops, the Erasmusgracht and the cozy neighborhood pizzeria Buurman & Buurman make you immediately feel at home here. The Erasmus Park is within walking distance, including Terrasmus, which attracts many people because of the friendly atmosphere and the tasty snacks and drinks. In the north wing of the building is the cozy catering facility 'Chez Miné' with the possibility to work here during the day in the living room, but where you can also have a drink and a bite to eat.  The complex is located on a quiet cul de sac, near the Erasmus Park, the Rembrandt Park and the Bos en Lommerplein. Here you will find several supermarkets and a market. Public transport is well organized within walking distance of tram 7 & 14 and bus 15 & 21.  - Heating through district heating, underfloor heating throughout the house - Active and healthy VvE, multi-year maintenance plan is available - Contribution VvE is € 121,- per month, including the heating costs - Long lease is € 695,- per year, period runs until 2062 - Caretaker present - Miele Launderette on the ground floor - Communal bicycle shed - There are parking spaces for rent - Fiber optic connection for internet

Wat een heerlijke,  moderne  en bovenal  luxe woning  is dit! Deze woning  dateert  van 2019 en beschikt over  een  voor- en achtertuin. Je woont hier  op  een rustige, unieke locatie  in Amsterdam. De woning wordt turnkey opgeleverd, beschikt over energielabel A en is GASLOOS.   De woning is gelegen in een kindvriendelijke nieuwbouwwijk in Venserpolder Oost. De hoogwaardige wijk kenmerkt zich door een afwisselende bouw met oog voor detail, een ruimtelijke opzet en veel groen (deels wordt nog gerealiseerd). Kenmerkend voor de wijk is de diversiteit aan woningen, ieder huis is anders wat de wijk sfeervol en uniek maakt. Deze energiezuinige woning is aan de achterzijde uitgebouwd en beschikt over een woonoppervlakte van zo'n 157 m² en aan de voorzijde is een gezellig zitje gecreëerd.  Loop je met ons mee? Via de betegelde voortuin met lage groene haag bereik je de voordeur. Entree met garderobe en meterkast. Keurig betegeld zwevend toilet met bidet en fonteintje, trapopgang naar de eerste verdieping en stalen deuren met industriële look (Skygate) naar de ruime, lichte woonkamer. De deuren geven de begane grond extra diepte en zorgt voor veel lichtinval. De living heeft aan de achterzijde een schuifpui naar de tuin. Aan de voorzijde is de moderne keuken gesitueerd (Duits, merk Burger) met zwart zijdemat fronten en apparatuur van Siemens Studioline (luxe uitvoering), bedienbaar via mobiel of tablet en is voorzien van het volgende apparatuur: vaatwasser, koelkast met vriezer, stoomoven, inductiekookplaat met geïntegreerde afzuigunit aan het plafond en Quooker flex 3 in 1 kraan RVS met COMBI+ reservoir. De keuken heeft een spoeleiland met eetbar en een ingebouwde afvalemmer met 4 uitschuifbare emmers. In de woonkamer ligt een betonnen vloer met een gietvloer look. Plafond en muren zijn strak afgewerkt en het plafond is voorzien van spots met dimmer. De begane grond is voorzien van vloerverwarming. In de woonkamer vind je een vast tv-meubel.  Eerste verdieping: Via de fraaie met eikenhout beklede trap bereik je de overloop, waar de twee slaapkamers zich bevinden. Een slaapkamer is aan de achterzijde. De grote slaapkamer aan de voorzijde en heeft een walk-in-closet. Ook de luxe, eigentijdse badkamer vind je hier, uitgevoerd met een whirlpool (Riho), bidet toilet, een eikenhout badmeubel met twee waskommen en inbouwkranen (Hotbath), inbouwspots, inloop-/regendouche met floordrain en handdouche. De spiegel is voorzien van een klokje en een heater ter voorkoming van condens. De badkamer is voorzien van vloerverwarming. In de slaapkamers ligt laminaat met eronder vloerverwarming die per vertrek te regelen is.   Tweede verdieping: Vaste trap vanaf de 1e verdieping. Op deze verdieping is de overloop en drie slaapkamers. Aan de voorzijde bevindt zich een ruime, lichte slaapkamer en een technische ruimte met aansluitingen voor het witgoed en mechanische ventilatie. Aan de achterzijde bevindt zich ook een ruime, lichte slaapkamer en een kleinere slaapkamer. Deze kleinere slaapkamer kan eventueel verbouwd worden naar een tweede badkamer. Op deze verdieping ligt laminaat met vloerverwarming die per vertrek te regelen is.  Tuin: Het huis heeft een betegelde voortuin met haag en een deels groene achtertuin. Aansluitend aan de woning vind je een terras. In de zomer heb je zon van zonsopgang tot ca. 16:00 uur in de achtertuin en in de voortuin van ca. 13:00 uur tot zonsondergang. In de achtertuin is het aan het eind van de middag een stuk koeler en dan kun je er met familie en vrienden gezellig iets eten of drinken. Met de avondzon is het fijn om in de voortuin te zitten. De keuken heeft een directe verbinding met de voortuin, zodat je makkelijk een kopje koffie of thee kunt pakken!  Parkeren: Er is voldoende parkeergelegenheid rondom de woning. Blauwe zone parkeren.  Erfpacht: De woning staat op gemeentelijk erfpacht. Eeuwigdurend recht van erfpacht. De jaarlijkse canon bedraagt €2.090,-.  Ken je de omgeving al? Deze fraaie woning (2019) is gelegen aan een rustige weg in de groene, kindvriendelijke buurt Venserpolder Oost, op fietsafstand van het centrum. De supermarkt vind je op loopafstand en om te winkelen kun je ook terecht bij de winkelcentra De Poort of Diemen. Kinderopvang en scholen vind je op loopafstand. De Amsterdam Arena, Afas Live, de Ziggo Dome en de bioscoop Pathé bevinden zich alle op loopafstand. Je kunt wandelen of joggen in het Diemerbos, het Nelson Mandelapark of het Hollandpark. Er zijn diverse speeltuintjes in de buurt. Bushalte, trein- en metrostations vind je op loopafstand, waardoor het centrum van Amsterdam, Schiphol en Rotterdam en Utrecht prima bereikbaar zijn. Met de auto ben je snel op de A2 of op de ring A10. Ook lopen er leuke fietsroutes door de wijk. De bestrating, het parkeren, de verlichting, beplantingen en overige openbare voorzieningen zijn tijdelijk van aard. De bestrating wordt vernieuwd en daarna wordt de straat autovrij. Het definitief maken van de toekomstig buurt met de daarbij behorende voorzieningen gaat waarschijnlijk eind 2023 gebeuren.  Goed om te weten: •	Zeer luxueuze, duurzame woning met 6 kamers en voor- en achtertuin •	Bouwjaar 2019 •	Gasloze woning met 12 zonnepanelen •	Energielabel: A •	Vele ramen met HR ++ beglazing van vloer tot bijna plafond •	Uitstekende ligging in kindvriendelijke buurt •	Uitstekende bereikbaarheid •	Achtertuin op noordoosten van ca. 34m2 •	Voortuin op het zuidwesten van ca. 18 m2 •	De woning is belast met erfpacht •	Oplevering in overleg •	Woongenot: 157 m2 •	Externe Berging: 6 m2 •	Ruime living •	6 kamers (5 slaapkamers) •	Grote slaapkamer met inloopkast •	Luxe eigentijds sanitair •	Luxe keuken met via wifi bedienbare apparatuur •	GASLOOS WONEN! •	Vloerverwarming per vertrek te regelen •	12 zonnepanelen •	Glad gestukadoorde wanden en plafonds •	Plafond begane grond voorzien van spots met dimmer •	HR ++ beglazing •	Mogelijkheden om aanpassingen aan te brengen •	Rustige, centrale ligging met alles onder handbereik  ####English#### What a lovely, modern and above all luxurious home this is! This house dates from 2019 and has a front and back garden. You live here in a quiet, unique location in Amsterdam. The house will be delivered turnkey, has energy label A and is GASLESS.  The house is located in a child-friendly new residential area in Venserpolder East. The high-quality neighborhood is characterized by a varied construction with an eye for detail, a spatial layout and lots of greenery (part of which is still being realized). Characteristic of the neighborhood is the diversity of homes, every house is different, which makes the neighborhood attractive and unique. This energy-efficient house has been extended at the rear and has a living space of approximately 157 m² and a cozy seating area has been created at the front.  Let us show you around!  Through the tiled front garden with low green hedge you reach the front door. Entrance with wardrobe and meter closet. Neatly tiled floating toilet with bidet and hand basin, staircase to the first floor and steel doors with industrial look (Skygate) to the spacious, bright living room. The doors give the ground floor extra depth and a beautiful light. The living room has sliding doors to the garden at the rear. At the front is the modern kitchen located (German, brand Burger) with black silk mat fronts and equipment from Siemens Studioline (luxury version), operated via mobile or tablet: dishwasher, fridge with freezer, steam oven, induction cooker with extraction unit on the ceiling and Quooker flex 3 in 1 RVS crane with COMBI+ reservoir. The kitchen has a sink island with a breakfast bar and a built-in waste system with 4 extendable bins. The living room has a concrete floor with a cast floor look. Ceiling and walls are neatly finished and the ceiling is fitted with spotlights with dimmer. The ground floor is equipped with underfloor heating. In the living room you will find a fixed tv-cabinet.  First floor:  Through the beautiful oak-clad staircase you reach the landing, where 2 bedrooms can be found. One bedroom is located at the rear. The large bedroom is located at the front and has a very spacious walk-in closet. The luxurious, contemporary bathroom can also be found here, with a whirlpool (Riho) and bidet toilet, an oak vanity unit with washbasins and built-in faucets (Hotbath), recessed spotlights and a walk-in shower with rainshower, handshower and floordrain. The mirror is equipped with a clock and a heater to prevent condensation. The bedrooms have laminate flooring with underfloor heating. The bathroom is also equipped with underfloor heating.  Second floor: Fixed staircase from the 1st floor with a landing. Here you will find 3 bedrooms. At the front is a spacious, bright bedroom and a technical room with connections for white goods and mechanical ventilation. At the rear is also a spacious, bright bedroom and a smaller bedroom. This smaller bedroom can possibly be converted into a second bathroom. On this floor is laminate with underfloor heating that can be arranged per room.  Garden:  The house has a tiled front garden with a hedge, partly green backyard. Adjacent to the house is a terrace. In the summer you have sunshine from sunrise to about 16:00 in the backyard and in the front yard from about 13:00 to sunset. In the backyard it is a lot cooler at the end of the afternoon and then you can have something to eat or drink with family and friends. With the evening sun it is nice to sit in the front garden. The kitchen has a direct connection to the front garden, so you can easily grab a cup of coffee or tea.  Parking:  There is parking around the house. Blue zone parking.  Ground Lease: The house is on municipal leasehold. Perpetual right of leasehold. The annual canon is €2.090,-.  Do you already know the area? This beautiful house (2019) is located on a quiet road in the green, child-friendly neighborhood Venserpolder Oost, within cycling distance of the centre. The supermarket is within walking distance and for shopping you can also go to the shopping centres De Poort or Diemen. Childcare facilities and schools are within walking distance. The Amsterdam Arena, Afas Live, the Ziggo Dome and the Pathé cinema are all within walking distance. You can walk or run in the Diemer forest, the Nelson Mandela Park or the Holland Park. There are various playgrounds in the area. Bus stop, train and metro stations are within walking distance, making the centre of Amsterdam, Schiphol Airport and Rotterdam and Utrecht easily accessible. By car, you can quickly reach the A2 motorway or the A10 ring road. There are also great cycle routes through the neighbourhood. The paving, parking, lighting, plants and other public amenities are temporary. The paving will be renewed and then the street will be car-free. The finalisation of the future neighbourhood with the accompanying facilities will probably take place at the end of 2023.  Good to know: •	Very luxurious, sustainable home with 6 bedrooms and front and back garden •	Built in 2019 •	Large windows with HR ++ glazing from floor to almost ceiling •	Gasless home with 12 solar panels •	Energy label: A •	Excellent location in child friendly neighbourhood •	Excellent accessibility •	Backgarden on northeast (approx. 34 m2)  •	Frontgarden on southeast (approx. 18 m2)  •	The property is charged with municipal long-term lease  •	Delivery in consultation •	Living space: 157 m2 •	External storage space: 6 m2 •	Spacious living room •	6 rooms (5 bedrooms) •	Large bedroom with walk-in wardrobe •	Luxury contemporary sanitary ware •	Luxury kitchen with wifi controlled appliances •	GAS FREE LIVING! •	Underfloor heating per room to regulate •	12 solar panels •	Plastered walls and ceilings  •	Ground floor ceiling fitted with spotlights with dimmer •	HR ++ beglazing •	Possibilities to make adjustments •	Quiet, central location with everything within reach

***This property is  listed  by an  MVA Certified  Expat Broker***  Are  you  looking for a nice apartment  in  a luxury apartment complex with spacious  roof terraces, fantastic views and  sufficient privacy? Then look no further, because we found it for you!  This completely renovated 1930s building is located on the edge of the beautiful Amsterdam forest, but also a stone's throw from the center of Amstelveen and Amsterdam. The whole has been architecturally transformed into a luxury apartment complex, with spacious terraces and beautifully landscaped gardens at the rear.  The offered apartment is on the top (3rd) floor with a fantastic view from the roof terrace of 65 m2, on the Amsterdamse Bos. The apartment was completed turnkey in 2017, with a bright living room, sleek modern kitchen, luxurious bathroom and 2 bedrooms.  In addition, the house is fully insulated, equipped with double glazing and plastic frames and the apartment received a new cement floor during the renovation.  Got excited? Quickly schedule a viewing at Amstelveenseweg 920 E in Amsterdam!  Layout Through the common entrance we enter the complex in the central entrance with mailboxes and videophone. We take the stairs to the 3rd floor where the apartment is located. Behind the front door is the spacious entrance with meter cupboard and wardrobe. From here we walk to the kitchen where we start the tour.  The luxury kitchen is equipped with various appliances, such as: an induction hob (AEG), fridge / freezer, dishwasher and oven / microwave. The kitchen is placed in an L-shape, so you have sufficient work and storage space. In addition, you are equipped with a renewed counter top (2022) and the room is finished in a light color scheme.  The living room seamlessly adjoins the kitchen and is spacious in size. The room is finished with an oak parquet floor and tightly plastered walls in a light color scheme. In addition, you have windows through which the daylight settles wonderfully. The perfect basis to embroider on for your living wishes! You have enough space here to place a sitting area in front of the TV where you can relax together after a long (working) day. The space also offers enough space for a cozy dining area.  The apartment has two well-sized bedrooms. These rooms are also neatly finished in a neutral color scheme and the oak parquet floor has also been laid here. Currently one of the bedrooms is used as an office. You can arrange this space completely according to your own wishes, do you already know how you will furnish the rooms?  The bathroom will be completely renovated in 2021. The room is finished in a neutral color scheme with tiling from floor to ceiling. In addition, the wall behind the mirrors has a brick wall. The bathroom is equipped with a towel radiator, double washbasin furniture with 2 washbasins and a spacious walk-in shower with glass shower wall. The toilet room is located separately next to the bathroom.This was also renewed in 2021 in the same color scheme as the bathroom. There is a separate room where the washing machine and central heating system (Remeha 2017) is placed.  We walk inside via the staircase to the roof terrace. The roof terrace on the fourth floor is on the west side at the rear and the east side at the front. The terrace has decking and offers a beautiful view. Enjoy the privacy, tranquility and the view here! A water tap and a double waterproof socket have also been installed on the roof terrace. The terrace door will be equipped with a luxurious roller screen door in 2021.  Location The apartments border with the garden and the jetty directly on the water (the horn ditch) and Amsterdamse Bos. A more beautiful view of the city is hard to imagine. The canals are within easy reach through the lock, so the boat can be moored directly at the private jetty behind the house.  The building is a stone's throw from the entrance to the Bosbaan with Sauna SPA Zuiver, Amstelpark Tennis Club, Hurley hockey club, restaurant "De Veranda" and Grand Cafe "De Bosbaan". The Schools, University, VuMC, Center of Amsterdam, Amstelveen and roads (Ring A-10 / A-4) are easily and quickly accessible and you can reach the Vondelpark in 10 to 15 minutes by bike. There are various tram and bus connections in the immediate vicinity and Station Zuid/WTC and NS Station RAI are just a few minutes by bike. With a permit (currently no waiting list) you can park in front of the door (two permits per apartment right).  Particularities: - Located on private land; - Property is luxuriously finished in its entirety; - Spacious roof terrace accessible via a fixed staircase in the house; - Parking in front of the door (permit for 2 cars can be requested); - The old age and asbestos clause will be included in the purchase agreement; - Energy label: B until 17-10-2032.

SPOT Amsterdam |  Tower  A1  CITY APARTMENTS  You'll have everything close  at  hand in these 43 perfectly  laid-out  city flats, varying in size between  46  m2 and 57 m2.  The compact city apartments come with every comfort and convenience. Everything you need for comfortable living is there. Clear and surprising. You have a nice bathroom, one bedroom and underfloor heating and cooling. You can also enjoy the sun on your own balcony or loggia.  Your home SPOT SPOT Amsterdam consists of seven energy-efficient and sturdy residential towers, varying in height and located directly at Hondsrug Park. There is a diverse range of a total of 1,090 owner-occupied and rented homes in all price categories. SPOT's impressive residential buildings are a landmark in the middle of the grand city park. From your flat you have a magnificent view of the green and urban environment. For young and old. From city apartments and grand apartments to penthouses. It is a contemporary place where living, working and life come together in a green park. And with all the fun of the city close by.   TOREN A1 The first flats in Tower A1 will be for sale. A sturdy residential building of 31 floors with a total of 179 stylish owner-occupied homes. You can choose from various living areas and layouts. From comfortable flats to spacious penthouses. Ideal for city dwellers living alone or together, with or without children.  The residences are fitted with all modern conveniences and finished down to the last detail. They also have one, two or three bedrooms, a good layout, possible parking right in the underground garage and a beautiful outdoor area. From fine balconies (sometimes even two) and bright loggias to beautiful roof terraces. The ground floor of the building will house boutiques, restaurants, sports facilities and two floors of offices above. There will also be a day nursery within SPOT Amsterdam.  RENOWNED DESIGN The contemporary homes meet the latest energy and sustainability requirements and are designed by renowned architects. In addition to fantastic living, much attention is paid to greenery, sport and exercise in the public areas. The exact details and details of the large-scale area transformation are still being developed. The first homes are expected to be handed over in 2024.  SURROUNDINGS AND LOCATION Hondsrugpark will be a splendidly biodiverse city park measuring no less than seven football pitches. With all the trimmings. A lively neighbourhood in the making, where everything is being done to ensure affordable and good living, working and relaxation. For example, you will live in a car-free environment with plenty of cycling and walking routes, places to stay by the water and numerous sports facilities. Hondsrugpark - and also SPOT - is a pioneering residential and working neighbourhood. In the coming years, the area will be developed into the ideal place in Amsterdam to live, work and play. A lively and mixed urban district with housing, office space and all kinds of facilities for the approximately 2,500 new residents.   SPOT Amsterdam also has fast connections to the centre. Within 15 minutes you can be in the heart of Amsterdam by metro or train and in no time you are on the A10 ring road or the A2 and A9 motorways to Utrecht, Den Bosch, Schiphol or The Hague.  OPEN DAY Every Tuesday between 12:00 - 14:00 and every Thursday between 15:00 - 17:00, you can drop by the sales centre at SPOT's construction site at Hogehilweg 3 in Amsterdam and experience SPOT!  If you come by car, it's best to park at P10 on Hondsrugweg. From there, it's a 5-minute walk to the SPOT Amsterdam sales centre.  INTERESTED? Register via the project website for your preferred appartments and you will automatically be added on the reserve list. Do you have questions about the project or your registration? Please contact the estate agent!  "This information has been compiled with the utmost care. Mogen wij even  je  aandacht voor  dit fijne  en vooral zeer lichte  appartement?  Deze is gelegen op de  derde  verdieping en heeft grotendeels geen bovenburen  (alleen  in  de achterste helft  van de zolder).  Je kunt hier rekenen op een ruime en lichte woonkamer, open keuken, slaapkamer en een verzorgde badkamer. Het geheel is smaakvol afgewerkt en vrijwel direct te betrekken door de nieuwe bewoners.  Verder is de woning gelegen op eigen grond én in de populaire buurt De Pijp, wat wil je nog meer?  Kom snel een keer binnenkijken en laat je aangenaam verrassen door dit appartement!  Indeling Derde verdieping Je komt het appartement binnen in een smalle hal die je toegang geeft tot de slaapkamer, badkamer en natuurlijk de woonkamer.  We starten in de woonkamer, daar waar het dagelijkse leven zich vanaf nu grotendeels zal gaan afspelen. De woonkamer is smaakvol afgewerkt met een nette laminaatvloer en lichte kleuren op de wanden, waardoor je hier beschikt over een ideale basis voor verschillende interieurstijlen. De grote ramen zorgen voor een zeer prettige inval van daglicht.  In de woonkamer heb je meer dan voldoende ruimte voor een comfortabele zithoek waar je je terug kunt trekken om te ontspannen en een gezellige eethoek.  Er is een open keuken aanwezig. Deze is geplaatst in een praktische L-opstelling, waarbij je voldoende kast- en werkruimte tot je beschikking hebt. Daarnaast ben je hier voorzien van een 5 pits gasfornuis, afzuigkap, oven, vaatwasser, koelkast en een vriezer.  In het appartement is een goed bemeten slaapkamer aanwezig, gesitueerd aan de achterzijde van het appartement. Dit is een fijne ruimte die wederom weer aangenaam licht is dankzij grote ramen.  De badkamer is geheel betegeld en deze heeft een frisse en verzorgde uitstraling. In de badkamer ben je voorzien van een toilet, wastafel en een douche.  Bijzonderheden: - Servicekosten €99,- per maand; - Eigen grond!  Locatie Mocht het appartement je nog niet overtuigd hebben, dan zal de ligging je zeker over de streep trekken. Het appartement ligt namelijk op een fantastische plek, aan het begin van de groene, rustige en sfeervolle Gerard Doustraat, naast het water en op de meest centrale plek van Amsterdam in de Pijp.  De Frans Halsbuurt en de Ferdinand Bolstraat liggen op slechts enkele minuten loopafstand, waar je een groot winkelaanbod en gezellige horecagelegenheden vindt.  Binnen een paar minuten fietsen, ben je in het centrum en ook de leuke stukjes van Oost, Zuid en West; een zeer centrale ligging dus. Ook de bereikbaarheid met het openbaar vervoer en met de auto is goed geregeld.  De woning heeft een definitief energielabel, te weten C.

Altijd al gedroomd  om  te wonen  in een  Tiny House op het  water?   Deze nieuwe vorm van  wonen  is nu ook beschikbaar gekomen in  de  populaire Van Lennepbuurt (Oud-West).  Op loopafstand van de grachtengordel, het Vondelpark en de smakelijke Foodhallen. In de buurt zijn talloze restaurants, een bioscoop en verschillende winkels. Deze hippe locatie staat garant voor een grote diversiteit aan winkels en horeca. Ook de bereikbaarheid van verschillende bus- en tramlijnen is goed en met de auto ben je binnen 5 minuten op de ringweg A-10. Dit charmante arkje biedt de efficiency van een Tiny House maar is van alle gemakken voorzien. Doordat het ingebouwde opklapbed overdag mooi is weggewerkt in de vaste kastenwand oogt het bijzonder ruim. Via de schuifpui is het buitenterras te bereiken waar je heerlijk kunt genieten van de gezellig reuring in de binnenstad.  De gehele woonark is voorzien van dubbel glas en dat is mooi meegenomen in deze dure tijden. De prachtige en unieke ligging is het kersje op de taart.  Enthousiast? Maak snel een afspraak voor een bezichtiging!  Bijzonderheden: Naam: AKUNA	 Casco: Beton Opbouw: Rabat buitenzijde (red cedar). Afmetingen: ± 8.10 x 4 meter (opbouw). Liggeld: ± € 637,- per jaar (2022). Nutsvoorzieningen: Elektra, water, gas, kabel-tv, telefoon en riool Bouwer: Onbekend  Disclaimer inzake aanbod De informatie op deze pagina geeft een globale omschrijving van het aangeboden object. Aan de inhoud kunnen geen rechten worden ontleend. Vermelding van afmetingen en oppervlakten is slechts als aanduiding bedoeld en niet als gegarandeerde eigenschap. De NEN meetinstructie voor gebouwen is niet toegepast. Alle zich in deze aanbieding bevindende informatie is door ons met grote zorgvuldigheid samengesteld, echter met betrekking tot deze informatie aanvaarden wij geen enkele aansprakelijkheid, noch kan aan vermelde informatie enig recht worden ontleend.  Een woonboot is een roerend goed waarbij de bedenktijd van 3 dagen niet van toepassing is en een mondelinge overeenkomst bindend is.  Per 1 januari 2022 is de wet opkoopbescherming van kracht hetgeen betekent dat gemeenten een zelfbewoningsplicht kunnen opleggen bij aankoop. Voor gedetailleerde informatie hierover verwijzen wij u naar de betreffende gemeente.

Charming one bedroom  apartment  of 45  m2 with  a terrace garden of  13  m2, adjacent to a large  view  garden. An oasis of peace and greenery in  the city.   The Moerdijkstraat is a quiet and wide, typical 1930’s street. A beautiful little garden in front of the house has been laid out and at the rear you have your own terrace garden. The apartment has its own storage room on the ground floor of approximately 3 m2.  The apartment was renovated in 2020, with the electrical installation replaced and expanded, the floor insulated, all walls and ceilings plastered and the kitchen renewed.  The leasehold has been prepaid until 2063 and sellers have applied for the switch to perpetual leasehold on the most favourable conditions.  The house is located in the middle of Rivierenbuurt. Here you live wonderfully quiet and yet close to the pleasant shops and restaurants of the Maas and Rijnstraat. A bite to eat at D&A hummus bistro or De Nada, or on the terrace at Tap Zuid? For your daily shopping you can walk to the butcher, bakery, greengrocer and the various supermarkets in a few minutes. There are several gyms in the area and the Amstel, the Martin Luther Kingpark (known from 'De Parade'), the Amstelpark and the Beatrixpark are also nearby.  The location in relation to Zuidas, De Pijp and Schiphol is very favourable and various trams, metros and buses stop nearby. The Amstel, RAI and Zuid/South train stations are a few minutes by bike, as is the North/South line metro station Europaplein.   This location is also ideal by car: both the A10 and A2 highways are quickly accessible. You can almost always park in front and there is currently no waiting list for a parking permit.  Layout Entrance on the ground floor, hall with meter cupboard and toilet. At the front is the living room with beautiful windows, which let in a lot of light. The living room is spacious enough for a spacious sitting area and large dining table. The living room has a practical built-in wardrobe.  The main bedroom is located at the wonderfully quiet rear. There is enough space here for a double bed, cupboard wall and a home office. You can walk straight into the garden from the bedroom. The bathroom with shower is adjacent to the hall.  The kitchen is one of the big plusses of the apartment. The kitchen is spacious and has patio doors to the garden. The kitchen was renovated in 2020 and is equipped with plenty of cupboard space and luxury appliances (boiling water tap, dishwasher, extractor hood, induction hob, fridge freezer and combi microwave oven).  The garden is a wonderful place to relax with sun in the winter until about 1 pm and in the summer even until about 2 pm. The terrace garden is adjacent to the enormous view garden, which is maintained by a gardener at the expense of the HOA, but which is not used by residents. Wonderfully quiet. Sellers will miss the garden the most about the apartment. They had a wonderful time here and spent evenings barbecuing with family and friends. Throughout the year, the owner has beautiful plants here and his own urban vegetable garden.  In general: - Nice apartment with lovely terrace garden and separate storage room - Moerdijkstraat is a charming, quiet street with wide sidewalks - Excellent accessibility by public transport and car - Living area 44.8 m2, terrace garden area 13 m2, storage room 2.6 m2 - Asking price € 375,000, costs for the buyer - Floor insulation and double glazing - Renovated in 2020: new meter cupboard, extra groups of electricity, central heating pipes, stucco and kitchen - Low energy costs: current owner pays € 74 for gas and € 25 per month for electricity - CV Intergas Kombi Kompakt HRE, built in 2008, serviced in November 2022 - Prepaid leasehold canon until 31-07-2063 - The seller has applied for a continuous leasehold under the favourable conditions - Offer annual leasehold payment after 30-07-2063: € 782.03 (price level 2022) - Monthly service costs € 135,-- - Large, professionally managed HOA with sustainable Future Maintenance Plan and substantial financial reserve - Transfer flexible, possible in Q1 2023  Please schedule a viewing appointment with our office. We will be happy to show you around.  The property has been measured according to NVN Measurement Guidelines. These guidelines do not exclude the possibility of differences in measurements due to, for example, differences in interpretation, rounding or limitations when making the measurements.
