We hebben weer  een  heerlijk licht  voormalig 4-kamerappartement  met balkon op het  zuiden  op een centrale locatie in  Amsterdam  in de verkoop gekregen! Dit 2-/3-kamer appartement, gelegen  op de  5e verdieping, is met wat aanpassingen, een afwerking naar wens en jouw creatieve inbreng om te toveren tot een fijne thuishaven.  Maak jij die ontdekkingstocht door een wereld vol interieurideeën? Mogelijkheden en ruimte genoeg om jouw woonwensen tot leven te brengen!  Enthousiast geworden? Plan een bezichtiging in en kom dit leuke appartement met eigen ogen bekijken!  Indeling  Begane grond Je komt het appartementencomplex binnen in de centrale hal met de videofoon, de brievenbussen, het trappenhuis en de lift. Ook beschik je over een eigen berging in de onderbouw.   Vijfde verdieping Met de lift bereik je de vijfde verdieping. Je komt het appartement binnen in het voorportaal met meterkast en toegang tot de hal voorzien van handige opbergruimtes en toegang tot de diverse vertrekken.  De ruime woonkamer met aansluitend de zij-/eetkamer is heerlijk licht dankzij de grote ramen op het zuiden. Vanuit de zij-/eetkamer stap je zo het zonnige balkon op, waar je volop kunt genieten van het mooie weer. Indien gewenst is de zij-/eetkamer natuurlijk ook als slaapkamer in gebruik te nemen; het is maar net waar je behoefte aan hebt!  Grenzend aan de zij-/eetkamer bevindt zich de retro badkamer voorzien van wastafel en ligbad met douchemogelijkheid. Het toilet met fontein is een aparte ruimte, gelegen in de hal.  Ook de dichte keukenruimte is aangenaam licht. Naast een royaal doch verouderd keukenblok in hoekopstelling, bevindt zich hier ook nog een geiser van inmiddels 40 jaar oud. Een keuken in een opstelling, kleur en met de apparatuur die jij wenst, zal hier zeker niet misstaan!  Omgeving De woning is gelegen in de directe omgeving van het Rembrandtpark en de Sloterplas. Onder het appartement zijn er verschillende supermarkten en winkels gevestigd. Zo is er een Albert Heijn, Kruidvat, Lidl, apotheek, verschillende Turkse en Marokkaanse supermarkten, een schoenen- en sleutelmaker, verschillende restaurants, kapper en nog veel meer.  Je bent met een paar haltes in Amsterdam Sloterdijk en ook Lelylaan ligt op 10 minuten lopen. Met een paar minuten ben je op de Ring A10 en er is ruime parkeergelegenheid voor de deur. Iets verder zijn de Kinkerstraat en de Overtoom te vinden met haar diversiteit aan winkels en zijn de Jordaan en het centrum met 15/20 minuten fietsafstand te bereiken. In de directe omgeving ligt het OLVG West ziekenhuis.  Bijzonderheden: - Servicekosten €220 inclusief stookkosten van €30,-. - Erfpacht bedraagt €137,- euro per jaar tot 31-08-2034 - Berging in onderbouw - De woning heeft een definitief energielabel, te weten D. Dit verloopt op 05-12-2032.

UNIEK OBJECT MET  PRIVE  LIFTOPGANG!  Op een  unieke plek met zicht  over  het onlangs vernieuwde Waterlooplein met  haar  gezellige terrassen en de markt, bieden wij dit  luxueuze appartement  aan gelegen op de tweede verdieping met privé liftopgang.  In 2005 is appartementencomplex ‘Wellington’ ontwikkeld onder begeleiding van architectenbureau Groenendaal, bestaande uit een commerciële plint, vier luxe appartementen en een penthouse op eigen grond.  Bij binnenkomst in de royale en gemeenschappelijke hal bereikt men direct de lift naar de woningen. Via een gepersonaliseerd sleutelsysteem krijgt men toegang tot de woning op de tweede verdieping.   Vanuit de lift kom je direct in de hal van de woning met toegang tot een ruime garderobe met bergruimte (badkamer in potentie) en de brede gang waarin alle ruimtes bereikbaar zijn. Het appartement heeft twee ruime slaapkamers, een ruime badkamer, separaat toilet en een woonkamer over de volledige breedte van het pand. In de woning zijn daarnaast verschillende inbouwkasten ten behoeve van o.a. een wasmachine / wasdroger.  De kinderkamer aan de achterzijde is voorzien van grote kasten, rolluiken en heeft openslaande deuren naar het balkon. De naastgelegen master bedroom is voorzien van een ruime inloopkast, dubbele openslaande deuren naar het balkon en rolluiken (deels elektrisch welke vernieuwd in 2022). Het balkon met een breedte van ca. 6 meter biedt ruimte voor een gezellige barbecue of een ontspan moment van serene rust.    Tussen de slaapkamers aan de achterzijde en de woonkamer aan de voorzijde is een riante badkamer voorzien van een ruime douche, dubbele wasbakken en ligbad met bordes.   De brede gang komt uit in de ruime woonkamer met weids uitzicht over het Waterlooplein. De woonkamer is gesitueerd over de gehele breedte en biedt daarmee het typische ‘Amsterdamse’ gevoel door de hoeveelheid ramen en lichtinval. De keuken is in 2016 vernieuwd en voorzien van keukenwand met luxueuze inbouwapparatuur (inbouw koelkast, inbouw vriezer, grote oven). Het aanrecht is uitgevoerd in Belgisch hardsteen, vier-pits gasfornuis, afzuigkap, Quooker en luxe mengkraan.   De woning beschikt daarnaast over een beveiligingssysteem en video intercom installatie (vernieuwd in 2022). Voorts is er sprake van een professionele, actieve en financieel gezonde en kleine VvE.  Het object is centraal gelegen aan het bekende Waterlooplein. Met Carré, Utrechtsestraat, Artis en diverse stadse voorzieningen op loopafstand. Voor een wandeling of run is de Amstel nabij.   Parallel aan het Waterlooplein ligt de Jodenbreestraat voor alle dagelijkse boodschappen, zoals de Albert Heijn, Jumbo en de Etos. Op loopafstand zijn verschillende winkels, markten, leuke cafés, goede restaurants en cultuurgelegenheden.  Het Centraal Station bevindt zich op loopafstand, net zoals metrostation Waterlooplein en Nieuwmarkt. Met de auto bent u zo op de A10 via de IJtunnel (Noord) of Piet Heintunnel (Oost).  Middels een parkeervergunning wordt parkeergelegenheid aangeboden in de parkeergarage ‘Waterlooplein’.  De kenmerken nog één keer op een rijtje: •	Eigen grond •	Eigen lift •	Energielabel A •	Twee slaapkamers •	Ruim balkon •	Gezonde en actieve VvE •	Potentie tot verhuur  --ENGLISH –  UNIQUE APARTMENT WITH PRIVATE ELEVATOR!  We offer this lovely apartment on the second floor with private elevator access in a unique location overlooking the extremely famous and freshly rebuilt Waterlooplein with its pleasant terraces and markets.  Under the direction of architecture company Groenendaal, the apartment complex 'Wellington' was created in 2005, consisting of a commercial plinth, four luxury flats, and a penthouse on fully owned land.  Upon entering the spacious and communal hallway, one reaches the elevator directly to the apartments. A personalised key system allows access to the second-floor flat.  All rooms are accessible by a broad corridor from the hall, which leads to a huge storage room (possible bathroom) with cloakroom. The flat offers two large bedrooms, a large bathroom, a separate toilet, and a living area that spans the whole width of the property. The apartment also features several built-in cupboards to hold a washing machine/dryer and other utilities.  The children's bedroom in the back includes spacious wardrobes, shutters, and French doors to the balcony. The next master bedroom features a large walk-in closet, double doors leading to the balcony, and shutters (partly electric which renewed in 2022). The balcony's width of roughly 6 metres allows for a comfortable BBQ.   The bathroom is located between the bedrooms in the back and the living room. The spacious bathroom has a large shower, two sinks, and a bathtub with a platform.  The large hallway leads into the spacious living room, which has expansive views of Waterlooplein. The living area spans the whole width of the apartment, providing a classic 'Amsterdam' impression due to the abundance of windows and light. The kitchen was renovated in 2016 and has a kitchen wall with luxury built-in appliances (built-in fridge, built-in freezer, large oven). The countertop has a Belgian top with a built-in dishwasher, a four-burner gas cooker, an extractor hood, a Quooker, and a luxury faucet.  The property includes a security system and a video intercom installation (renewed in 2022). Furthermore, there is a professional, active, financially viable, and small association/VVE.  The object is located near the Jodenbuurt next to Waterlooplein. Facilities like The Stopera, Nieuwmarkt, Artis, and Hortus within walking distance. For a walk or run, the Amstel River is nearby.    Parallel to Waterlooplein is Jodenbreestraat for all your daily shopping needs, such as Albert Heijn, Jumbo and Etos. Within walking distance are various shops, markets, nice cafés, good restaurants, and cultural venues.  Amsterdam Central Station is within walking distance, as are metro station Waterlooplein and Nieuwmarkt. By car, you can reach the A10 via the IJtunnel (North) or Piet Hein tunnel (East) in no time.  Parking is offered in the 'Waterlooplein' car park by means of a parking permit.  So, the characteristics of this luxurious apartment one more time: - Fully owned land - Private lift - Energy label A - Two bedrooms - Spacious balcony - Healthy and active owners' association/VVE - Rental potential

***This property is  listed  by a  MVA Certified  Expat Broker***  Luxurious,  spacious  and central living in this  attractive  and fully renovated double upstairs apartment  of 118  m2 in a prime location. Spectacular unobstructed view on the street side over the Ringvaart towards the redeveloped, historic part of the former Oostergasterrein, the current bustling Oostpoort.  At the rear with a spacious balcony on both floors to enjoy the sun, the living room is wide enough to accommodate a dining table. There is a possibility to build a roof terrace where the neighbors have also realized a roof structure. The facade is characteristic with a number of Jugendstil-like elements.  The house is perfectly located in the heart of the Watergraafsmeer with many nice restaurants, coffee shops, boutiques and shops a stone's throw away, good schools, nurseries, parks and playgrounds.  The Linnaeuskade has recently been converted into a low-traffic bicycle street with sufficient parking space. The green strip and the walking path will be embellished in the short term, making it the ideal place for summer picnics opposite the house.  The house was completely renovated in 2014, with the foundation also renewed and is characterized by the high ceilings, three balconies, the oak wooden floors with underfloor heating and a private entrance. The flat roof offers possibilities for a roof terrace.   Layout:  Ground floor: Own front door, hallway and stairs to the first floor with space for parking a pram and hanging a racing bike.   First floor:  Landing with toilet, storage / meter cupboard, authentic covered balcony on the street side with storage space on the balcony. The spacious and bright "doorzon" living room has the cozy kitchen diner at the quiet rear with double doors to the house-wide and deep balcony on the South-Southeast. Due to its location in relation to the other houses at the rear and the greenery, there is a lot of privacy on the balcony. The modern and luxurious kitchen was renovated 3 years ago with a cooking island with composite top, a Bora induction plate, two ovens with central extraction and all necessary built-in appliances. The entire floor has a herringbone oak parquet floor with underfloor heating.   Second floor:  Landing with skylight above the stairwell, two storage cupboards for washing machine and dryer and with central heating system, attractive house-wide bedroom on the street side with dormer window, central luxury bathroom with double sink and spacious walk-in shower and skylight that can be opened. At the rear the master bedroom with fitted wardrobes and patio doors to the balcony and also a 3rd bright bedroom also with access to the balcony. There is also a 2nd toilet on this floor, separate from the bathroom.  This floor also has a parquet floor with underfloor heating.  Environment: The house has a perfect location on the border of the more urban part of Amsterdam East and the Watergraafsmeer with its village character. On the other side of the Ringvaart you will find Oostpoort (easily accessible via the characteristic bridge) with a very diverse and complete range of shops, but also, on the other side, cozy restaurants such as coffee and wine bar Blend, Nomads, brewery Poesiat & Kater and grand-café Eighty Four. Also nearby are the Middenweg and Linnaeusstraat with a wide range of shops and restaurants, but also, for example, the Manor hotel in the former Burgerziekenhuis and many niche shops such as the Marqt. What about catering establishments you can indulge yourself in; cafes with a terrace such as the Biertuin and Tapperij De Eeuwige Jeugd, a snack at Five Brothers Fat or Louie Louie, but also a serious lunch at restaurant "Merkelbach" or an evening of dining at "de Kas", all within walking distance. What's more sporty? Swimming in the old Sports Funds Pool or exercising at Trainmore, but also outside in the three nearby parks; the Oosterpark, Flevopark, Park Frankendael (with “Pure Markt” every last Sunday of the month) you can enjoy jogging; tennis and football fields are within cycling distance. You can of course have your groceries delivered, but all the different supermarkets are also within walking distance (Marqt, Ecoplaze, AH, Jumbo, Dirk, Vomar, Sahan).   Accessibility:  The house is very conveniently located in relation to roads, public transport (trams, buses and Muiderpoort station within walking distance), the center and the Pijp. You can reach the A10 ring road in 5 minutes by car. And by bike you are in the center in 10 minutes.   WALKING AROUND VIRTUALLY IN 3D? VIEW THE PROPERTY PRESENTATION ON OUR WEBSITE.  The button [3D View] on our website gives access to a virtual tour in 3D.  The tour shows you walking from one room to another, as if you were in the house and walking through it yourself.   Features:  * Living area 118 m2 (NEN 2580 measurement report available)  * Three bedrooms, three balconies  * Located on private land  * Built in 1902 * Renovated in 2014 with foundation repair  * Central heating combi boiler from 2014, roof insulation  * Oak floorboards with underfloor heating  * Wooden frames/windows with double glazing (HR++)  * Contribution VVE (2 members) € 160,- p./month.  * Buyer's choice of notary; Ring model Amsterdam   This project information has been compiled with the utmost care. However, no liability is accepted for any incompleteness, inaccuracies or otherwise, or the consequences thereof.  All specified sizes and surfaces are indicative. The buyer has his own obligation to investigate all matters that are important to him or her. With regard to this property, the broker is an advisor to the seller. The NVM conditions apply.   ***This property is listed by a MVA Certified Expat Broker.***

Spacious and light  4-room  apartment (living  area 89  m²) with many windows  and  a view of greenery. The  balcony  is south facing and overlooks the Eendrachtspark. Entrance  through the  central hall (with meter cupboard) to the house on the first floor. Upon entering the bright apartment, the spacious hall provides access to various rooms, being the living room, the toilet, the three bedrooms and the bathroom. In the hall there are two storage cupboards, including the cupboard with central heating, MV and washing machine connection. The spacious living room offers a beautiful view of greenery through the large windows and is partly extra light due to its location on the south. The space is easy to divide with a sitting area and a dining/working area. The partly open kitchen is accessible from the living room. The creamy white kitchen in a U-shaped arrangement is equipped with various built-in appliances and a lot of counter top. The apartment is divided into three good bedrooms, including a large (parent) bedroom. The spacious bathroom is equipped with a bath with glass shower wall (with the option of showering in the bath) and a wooden, freestanding washbasin with washbasin. The sunny balcony of approximately 6 m² is accessible from the kitchen. The balcony is quietly located, overlooks greenery and the Eendrachtspark, and has a sunny south-facing location. The balcony offers a lot of privacy. In the basement there is a spacious (bicycle) storage room of approximately 9 m², equipped with electricity. The entire apartment has a laminate floor and the walls are painted. The ceilings are finished with spraying. Good possibility (paid) to park in the adjacent parking lot. Active VvE with MJOP. Leasehold bought off in perpetuity. Energy label A.  Location: You really have everything within reach at this location: the Eendrachtspark with recreational opportunities, playground, tennis court and paddling pool. And several larger playgrounds in the immediate vicinity, shops, coffee shops, restaurants and a primary school. Tram, train and bus station also within walking or cycling distance. Quick access to Haarlemmerweg and Ring A10, among others. Good possibility of paid parking in the large parking lot near the apartment complex.  Details:  Year of construction The house was built around 1994.  Contents/Living area/Plot area The total content is approximately 276 m³, the living area is approximately 89 m²; outdoor space approximately 6 m² (balcony); the external storage space is approximately 9 m². A measurement report has been carried out by an external agency, in accordance with the industry-wide measurement instructions based on NEN2580.  Movable property In accordance with the list, available on request from our office.  Owners Association The house is part of a healthy, active and professionally managed VvE. The management of the VVE 'Parkzicht' is carried out by Amsterdam VVE Beheer. The service costs are € 105.40 per month. The documents of the VVE can be requested through our office, including MJOP. The VVE has internal regulations. Chamber of Commerce 34348885.  Annual lease payments The property is located on leasehold land (perpetual leasehold) of the municipality of Amsterdam, conditions 2016. The leasehold canon has been bought off in perpetuity.  Environment The seller and the North Sea Canal Area Environment Agency are not aware of any oil tank or any harmful soil contamination.  Maintenance & Heating/ Hot water & Electricity The house is well maintained on the inside and outside. The meter cupboard is equipped with sufficient groups for current use, a cooking group and two earth leakage switches. The house is heated and supplied with water by means of an HR combi boiler (Intergas HRE) from 2018. The boiler is maintained annually. The house is equipped with mechanical ventilation.  Parking Paid parking is available near the complex (on the public road). Applying for a parking permit is also possible.  Cadastral data Gemeente Sloten (NH), section I, number 3018 A-47, constituting the 91/8,137th undivided share in the community.  Energy label The house has a final energy label A, end date 10-10-2032.  Right of award The seller reserves the right of award.  Delivery Immediately.  General Terms and Conditions Our General Terms and Conditions apply to our sales procedure, which can be requested from our office. We would also like to draw your attention to the fact that the deed of sale must be signed at the civil-law notary approximately 1 week after an oral agreement. An oral agreement between the private seller and the private buyer is not legally valid. In other words, there is no sale. There is only a legally valid purchase agreement if the private seller and the private buyer have signed the purchase agreement. A NEN measurement clause will be included in the purchase deed. The wording of these clauses can be obtained from our office.

Op één van  de  mooiste stukken  van de  Ruysdaelkade ligt dit charmante  en  lichte dubbel bovenhuis van circa  112  m². De woning is gelegen op  de  derde  en deels vierde  etage en vanuit de woonkamer is er een waanzinnig uitzicht over water en het Rijksmuseum. Het appartement heeft een plafondhoogte van 3,15 meter, een woonkamer met open keuken, twee balkons, een werkkamer, drie slaapkamers en twee badkamers.  Nieuwsgierig geworden? Ervaar de volledige woonbeleving op onze BRSM website of download onze brochure.  Het dubbel bovenhuis geniet veel lichtinval door haar vrije voor- en achteruitzicht. Gemeenschappelijke entree vanaf de straat met trapopgang naar de derde verdieping. Aan de voorzijde is de woonkamer gesitueerd met aansluitend de werkkamer, welke op dit moment wordt gebruikt als speelkamer. Vanuit hier is er fraai zicht op het Rijksmuseum. Aan deze zijde is ook een zonnig balkon, gelegen op het westen met avondzon.  De moderne open keuken aan de achterzijde is voorzien van diverse inbouwapparatuur en heeft door de open verbinding een centrale plek in het huis. De keuken heeft twee keer een wandopstelling met aan de ene kant het spoelen en aan de andere kant het koken. Voorts is er een eiland met aan de kamerzijde een bar. De keuken heeft met openslaande deuren toegang tot het balkon aan de achterzijde. Het balkon aan de achterzijde is de perfecte plek voor een kopje koffie of ontbijt in de ochtendzon.  Naast de keuken is een (gasten-)slaapkamer met naastgelegen badkamer, voorzien van douche en toilet.  Op de bovenste verdieping zijn twee slaapkamers en een moderne badkamer voorzien van ligbad, douche, wastafelmeubel met twee lades en een tweede toilet.  De buitenruimte De woning beschikt over twee balkons. Eén grenzend aan de woonkamer aan de voorzijde met prachtig uitzicht over het Rijksmuseum. Dit balkon is gelegen op het westen en heeft in de middag en avond zon. Het balkon aan de achterzijde is toegankelijk vanuit de keuken via openslaande deuren. Dit balkon is gelegen op het oosten en heeft in de ochtend zon..   Het gebouw  Het huis is gebouwd in 1903 door architectenbureau Baanders als een heel bouwblok vanaf nr. 31 tot en met 41 bestaande uit vijf dubbele benedenhuizen en tien bovenhuizen met zolderverdieping. Ooit gebouwd als huurwoningen, maar in de loop van de tijd verworven door particuliere eigenaren.  De omgeving  Het bovenhuis ligt aan de rand van de gezellige en levendige Oude Pijp, aan de prachtige Ruysdaelkade. Een centrale ligging ten opzichte van het Museumplein, de Pijp, de van Baerlestraat en op loopafstand van het Vondelpark. De omgeving kenmerkt zich door een goede mix van woonhuizen, appartementen, winkels, horeca en kantoren.  Er zijn veel gezellige horecagelegenheden en vooraanstaande delicatessenwinkels. Op de Van Baerlestraat, Beethovenstraat en de PC Hooftstraat zijn onder andere luxe mode winkels, bloemist, kwaliteit slagerij, stomerij, juwelier, brillenzaak en biologische bakkerij etc. te vinden.  Bereikbaarheid Het appartement is gunstig gelegen ten opzichte van het Sarphatipark of Vondelpark en dichtbij de Zuidas. Goed bereikbaar met het openbaar vervoer via Centraal Station, Station WTC en meerdere tramhalten op de Van Baerlestraat, Beethovenstraat en De Lairessestraat.  De bijzonderheden  •    Gebruiksoppervlakte wonen ca. 112 m² •    Twee balkons •    Uitzicht op het Rijksmuseum •    Gelegen op eigen grond •    Energielabel D •    Rijksbeschermd stadsgezicht •    Servicekosten VvE € 127,-- per maand  Wat we gaan missen "Sinds enige tijd kunnen alle bewoners onder de gracht parkeren en dat maakt de buurt groen en erg kindvriendelijk. We hebben het huis over de jaren aangepast en gemoderniseerd. De keuken is nu deel van de woonkamer en het middelpunt van ons huis. En dit heeft ook een extra kamer voor studie, werk of gasten gecreëerd."  Deze informatie is door ons met de nodige zorgvuldigheid samengesteld. Onzerzijds wordt echter geen enkele aansprakelijkheid aanvaard voor enige onvolledigheid, onjuistheid of anderszins, dan wel de gevolgen daarvan. Alle opgegeven maten en oppervlakten zijn slechts indicatief De Meetinstructie is gebaseerd op de NEN2580. De Meetinstructie is bedoeld om een meer eenduidige manier van meten toe te passen voor het geven van een indicatie van de gebruiksoppervlakte. De Meetinstructie sluit verschillen in meetuitkomsten niet volledig uit, door bijvoorbeeld interpretatieverschillen, afrondingen of beperkingen bij het uitvoeren van de meting

A charming apartment  with  a very  practical layout,  two good-sized bedrooms, spacious  living  room and roof terrace of  12m²  situated at an outstanding location in the Frederik  Hendrikbuurt area.   LAYOUT The first-floor apartment is reached via the communal staircase. Hall, with access to every room. The delightfully bright living room is at the front and comes with a French balcony and excellent views of Hugo de Grootplein. The open kitchen is fitted with a four-burner gas cooker, a dishwasher, oven, and a fridge with a freezer compartment. To the rear are the two good-sized bedrooms, both of which lead out to the large roof terrace (surface area of 12m²). The bathroom is in the central part of the apartment and features a walk-in shower, a sink unit, and a designer radiator. There is a separate toilet, accessible from the hall, next to which is a large space containing the central heating boiler and connections for a washing machine and dryer.   SURROUNDING AREA The property is within easy walking distance of the Jordaan, with its numerous friendly restaurants, bars, and other leisure venues. The city centre and Westerpark can also be reached by bike in a matter of minutes. For all your day-to-day shopping needs, there is a wide range of shops in the immediate vicinity. The apartment has excellent public transport connections, with various bus and tram stops located very nearby, and is also close to roads leading out of the city (the A10 Ring Road, and the S105).   OWNERS' ASSOCIATION The active and financially sound Owners' Association consists of five members and is professionally managed. The current service charges are € 105,96 a year.  LEASEHOLD The apartment is on municipal leasehold land, the ground rent for which is currently € 136,39 per year and runs until 30th of June 2025. If the so called "spijtoptantenregeling" is applicable then the ground rent will be after this period  € 1.082,- a year.  PARTICULARS - Floor surface area of 59m² (NEN 2580 measurement report); - Roof terrace of no less than 12m² (facing west); - French balcony at the front with views of Hugo de Grootplein; - Double glazing and lovely wooden parquet flooring throughout the apartment; - Transfer by agreement.

Very bright and  unique  split-level apartment  of approx.  104 m2 with energy  label  A and a fantastic roof  terrace  of approx. 27 m2 and spectacular,  unobstructed views of the city,  located on freehold land at the beautiful Weteringschans, between Utrechtsestraat and Vijzelstraat.  Via the private entrance on the 3rd floor, you’ll reach the living area on the 4th floor. The living room’s ceiling height of 4 meters, combined with the mezzanine, the view, and the original brick wall give the apartment an authentic character. The windows in both the living room and above the mezzanine let in an abundance of natural light, creating an open and spacious feeling. The mezzanine contains an electrically operated skylight with walkable glass.  Adjacent to the living room is the open kitchen with cooking island and bar, equipped with luxury appliances, including a 6-burner Boretti gas stove.  The master bedroom is located at the rear and boasts bespoke built-in closets, air conditioning, and ceilings that are just as high as in the living room. The adjacent bathroom is equipped with a bathtub, double sink with cabinet, and a shower.  A separate toilet and an additional storage room are located in the hallway.  The internal staircase leads up to the mezzanine (approx. 28 m2). Currently, this space is used as a lounge and study, but it is also very suitable as a second bedroom. From the lounge room, a staircase leads up to the beautiful, spacious roof terrace (27 m2). The roof terrace is situated higher than surrounding homes, and therefore offers an amazing view of – among others – the Rijksmuseum, Carré theatre, the Arena, and the A'DAM tower, but also provides plenty of privacy.  FEATURES •	Total residential surface of approx. 104 m2 (in accordance with NEN2580); •	Spacious and luxurious roof terrace (2020) of approx. 27.1 m2 (in accordance with NEN2580), including an outdoor kitchen and built-in closets; •	Air conditioning in both master bedroom and lounge room; •	Ceiling height of almost 4 meters; •	Open kitchen with luxury appliances including the brand Boretti; •	Energy label A; •	Active and financially healthy VVE (5 members), professionally managed; •	Located on freehold land, so no ground lease; •	Service costs VvE: € 267,51,- per month; •	Located in a prime location between the Vijzelstraat and the bustling Utrechtsestraat with many cafés, restaurants, and boutique stores. Just steps away from the famous Albert Cuyp market and the green Sarphatipark. Central Station can be reached in 10 minutes by bike, giving access to all public transport and other arterial roads.

A lovely sunny  house  on the  edge of  Ringvaart!  This spacious,  sunny  house in the Aker residential  area  is characterised by the attached conservatory  that borders  the garden facing south-west. Because of the sliding doors you can enjoy the summer here, but you can also come here in winter because of the heater. In this neighbourhood, car parking is free and you can leave your car here if you want to go into town, as the starting point of tram line 1 is a 3-minute walk away. For daily shopping, you can go to the Dukaat shopping centre. If you prefer peace and quiet, you can take a lovely walk or cycle along the Ringvaart canal.  Layout:  You enter the hall which provides access to the separate toilet and the spacious living room. The beautiful PVC fishbone floor was renewed in 2020. Thanks to the open kitchen, which was renovated in 2020, you can always stay in touch with your visitors. During the renovation, an adjustment was made in the meter cupboard for the use of an induction hob. Besides the induction hob, the kitchen has a dishwasher, combi-oven-microwave and fridge. Take a seat in the lovely conservatory which has a sliding door, heater, lighting and blinds. Besides the lovely conservatory, there is plenty of space in the garden, which is located on the southwest. Also in the garden is a detached shed whose roof and door were renewed in 2022.   1st floor: from the landing there is access to the 3 bedrooms and a bathroom which is equipped with a design radiator, double washbasin, toilet and a shower cabin.  2nd floor: on the second floor is another spacious attic/bedroom, which can be used for several purposes. Also here is the connection for the washing machine and dryer set-up. From this room there is access to the spacious and sunny roof terrace.  Property situation: The property is located on land, which is formally owned by the municipality of Amsterdam. The canon (the annual rent for this land) has been bought off until 30-11-2043. The 1966 General Provisions apply to this ground lease. The owners made a timely application to switch to perpetual ground lease, which enabled them to fix the ground lease at €876.34. For more information, visit the website of the municipality of Amsterdam.  Surroundings:  This property is located in the residential area 'the Aker' with its many green areas, playgrounds and water. The property is located in a quiet street of the residential area. The street is mainly used by local traffic. The area is also characterised by its central location in relation to Badhoevedorp and the old village of Sloten, Haarlem, Hoofddorp and Schiphol. The A4, A9 and A10 motorways are only a few minutes away. There is no lack of public transport here either. Besides several bus lines, tram line 1 offers a direct connection to the centre of Amsterdam, which can be reached in less than 30 minutes. Within walking distance also a diversity of shops (shopping centre 'Dukaat').   Details: - Built in 1994 - Living area: 106 m2 - Energy label B - Equipped with shutters - Conservatory including lighting, heater and blinds  - Garden and roof terrace on the southwest - Roof of house and storage recently renewed (2022) - Kitchen renovated in 2020  - Almost entirely fitted with PVC window frames with HR++ glass  - All windows fitted with mosquito nets - Fibre optic connection in the meter cupboard - New mechanical ventilation 2020  - Interior of central heating renewed in 2021 and expansion vessel renewed in December 2022 - Delivery in consultation  The non-binding information shown on this website has been compiled by us (with care) on the basis of information provided by the seller (and/or third parties). We do not guarantee its accuracy or completeness. We advise you to contact us if you are interested in one of our properties or to have yourself assisted by your own NVM estate agent.

COME SEE THIS!  This  recently renovated,  almost 80  m2 ground floor apartment  (on  freehold land) at the Paardekraalstraat  is  really one you mustn’t miss. A  stylish living space, 2 bedrooms,  large garden and a luxurious kitchen and bathroom, a ceiling height of over 3m and fitted with oak herringbone parquet with floor heating.  Nice location with history The location in the popular Transvaalbuurt in Amsterdam East is beautiful. Characteristic is, for example, the stylish 19th century and early 20th century buildings, which can mainly be found here. Around the corner are the Oosterpark city park and Park Frankendael, with restaurant De Kas and 1x p/m Pure Markt, the organic food market. Next to the park you can enjoy a lovely walk along the Ringdijk, where you will find De Vergulden Eenhoorn, a city farm from 1702 surrounded by greenery, with a restaurant and terrace. Within walking distance is the Oostpoort shopping center with Albert Heijn, Jumbo, Rituals, Douglas, Hema, H&M and the TrainMore sports club and various restaurants (including Nomads and Bagels & Beans). There is plenty of culture and fun to be found here! The accessibility is also excellent: tram line 19 leads you through half the city, the center is only 10 minutes away by bike. Amstel train and metro station, as well as Muiderpoort train station are within walking distance.  The house The apartment was completely renovated in 2020 and finished to a high standard. Authentic details such as the panel doors, window frames with rod division (with double glazing!) and the high ceilings are interspersed with modern shades and sustainable materials. The beautiful oak parquet floor in herringbone pattern is fitted throughout the apartment and has underfloor heating. A cozy living room with en-suite luxury kitchen, equipped with a cooking island with bar and a luxurious Bora induction hob, with reverse extraction system. The spacious hall with steel-glass look connecting door provides access to a separate toilet, handy storage room, a guest / bedroom / office and the master bedroom on the garden side. It offers space for a king size bed with enough cupboard space. The en-suite bathroom has a natural color scheme, with beautifully contrasting matte black taps. A washbasin with double sink, walk-in shower and a designer towel radiator complete the picture. Through the kitchen doors access to the garden of approx. 45 m2, with a hardwood deck terrace and large terrace tiles, so hardly maintenance needed. A handy storage space for garden equipment has also been considered.  Details: •	Approx. 79 m2 living space in accordance with measurement instruction NEN2580 •	Freehold land (no leasehold!) •	Spacious, beautifully landscaped garden with lovely terrace facing northeast •	Completely renovated in 2020 with stylish finishes such as a steel-glass look door in the entrance hall, recessed spotlights and wall decoration. •	Luxurious kitchen with all built-in appliances, including a washing machine, dishwasher and a Bora extractor. •	Underfloor heating throughout the apartment •	Equipped with insulating glass, energy label C •	Small VVE consisting of 4 members, under own management. Painting was done in 2020. •	Service costs 46 euro per month •	Nice neighborhood where everything can be found •	Delivery in consultation

*English description below*   Geweldig, energiezuinig  appartement met  twee slaapkamers én grote  daktuin  in de Houthavens!!!  Dit  luxe  appartement heeft het allemaal; het is  vrijwel  nieuw, ligt in een  waanzinnig leuke buurt, is energiezuinig (label A) en klaar om gelijk te bewonen! De uitstraling van het appartement is fris en strak. Het heeft de beschikking over een ruime woonkamer met open keuken met eiland en door de hoekligging is het door een extra raam heerlijk licht. Verder zijn er 2 slaapkamers, waarvan één met toegang tot de daktuin. Verder is er een ruime berging/wasruimte met voldoende opslagcapaciteit. De badkamer heeft een ligbad en inloopdouche met zowel een regen- als handdouche. Uiteraard is het appartement volledig voorzien van efficiënt werkende vloerverwarming en koeling; comfortabel en energiezuinig. Voor de energievoorziening is het appartement ook nog aangesloten op 6 zonnepanelen.   Vanaf de woonkamer en slaapkamer heeft u toegang tot de ruime daktuin. Hier kunt u verschillende hoeken creëren om heerlijk te ontspannen. De daktuin loopt naadloos over in de mooi aangelegde binnentuin. Dit geeft het hele jaar een prachtig uitzicht én voelt als een oase in de bruisende stad. Het appartement ligt op de eerste verdieping maar voelt als een begane grond appartement. Daardoor heeft u de voordelen van privacy én toch het comfort van het hebben van een tuin.  Kortom, een prachtige combinatie van luxe, comfort en duurzaamheid in wereldstad Amsterdam!  OMGEVING In de houthavens is de afgelopen jaren een geweldig, nieuwe woonomgeving ontwikkeld. Wonen en water wisselen zich hier op een speelse manier af. Moderne bouw met invloeden van weleer. Alles uiteraard duurzaam uitgevoerd en dat vlakbij het weidse water van het IJ. Daar is het heerlijk vertoeven in lente, zomer en najaar! In de buurt vindt u winkels, lunchtentjes, kroegen en ook een kinderdagverblijf, een speeltuin, een apotheek en scholen. Ook de oude stad ligt letterlijk om de hoek; de Spaarndammerstraat, het Westerpark (12 minuten lopen) en daarachter de gezelligheid van de Jordaan. Restaurants, verassende winkels en cultuur vindt u hier volop en dichtbij!  Via het openbaar vervoer is alles snel bereikbaar. Er zijn bussen, NS station Centraal en Sloterdijk en de pont naar de NDSM-werf. Met uw auto bent u ook snel op de snelweg naar de rest van Nederland.  INDELING Begane grond: bellentableau met videofoon en brievenbus, entree, hal, LIFT of trap naar..... 1e verdieping: ruim portaal, entree van het appartement, garderobe, toilet met fontein, woonkamer met schuifpui naar dakterras, keuken v.v. 4-pits-inductiekookplaat, afzuigkap (ATAG), ijskast, vriezer, combi oven/magnetron (ATAG) en afwasmachine, gang, slaapkamer 1, slaapkamer 2 met openslaande deuren naar de daktuin, badkamer voorzien van dubbele wasbak en meubel, ligbad, inloopdouche met hand- en regendouche en vloerverwarming. Souterrain: privé-berging voor opslag en het stallen van de fiets, daarbij is er nog een gedeelde fietsenstalling.  HIGHLIGHTS en KENMERKEN -G- Woonoppervlakte ca. 72,3m2; -G- Daktuin van ca. 39m2; -G- Externe berging van ca. 5m2; -G- Energielabel A; -G- Prachtig zicht op de mooi aangelegde binnentuin; -G- Opgeleverd in 2018, turn-key; -G- Appartement is te bereiken met de LIFT; -G- Vloerverwarming en koeling; -G- 6 zonnepanelen; -G- Glasvezel internet is beschikbaar; -G- Gedeelde fietsenstalling; -G- Mogelijkheid tot het huren van een parkeerplaats; -G- Vlakbij Westerpark en de oude binnenstad; -G- Erfpacht (eeuwigdurend): €1.097,- per jaar (tot 15-03-2041); -G- VvE-bijdrage €117,34 per maand; -G- Oplevering in overleg.  *English*  Stunning, energy-efficient apartment with two bedrooms and a large roof garden in the Houthavens area!!!  This luxury apartment has it all; it is almost new, is located in an incredibly nice neighborhood, is energy efficient (label A) and turn-key! The apartment is very neat. It has a spacious living room with open kitchen and island and thanks to the corner position there's an extra window making it a light space. There are 2 bedrooms, one of which has access to the roof garden. There is also a spacious storage/laundry room with sufficient storage capacity. The bathroom has a bath and walk-in shower. The apartment is fully equipped with efficient underfloor heating and cooling, making it super comfortable. The apartment is also connected to 6 solar panels. The output is for personal use.  From the living room and bedroom you have access to the spacious roof garden. The roof garden flows seamlessly into the beautifully landscaped inner courtyard and feels like an oasis in the bustling city. The apartment is on the first floor but feels like a ground floor apartment. This gives you the advantages of privacy and yet the comfort of having a garden.  In short, a wonderful combination of luxury, comfort and sustainability in the great city of Amsterdam!  AREA A fantastic new living environment has been developed in the Houthavens in recent years. Modern architecture is mixed with newly created canals. In the neighborhood you will find shops, lunch places, pubs and also a nursery, a playground, a pharmacy, daycare and schools. The old town is also around the corner; the Spaarndammerstraat, the Westerpark (12 minutes' walk) and beyond that the cosiness of the Jordaan. Restaurants, surprising shops and culture can be found here in abundance and close by!  Through public transport you have easy access to the rest of the city. Nearby you will find buses, Central and Sloterdijk train station and the ferry to the NDSM wharf. The highway to the rest of the Netherlands is also nearby.  LAYOUT Ground floor: doorbells with videophone and mailbox, entrance, hall, LIFT or stairs to ..... 1st floor: spacious portal, entrance of the apartment, coat rack, toilet with sink, living room with sliding doors to roof terrace, kitchen with 4-burner induction hob, extractor hood (ATAG), refrigerator, freezer, combi oven/microwave (ATAG) and dishwasher, hallway, bedroom 1, bedroom 2 with patio doors to the roof garden, bathroom with double sink and cabinet, bath, walk-in shower with hand and rain shower and underfloor heating. Basement: private storage room for storage and parking of the bicycle, there is also a shared bicycle parking space.  HIGHLIGHTS and FEATURES -G- Living area approx. 72.3m2; -G- Roof garden of approx. 39m2; -G- External storage room of approx. 5m2; -G- Energy label A; -G- Beautiful view on the landscaped courtyard; -G- Built in 2018, turnkey; -G- Apartment can be reached by LIFT; -G- Floor heating and cooling; -G- 6 solar panels; -G- Fiber optic internet is available; -G- Shared bicycle space; -G- Possibility to rent a parking space; -G- Close to Westerpark and the old town; -G- Leasehold (perpetual): €1.097 per year (until 15-03-2041); -G- VvE contribution of €117,34 per month; -G- Transfer date to be discussed.

Enjoy peaceful living  in  a green  environment in  Gein. Just outside the  ring  road, a stone's throw from  the  Gaasperpark recreation area, many amenities within  walking distance  and all major exit roads around Amsterdam and public transport in the immediate vicinity.  This very conveniently located 74m2 apartment is situated on the ground floor of an apartment complex. The walls and ceilings have just been repainted. A very popular apartment, not only because of its green location, but also because of the presence of a garden at the front and a spacious garden at the back of the house.  LAYOUT:  Located on the Voorthuizenstraat is this bright ground floor apartment. You enter the apartment through your own private entrance, where the meter cupboard is also located. From the entrance you have access to the spacious living room with windows on both the front and side of the building.  Accessible from the living room you walk into the semi-open kitchen that is equipped with a dishwasher, an induction stove and an oven. Through the living room you also enter a hallway that gives access to the spacious bathroom with shower and sink. Here you will also find a connection for the washing machine. Next to the bathroom is a separate toilet with a small fountain. Opposite the toilet and bathroom is a spacious, internal storage room.  At the back of the apartment you will find the spacious bedroom with plenty of daylight and access to the garden where it is lovely spending your time off on warm days. It’s possible to split this bedroom into 2 separate bedrooms. The front garden has evening sun. **ENGLISH BELOW**  Zie  jij jezelf  graag wonen  in een heerlijk licht,  modern  en ruim opgezet appartement waarvan  de  erfpacht EEUWIGDUREND is AFGEKOCHT (en nooit  meer  canon  hoeft te worden  betaald)? Binnen tien minuten sta je in het bruisende centrum van Amsterdam. Verder is er een goede bereikbaarheid met verschillende bushaltes in de buurt en is de Ring A10 op enkele minuten afstand. Badkamer De badkamer is ook eenvoudig ingericht en voorzien van een douche, wastafel en de aansluiting voor de wasapparatuur. Het toilet is separaat naast de badkamer gelegen en heeft een fonteintje.  Balkon Op het knusse balkon kom je heerlijk tot rust na een lange werkdag. Deze buitenruimte is op het zuidoosten gelegen waardoor je in de zomer tot circa 16.00 uur kunt genieten van de zon. Bijzonderheden: - DE ERFPACHT IS EEUWIGDUREND IS EEUWIGDUREND AFGEKOCHT; ER HOEFT GEEN CANON TE WORDEN BETAALD!!! - Energiekosten 85 euro per maand en DUBBEL GLAS! - Twee riante slaapkamers; - Actieve VvE, servicekosten €110,- per maand voor de woning met een berging; - Vaste notaris Albers en van Tienen; - Oplevering in overleg.  Would you like to see yourself living in a lovely light, modern and spacious apartment where the ground lease is BOUGHT of FOREVER (and never having to pay the ground rent again)? A sea of  ??light,  peace and  space!  Those are the characteristics  that  most apply to this beautiful  apartment  with roof terrace. The apartment is located in  a complex  with allure in a quiet and atmospheric street near the Amstel river. With almost 120 m2 of living space, you have plenty of space here and the large windows allow a lot of daylight to enter. The apartment has been well maintained by the current owners, so you can move in here with minimal adjustments and enjoy your new home. The latter is perfectly possible, for example, on the spacious roof terrace, an ideal place to completely unwind after a busy working day!  Environment and accessibility The Weesperzijdebuurt is a popular residential area a stone's throw from the city center. The Marcusstraat is a side street of the Weesperzijde near the Amstel. You can enjoy a lovely walk under the trees and along the terraces on the waterfront. Directly across the Amstelbrug is De Pijp with the lively Albert Cuyp market. All amenities are within walking or cycling distance, such as well-known cafes and restaurants such as Benji's, Hesp, de Ysbreeker, restaurant Lille, Côte Wispe, various theaters such as Theater Carré and Stopera, city parks such as Sarphatipark and Oosterpark, and various (neighborhood) shops . A large Albert Heijn is located within walking distance. For home workers, the Volkshotel with its flexible workplaces is just around the corner and a seaside resort on the roof for enthusiasts.  The house is easily accessible by both public transport and by car. The Wibautstraat metro station and the Amstel station are within walking distance. You can reach the A10 highway within 5 minutes by car.  Layout You enter the beautiful entrance of the building and you reach the 3rd floor where the apartment is located. You enter the hall and then you enter the spacious and bright living room. The room has a beautiful wooden floor with a herringbone pattern and has a balcony at the front as well as at the rear. In both cases, the balcony can be reached with double French doors. The semi-open kitchen has a light color scheme and is equipped with various built-in appliances. The fourth and top floor offers two spacious bedrooms and a neat bathroom with bath, shower and sink. On the landing is a separate toilet and a cupboard containing the central heating boiler and the connection for the washing machine and dryer. A fixed staircase from the landing gives access to the roof terrace (with access house).  Association of Owners The active VvE consists of only three apartments. The service costs are currently € 180 per month and the house is located on private land, so no leasehold.  Marcusstraat: Balthazar Jan Fred. Marcus (1806-1865) was mayor of the municipality of Nieuwer-Amstel, of which this street was part until 1896.  Particularities • Living space approximately 119 m2 • Spacious roof terrace (approximately 43 m2 with staircase and access house) • Own land, no leasehold • Service costs € 180 per month • Year of construction circa 1900 • located in a quiet and authentic street near the Amstel river

Verzorgde gemeenschappelijke entree, eigen entree op de vierde verdieping, hal, lichte living met half open keuken, ruime slaapkamer, badkamer, separaat toilet, zonnig terras en een ruime berging in de onderbouw. Wij adviseren u een deskundige (NVM-)makelaar in te schakelen die u begeleidt bij het aankoopproces. Indien u specifieke wensen heeft omtrent de woning, adviseren wij u deze tijdig kenbaar te maken aan uw aankopend makelaar en hiernaar zelfstandig onderzoek te (laten) doen. Starters en doorstromers  opgelet!  Dit instapklare  appartement op  één hoog aan Gulden  Winckelplantsoen  26-H in Amsterdam beschikt over  een  ruime tuin, twee balkons en twee  bergingen  in de onderbouw, wow!  Benieuwd naar wat het appartement nog meer te bieden heeft? Kom dan snel KIJCK.en, wij leiden je graag rond.  Indeling Woonkamer en balkon Je betreedt het appartement op de eerste verdieping via de hal vanuit waar je toegang hebt tot alle vertrekken, laten we eerst een KIJCK.je nemen in de woonkamer. De woonkamer biedt toegang tot het balkon aan de voorzijde van de woning. Deze buitenruimte is op het westen gelegen en hier kun je lekker achterover zitten in het zonnetje. Keuken en balkon De keuken is modern ingericht met een 4 pits gasfornuis, afzuigkap, oven en een koel-/vriescombinatie. DUE TO GREAT  INTEREST  IT IS  NO LONGER  POSSIBLE TO SCHEDULE A  VIEWING   Welcome to this beautiful,  light  apartment in a prime location. Here  not  only would you live  in the most beautiful, but also the nicest part of Amsterdam. Outside you experience the beauty and vibrancy of the city and inside it is homely and quiet. The house is on the top two floors of an attractive building from the 1930s. From the kitchen you have a clear view of the green Jacob Olie park. This park is used by local residents as a communal garden. Both sides of this living area have windows that provide lots of light giving a wonderful space to enjoy. On the top floor are two equal sized bedrooms with a bathroom in the middle. The icing on the cake, you can reach the sunny roof terrace via the outside staircase, where you can enjoy the view and have a nice meal and drink together!  ENVIRONMENT Around the corner you have the pleasant, car-free Haarlemmerdijk and the beautiful Brouwersgracht. The Central Station is within walking distance, as are countless shops, restaurants, the Noordermarkt and Amsterdams canals. This is Amsterdam at its best. Here people greet each other on the street, you are recognized in the café and you know who lives below and next to you. And all this in the middle of the city!  LAYOUT The authentic, stone staircase gives access to the private front door on the second floor via the communal stairwell. You enter the hallway with a toilet on one side and the living room with open kitchen on the other side. The kitchen is equipped with a SMEG 4-burner stove, wok burner, grill and extractor hood.  In the center of the living room is an open spiral staircase to the second floor. Here, there are two spacious bedrooms with a compact bathroom in the middle with shower, wash basin and a powerful fan.  The layout of this attractive apartment with many original features ensures optimal use of the space.  And on the roof terrace you can enjoy the sun and the view over the city!  Characteristics: - Built in 1932 - OWN GROUND - Sunny roof terrace of 15 m2 - Well-running, small-scale VvE - Service costs EUR 150 per month - Exterior painting 2019 - CV boiler 2022 - WOZ value EUR 616,000 - Centrally situated - Walking distance from the station and the canals - All amenities within easy reach - Delivery in consultation

Offered for sale  in  Amsterdam Center:   Highly  renovated 3-room apartment on  the  Prinsengracht. The property is located  on  the second floor of a monumental  building and  has a total area of approximately 94m2. In addition, the apartment has a pleasant layout and a beautiful view over the canal!    ENVIRONMENT:  This particularly beautiful canal house is located on the Prinsengracht near the Leidsestraat and Spiegelgracht. In the immediate area you will of course find the popular 9-Straatjes with lots of nice and famous stores and cozy restaurants. Also the Jordaan, Spiegelgracht, Rijksmuseum and Vondelpark are literally within walking distance.  Excellent public transport connections through various streetcar and bus lines. Central Station is just 10 minutes by bike and also the North-South line is 3 minutes walking distance. Excellent parking possibilities, both on the street through a permit system, a nearby parking garage such as Q-Park Marnixstraat or several small parking garages in the neighborhood.  The apartment is located on the Prinsengracht in the heart of the center near the Spiegelkwartier. The Spiegelkwartier is known for its beautiful antique stores, galleries and unique atmosphere. Within walking distance of the house is the Utrechtsestraat with numerous stores, the Rijksmuseum, the Concertgebouw and the Vondelpark.   GLOBAL LAYOUT:  The entrance to the apartment is located on the second floor of a beautiful and characteristic National Monument.   Upon entering you reach the spacious living/dining room with luxuriously equipped kitchen. The kitchen is equipped with all kinds of appliances such as a dishwasher, stainless steel hood, pitt cooking, combi-oven/steam oven, Quooker and microwave. Also, this kitchen has a temperature-controlled wine cabinet (brand: Gaggenau).   The living room is located at the front of the house and has a beautiful view over the canal thanks to the large windows.   From the kitchen you enter through the hallway into the sleeping area which is located at the rear of the house. The two spacious bedrooms are very quiet and have a beautiful view over the green courtyard gardens. Between the bedrooms is the bathroom which is equipped with bath, walk-in shower and washbasin.   Several spacious closets are located on the hallway of the house. There is also a separate toilet.   ASSOCIATION OF OWNERS:  The Owners' Association called ''VvE Van Het Gebouw Aan de Prinsengracht 560'' is self-managed by the VvE Members. The current monthly contribution service costs is € 100,00 per month.   OWNERSHIP SITUATION:  This property is located on private land.   PARKING:  Permit area: Center-2(f). PARTICULARS:  - National monument (number 4600);  - own land;  - great location in the center; - beautiful view of the canals;  - Very pleasant layout;  - luxury kitchen with appliances; - many restaurants and stores in the area;  - new foundation front and back house in 2015;  - delivery in consultation. EXCLUSIVE home on  the  Nieuwendammerdijk!! This  fantastic loft  apartment, with stunning views  of  the water and an adjoining  spacious  terrace on the Southwest, is located  on  the  second floor  of the residential warehouse "INSULINDE". The warehouse, on one of the most popular dikes in Amsterdam dates from the 19th century and was renovated a hundred years later into very spacious loft apartments. On the roof is a communal sheltered roof terrace and on the water is a jetty where you can moor a boat or take a dip. At the bottom of the warehouse is a private indoor parking space, a storage room and a communal bicycle shed. And all this on its OWN GROUND!  This apartment is by far the most beautiful one in the warehouse due to its beautiful location with large windows on the South-west, the wonderful view and the sunny terrace adjacent to the living room and open kitchen.  Characteristic of these apartments are the visible beam constructions that invite you to play with the layout options. You could make it one large open space, or you could just as easily make it into 4 bedrooms. At the moment there are three bedrooms, a bathroom, an open kitchen and a large amount of closet space.  Layout Communal, expansive, grand entrance through large glass doors and a wide spiral staircase that leads you up one and a half floors to the entrance of the apartment.  Once inside, it is immediately inviting. This is because of the large open space with plenty of choices, places to sit and enjoy the light, the view, the water; a large dining table to gather; the open kitchen with a robust kitchen unit, the various bedrooms on all sides and a bathroom with bath, beautifully handmade sink and shower. In addition, there is plenty of cupboard space, a toilet and a laundry room and storage room.  And don't forget the spacious terrace that leads from the living room and where you can enjoy the sun and the view all day long.  At the moment there are three bedrooms, but previously there were four and this can easily be realized again by placing a wall in the middle of the largest bedroom. The layout optimises the use of light perfectly. The living room is central and connects all the other areas. To be able to feel connected to all other areas and at the same time able to retreat privately to a room is a great aspect of this spacious apartment with its’ wonderfully versatile layout.   At the bottom of the building is a communal bicycle shed, a private storage room and a covered private parking space, a luxury on the Nieuwendammerdijk where it is not always easy to find a parking space.   Environment The Nieuwendammerdijk is a popular residential area due to its village feel, the beautiful houses and friendly atmosphere. Within walking distance you will find the cozy café 't Sluisje with a terrace on the water, the beautiful protected Vliegenbos with tennis club Elzenhagen, the reiteiland nature spot and the lively Noorderpark, where you can go for a walk, play sports, relax and meet up with friends or eat an ice cream. In addition, there are all kinds of shops, schools, gyms (yoga / kickboxing) and endless fun to discover. You will find hip catering establishments (restaurants, cafes), a cinema and dance clubs around the corner in the ever-developing Hamerkanaal area.  In addition, the rural Waterland and the ferry to Amsterdam Central or East are a 10-minute bike ride away. More and more people are discovering the advantages of Amsterdam-Noord which is not surprising, because here these two worlds of city and nature come together perfectly.  Details: - OWN GROUND - Located on the most beautiful dike in Amsterdam North - Built in 1886 (renovated in 1988) - Living area 140 m2 - Terrace of 20m2 on the southwest!! - Indoor private parking  - Communal roof terrace - Service costs € 200 per month - Active Owners Association - Vaillant boiler from 2018  - New kitchen and bathroom from 2018 - New group cabinet 2018 - Double glazing - Energielabel C  - Delivery in Consultation  Disclaimer De op deze website getoonde vrijblijvende informatie is door ons (met zorg) samengesteld op basis van gegevens van de verkoper (en/of derden). Alle opgegeven maten en oppervlakten zijn indicatief.

Wonderfully bright and  characteristic  one bedroom  apartment of  52 m² on private  land  in a beautiful side street  of  the Weesperzijde, near the Amstel! The  apartment  enjoys  a lot of  light through the large windows at the front on the southeast and has a balcony over the full width of the house with afternoon and evening sun. It is very nice to live here in the middle of the lively heart of bustling East!  This attractive apartment is centrally located in East between the Amstel and Oosterpark with many amenities within walking distance. Artis, the Tropenmuseum and the Dappermarkt can all be found nearby. Just like the new Oostpoort shopping center that offers a complete range of various shops, caterers and catering outlets. With the lively Beukenplein, Linneusstraat and Weesperzijde just some footsteps away, there are many hotspots to discover such as Maxwell, Het Volkshotel, Louie Louie, De Ysbreecker, Bar Bukowski, Loetje, Hesp, Hotel Arena and De Biertuin. Via the Nieuwe Amstelbrug you can cycle straight into the Pijp for even more restaurants and pleasant terraces. All forms of public transport are close by. Both the Amstel station and the Muiderpoort station are a short distance away and there is a tram and metro stop on Wibautstraat. The A10 ring road can be quickly reached by car via the Wiboutstraat via the s112 and the car can be parked in front of the door. In short, the central location, excellent accessibility and trendy neighborhood makes living in this part of East ideal!  What else do you need to know? - Surface area in accordance with NEN2580: living area of 52 m² and the balcony is over 4 m² - Ownership situation: private land, so leasehold is not applicable - Foundation: this was renewed in 2014 - Balcony: located over the full width of the house at the quiet rear with a view of the inner gardens. It is located on the northwest and has sun in the afternoon-evening - Kitchen: the kitchen is modern and is equipped with a dishwasher, fridge with freezer compartment, combination oven / microwave, 4-burner stove and extractor hood. The connection for the washing machine is also in the kitchen - Bathroom: this is accessible from the hall and has a walk-in shower, sink and toilet - Potential: a second bedroom can be created by moving the kitchen to the living area - Energy label: D - Bedroom: this is located at the quiet rear, is nice and spacious and gives access to the balcony - Other: very bright and pleasant house with a practical layout in which all spaces are well used - Association of owners (V.v.E.): this is healthy, active and professionally managed. There is a multi-year maintenance plan (MJOP) and the monthly service costs are currently € 98,- - Location: popular location in East on a quiet and green street between the Amstel and Oosterpark - Accessibility: conveniently located in relation to various roads and close to public transport, shops and restaurants. With the museum square and the leidse square accessible in less than 10 minutes by bike - Heating and hot water: via its own energy-efficient central heating system from 2020, which was last serviced in 2022 - Delivery: in consultation, this is possible immediately if desired  I would be happy to tell you all about the attractive house during a viewing. See you then, Bert  Disclaimer: We have compiled this application with the greatest possible care. =In verband met  een  enorme drukte  zijn we  telefonisch slecht bereikbaar en  is  het momenteel alleen mogelijk om  de  bezichtiging via de mail aan te  vragen!  =   Bent u  op zoek naar een hoekwoning met drie ruime slaapkamers en een zonnige tuin op het zuiden gelegen in woonwijk Nieuwe Kempering Amsterdam Zuidoost? Dan is deze 2-laagse eengezinswoning met de mogelijkheid tot een opbouw voor een volledige verdieping wellicht wat voor u!  Omgeving:  Zeer gunstig gelegen ten opzichte van verscheidene scholen, winkel/horecagelegenheden, het Gaasperpark, medische-, sport- en alle andere voorzieningen. Binnen enkele minuten bereikt u het trein en metro station Amsterdam ArenA , Johan Cruijff ArenA, Afas Live Theater, Pathé Arena, MediaMarkt. Hier heeft u keuze uit talloze gezellige winkels en restaurants. Zeer centraal gelegen t.o.v. de uitvalswegen (Gooiseweg, A10, A9, A1, A2).  Indeling:  U betreedt de woning via de entree en komt aan in een ruime hal waar zich de meterkast bevindt, toilet met een fonteintje en de toegang tot de tuingerichte woonkamer met doorloop naar de open keuken voorzien van een nette keukenblok met inbouwapparatuur zoals een vaatwasser, elektrische kookplaat met afzuigkap, wasbak met mengkraan , combi-oven, berg/kastruimte en een vrijstaande Amerikaanse koelkast.  Via de woonkamer loopt u door naar een riante op het zuiden gelegen tuin (56 m2) met een vrijstaande houten berging en een achterom.  Eerste verdieping:  Middels de trap bereikt u de overloop de eerste verdieping.  Hier treft u de drie ruime slaapkamers , bergkast/wasruimte en de badkamer. De badkamer is plafondhoog betegeld en voorzien van een douchecabine, toilet, wastafel, en een raam.   Erfpachtsituatie:  De erfpacht is afgekocht tot en met 30-06-2065 en kan voor het eerst worden herzien op 1 juli 2065. This spacious 90  m2  apartment on  the third  floor, with balcony, has  a  beautiful view on the canal  over  the full width of the living  room. It  is located in vibrant Amsterdam North in a quiet and car-free neighborhood, which is great for young children. You have your own parking space in the parking garage worth 35k, which is included in the asking price. With an A++ label, the house meets the very latest sustainability requirements.  The apartment will be completed in the first quarter of 2023 as the final phase of the Vrije Kade project in Buiksloterham. The ferry is a five-minute bike ride away, after which Central Station and the city center are within easy reach. The NDSM site is also within a few minutes via the new bridge, and several supermarkets and schools are within five minutes by bike. The Northern IJ banks are Hip, Hot & Happening. For several years it has been the place to relax and enjoy cultural and culinary opportunities.  Layout On the Ground floor you find the entrance to the complex and a storage room of 5m2. By stairs or elevator you always get comfortably to the third floor, even if you have difficulty walking or have a stroller with you. The apartment has a hall with access to all rooms: two spacious bedrooms, a casco bathroom and separate toilet, a technical room and a storage room where the washer and dryer can be connected. The spacious living room has room for an open kitchen, which can accommodate, for example, a kitchen island overlooking the water.  Property situation The house is located on land issued in perpetual ground lease and the canon is approximately € 4,000 per year and when used as a main residence, tax deductible (conditions 2016). The canon for the parking space is € 52,77 per year (conditions 2000). A VvE will be established and service costs will be charged for maintenance in the future.  Details - A spacious apartment with A++ label; - Beautiful views over the water; - Spacious balcony on the waterfront; - The convenience of an elevator; - Unique place in Buiksloterham; - 2 spacious bedrooms; - Property equipped with underfloor heating; - Private parking worth 35k in the adjacent garage, included in the asking price; - Living in a place where your children can play on the street!  This information has been carefully compiled by us. However, no liability is accepted for any incompleteness, inaccuracy or otherwise, or the consequences thereof. All dimensions and surfaces are indicative and you are free to measure the house. The NVM conditions apply.

PARNASSUSWEG 26 III  -  AMSTERDAM  SEE ENGLISH  TEXT BELOW  Luxe  appartement  op een zeer centrale locatie  in  Amsterdam Zuid! Heerlijk licht en ruim  drie-laags  bovenhuis  van ca. 210  m2 (NEN gemeten) met drie balkons en zonnig dakterras van 30 m2.  Het appartement bevindt zich op een toplocatie; alle voorzieningen bevinden zich binnen handbereik. Het pand is omstreeks 1930 gebouwd en recent verbouwd met behoud van de originele details waardoor het huis een heerlijke warmte en een serene rust uitstraalt.   Bij binnenkomst voelt u zich gelijk thuis.  OMGEVING  Het appartement is gelegen aan de Parnassusweg, een centrale locatie nabij de Zuid-as.   Op loopafstand bevindt zich het Olympiaplein, de Beethovenstraat en de Stadionweg waar diverse supermarkten, speciaalzaken (o.a. Marqt en Le Fournil ) en een keur aan gezellige restaurants gesitueerd zijn. Het Concertgebouw, het Rijksmuseum en diverse andere musea bevinden zich in de nabije omgeving.   In Amsterdam Zuid is er een ruime keuze aan goed aangeschreven basis- en middelbare scholen alsmede diverse Internationale scholen. Voor sport en recreatie kunt u terecht in het Vondelpark, het Amstelpark en het Beatrixpark. In de directe omgeving bevindt zich een skatepark en diverse sportvelden. Bereikbaarheid; zowel met het openbaar vervoer als met de auto is deze locatie zeer goed te bereiken. De ringweg A10-A2, A4 en A9 zijn binnen enkele autominuten bereikbaar en Station Zuid en het WTC zijn op loopafstand bereikbaar. Bij Station Zuid stoppen diverse tram-, bus- en metrolijnen evenals de trein die u met heel Nederland verbindt. Schiphol Airport is binnen 6 minuten per trein te bereiken. De Pijp en Centrum zijn snel te bereiken met tram 24.  Er is ruimschoots parkeergelegenheid voor de deur, parkeren geschiedt door middel van een vergunningensysteem.  Kortom: alle faciliteiten om het woonplezier optimaal te maken zijn aanwezig!  INDELING:   De woning is gelegen op de derde, vierde en vijfde verdieping met een eigen trapopgang vanaf de tweede verdieping:  Derde verdieping: De eerste woonlaag is gelegen op de derde verdieping.  De ruime hal, met vaste garderobekast, verbindt alle vertrekken op deze verdieping. Zeer royale en lichte L-vormige woonkamer en-suite met een sfeervolle openhaard en voorzien van airconditioning. Alle drie de ruimtes zijn van elkaar te scheiden middels originele glas in lood deuren (schuifdeuren en openslaande deuren). De kamer aan de voorzijde heeft een vaste kastenwand welke u een zee aan opbergruimte geeft. Tussen de woonkamer en eetkamer bevinden zich ook op maat gemaakte inbouwkasten. De eetkamer aan de achterzijde heeft openslaande deuren naar het balkon. Het balkon is voorzien van een elektrisch zonnescherm.  De naastgelegen luxe woonkeuken beschikt over diverse inbouw apparatuur zoals een 5- pits fornuis, vaatwasser, oven, magnetron, gourmet warmhoudlade en een koelvriescombinatie.  De keuken geeft middels een extra deur tevens toegang tot het balkon.  Vanuit de hal heb je toegang tot een aparte wasruimte en een toilet.  Vierde verdieping: Via de witgeschilderde houten trap bereikt u de slaapverdieping met een drietal kamers en een luxe volwaardige badkamer en apart toilet. De slaapkamers aan de voorzijde hebben beiden openslaande deuren naar een charmant stenen balkon. De slaapkamer aan de achterzijde biedt toegang tot het prachtige dakterras gelegen op het westen. Het dakterras is volledig uitgevoerd in hardhout en beschikt over een vast (elektrisch) zonnescherm. Het heerlijke terras geeft u zo de mogelijkheid om zowel van de zon als in de schaduw te genieten van ruimte en rust.  Vijfde verdieping De bovenste verdieping biedt een prachtige grote ruimte in een loftachtige sfeer door de enorme hoge kap met de houten balken. Deze ruimte is voorzien van airconditioning. Deze ruimte is opgedeeld in slapen en baden.  De luxe badkamer is ruim opgezet en is volledig ingericht; er is een dubbele stortdouche, een ligbad, toilet en een op maat gemaakt wastafelmeubel met dubbele wastafel en aan beide zijdes een spiegel.  Vanzelfsprekend is in dit appartement alles perfect afgewerkt en is er uitsluitend gekozen voor hoogwaardige materialen.  Op elke woonlaag is er veel kast en bergruimte.   In het hele huis ligt een houten vloer (natural smoked oak). Er is gekozen voor neutrale en witte tinten welke in combinatie met de originele details en de zeer ruime woonoppervlakte, het huis maken tot een uniek geheel!  VERENIGING VAN EIGENAARS  De Verenging van Eigenaars bestaat uit totaal 24 appartementsrechten.   De servicekosten bedragen € 314,93. Dit is inclusief een voorschot stookkosten van € 100,00. De VVE is een gezonde Vereniging van Eigenaars en beschikt over een MJOP. De administratie wordt gevoerd door Velzel VVE diensten te Amsterdam.  ERFPACHT  Het complex waarvan het appartement deel uitmaakt is gelegen op erfpachtgrond. De jaarlijkse Canon bedraagt € 2.346,28 (fiscaal aftrekbaar), AB 2000. ENGLISH TEXT:  Luxurious apartment, very centrally located in Amsterdam South!  Very light and spacious triple top floor house of approximately 210 m2 (NEN measured) with three balconies and a very sunny roof terrace of 30 m2.   The apartment is located on a prime location in Amsterdam South; all amenities are available within walking distance. The property was built around 1930 and has recently been renovated while maintaining the original details, giving the house a warm and charming look and feel. When you enter the apartment, you immediately feel at home.  LOCATION  The apartment is located on Parnassusweg, a very central location close to the ‘Zuid-as ‘. Within walking distance, you will find the Olympiaplein, Beethovenstraat, and Stadionweg which offer a variety of local shops (like Marqt and Le Fournil) , supermarkets, and renowned restaurants. The Concert hall, the Rijksmuseum and various other museums are in the vicinity.  Amsterdam South offers a wide variety of well-renowned primary and secondary schools as well as various international schools. For sports and recreation, you can visit the Vondelpark, the Amstelpark and the Beatrixpark. Just around the corner you will have a skatepark and various sport facilities.   Accessibility; Parnassusweg is very easy to reach both by public transport and by car. The ring road A10, the A2, A4 and A9 can easily be reached within minutes by car. And Station Zuid and the World Trade Centre are within walking distance. Various tram, bus and metro lines stop at Station Zuid, as well as the train that connects you with the whole of the Netherlands and Europe. Schiphol Airport can be reached by train within 6 minutes.  With tram 24 you can easily reach the Pijp and the City Centre.  There is ample parking in front of the door, parking is done by means of a permit system.  In short: all facilities to maximize your living experience are available!  LAYOUT  The house is located on the third, fourth and fifth floor with its own staircase from the second floor:  Third floor: The first level is located on the third floor. The spacious hall, with built-in wardrobe, connects all rooms on this floor. Very spacious and bright L-shaped living room with cosy open fire and en-suite dining room both fitted with air conditioning. All three areas can be separated from each other by original stained glass doors (one is with sliding doors and the other is a double big French door ). The room at the front has a fully fitted cabinet (custom made from wall to wall) providing ample storage space. Between the living and dining room custom made cupboards have been fitted.  The dining room at the rear has French doors that open onto the balcony facing west. There is an electric sunscreen. The luxurious adjacent kitchen has built-in appliances, including a 5-burner stove, dishwasher, oven, microwave, gourmet plate warmers, and a fridge freezer. With an extra door the kitchen has access to the balcony as well.  From the hallway you have access to a guest toilet and a separate laundry.  Fourth floor: Via the stylish white painted wooden staircase your will reach the second level. On this floor you will have three bedrooms and a luxurious full bathroom and toilet. The front bedrooms both have French doors that open to a charming brickwork balcony. The room at the rear provides access to the beautiful roof terrace facing west. All decking and railing have been made of hardwood. There is an electric sunscreen for your convenience. Due to its layout, this lovely terrace offers you the option to either relax in the sun or in the shade and enjoy a city sunset.  Fifth floor: The top floor offers a beautiful large space in a loft-like atmosphere due to the enormous high ceilings with the wooden beams. The bedroom is fitted with an air conditioning system. This space is divided into sleeping and bathing. The luxurious bathroom is spacious and fully equipped; there is a double rain shower, a bath, toilet and a custom-made cabinet with double washbasin and a mirror on both sides.  Needless to say, that everything in this apartment has been perfectly finished with high end materials only. On each  floor there are a  lot of storage spaces /cupboards.   The entire house has been finished with a wooden floor (natural treated smoked oak) . The chosen color scheme of neutral and white tones in combination with original decorations, details and its floor size give this house a unique look and feel.   Absolutely worth a visit!    ASSOCIATION OF OWNERS  The Association of owners consists in total of 24 apartments. The monthly services charges are € 314,93. This includes an advance amount for heating costs of € 100.00. The VVE is a healthy Association of owners and has a long-term maintenance plan. The administration is done by Velzel VVE Diensten in Amsterdam.  LAND LEASE  The complex to which this apartment belongs is situated on land lease. The annual lease comprises  € 2.346,28 (income tax deductible), AB 2000.
