It is our  pleasure  to present  this stunning  ground-floor apartment on Djambistraat,  spanning  approx. 66 sqm (NEN2580). The  apartment  features a spacious living room with  an  open-plan  kitchen, two large  bedrooms, a modern bathroom with a walk-in shower and a fabulous approx. 28 sqm back garden.  In short, a turn-key apartment with a lovely garden, an absolute must-see!  LAYOUT The private street entrance leads to the home. The hall accesses the primary bedroom, separate restroom, the living room and the bathroom. The bathroom is equipped with a large walk-in shower, a vanity and a towel radiator. Steel doors open to the living room with an open-plan kitchen. The beautifully finished kitchen features a chef's island and is the perfect place to unleash your culinary talents. The kitchen is fitted with a full range of appliances, such as a 5-burner gas range, integrated extractor, built-in refrigerator/freezer, combination oven/microwave and a Quooker. French doors in the living room open to the generous east-facing back garden. The second bedroom, which also has storage space, is at the rear of the home.  PROPERTY STATUS - Situated on municipal ground lease land; - Current lease period in effect until 30-09-2056; - Ground lease prepaid until 30-09-2056;   - Subject to the 1998  general terms and conditions for ground lease; - Application submitted for everlasting settlement of the lease, under favorable financial conditions;  HOMEOWNERS ASSOCIATION - Healthy and active HOA; - Professional administrator; - Monthly contribution of €137; - Long-term maintenance plan in effect;  SPECIFICATIONS - Energy label C; - Storage unit on the attic floor, approx. 8 sqm; - Central heating kettle (owned outright) replaced in 2017, serviced annually; - Residential floor area of 66 sqm (NEN2580); - Back garden approx. 28 sqm(!); - Resident parking permit zone; - Closing date to be determined;  LOCATION The apartment is in a perfect location, in an area that has grown into one of the most popular neighborhoods in Amsterdam. All groceries are available nearby, as are further amenities including the public library. Bustling Javastraat and Javaplein are close-by, as are Oosterpark, Flevopark and Beukenplein. This sought-after neighborhood is home to countless lovely restaurants and hotspots including restaurant Wilde Zwijnen, bar Basquiat, Hartje Oost, café LouieLouie, De Biertuin, Walter Woodbury Bar, Studio K and Brouwerij t'IJ. Mere minutes by bike to Centrum borough and fabulous De Pijp. Downtown and Amsterdam CS are at less than 10 minutes' cycling distance. Muiderpoort station is close-by and tram 14 offers direct service to downtown. By car, the A10 beltway is just a heartbeat away via Piet Hein tunnel.

Heerlijk wonen in  een  rustig en  autoluw hofje  op loopafstand van het  geliefde  NDSM-terrein in Amsterdam Noord! Deze  eindwoning  heeft een fantastische ligging en heeft  thans  3  slaapkamers, maar  kan eenvoudig uitgebreid worden naar 5 slaapkamers!  Behoudens de 2e verdieping, is de gehele woning voorzien van kunststof kozijnen in isolerende beglazing. De indeling op begane grond is aangepast zodat er nu een grote open woonkeuken is ontstaan. Via openslaande deuren is er toegang tot de achtertuin met voldoende bergruimte met een vrijstaande stenen berging en een houten blokhut. Aan voorzijde van de woning is er een ruime voortuin met een eigen parkeerplaats.  Indeling Begane grond: Vanuit de hal is er toegang tot de meterkast en de toiletruimte en is er entree in de woonkamer met open keuken.  De gezellige woonkamer is erg sfeervol en geeft zicht op de ruime open keuken. De keuken heeft een hoekopstelling en is voorzien van o.a.: een gasfornuis met afzuigkap, koelkast en vaatwasser. De vloer is voorzien van een laminaatvloer.  Vanuit de woonkamer is er uitzicht op de achtertuin welke is gelegen op het noordwesten.  Eerste verdieping: Deze verdieping beschikt momenteel over 2 slaapkamers en een badkamer. De badkamer is recent geheel vernieuwd en is voorzien van een inloopdouche, wastafelmeubel en een toilet. De slaapkamer aan achterzijde is nu een riante slaapkamer. Dit waren voorheen 2 slaapkamers en dit kan uiteraard weer naar deze oude situatie teruggebracht worden. De slaapkamer aan voorzijde is voorzien van een bergkast en heeft ook aansluitingen voor de wasmachine en droger.  Tweede verdieping: Deze verdieping is nu in gebruik als bergruimte en hier bevindt zich de opstelling van de cv-ketel een ook op deze verdieping is er een aansluiting voor wasmachine en droger aanwezig. Deze verdieping beschikt over 2 dakramen maar deze ruimte kan naar eigen inzicht vergroot worden door het plaatsen van dakkapellen.  Tuin: De achtertuin is te bereiken via de openslaande deuren en via de 'achterom' aan de achterzijde van de tuin. De achtertuin is gelegen op het noordwesten en de voortuin op het zuidoosten. Daarnaast wordt er door de bewoners veel gebruik gemaakt van het plantsoen aan de voorzijde van de woning waar een aantal picknicktafels staan en waar kinderen naar hartenlust met elkaar kunnen spelen!  Omgeving De ligging van de woning is ideaal; op loopafstand van diverse scholen, winkels, parken, speeltuintjes, cafés etc. Met de nabijgelegen pont sta je binnen 15 minuten op het Centraal Station. Voor uitgaan en vertier ben je zo op het nabijgelegen culturele 'hotspot' het 'NDSM-terrein' met een groot scala aan mogelijkheden, denk aan een hapje eten bij Loetje, Pllek of bij IJver of een koopje 'scoren' bij de IJhallen.  Parkeren: Er is parkeergelegenheid voor één auto op eigen terrein. Daarnaast zijn er voldoende openbare parkeerplaatsen waar je nog gratis kunt parkeren.  Eigendomssituatie:  De canon is afgekocht tot 16 april 2039. Na deze datum is de erfpacht onder de gunstige voorwaarden "vastgeklikt" en bedraagt thans € 727,- (exclusief jaarlijkse indexatie). De Algemene Bepalingen Eeuwigdurende Erfpacht voorwaarden 2016 zijn van toepassing.  Bijzonderheden: - Woonoppervlakte is 99,8 m2 (NEN2580); - Oppervlakte kan eenvoudig vergroot worden middels uitbouw en/of plaatsen van dakkapellen; - Bijna geheel voorzien van kunststof kozijnen; - Achtertuin op het noordwesten; - Ideale ligging aan autoluw hofje met veel jonge gezinnen; - Drie basisscholen in nabije omgeving; - De cv-ketel betreft een huurketel en huur bedraagt € 39,- per maand    en contract kan afgekocht worden; - Binnen 15 minuten op Amsterdam CS!  Nieuwsgierig geworden? Maak dan snel een afspraak voor een bezichtiging!

Zoek jij een betaalbaar, zo te betrekken appartement met veel ruimte, dan kan Loggerhof 89 best eens wat voor jou zijn! Het appartement ligt op de bovenste (derde) etage, is voorzien van 2 slaapkamers (een derde is eenvoudig te realiseren), heeft een 2 balkons en is in 2016 grotendeels gerenoveerd.  Nieuwsgierig geworden? Bel ons voor het maken van een afspraak, één van onze makelaars leidt je graag rond!  LOCATIE:  Het appartement is gelegen in de ''de Banne'', in een hofje aan een autoluwe straat. Voor je dagelijkse boodschappen kun je terecht in het naastgelegen winkelcentrum de Banne, maar ook het complete aanbod van winkels aan het Buikslotermeerplein ligt in de buurt!   Met slechts 8 minuten fietsen sta je op de NDSM-werf, vanaf hier kun je niet alleen de pont naar Centraal station of de Pontsteiger pakken, maar hier zijn ook het hele jaar door leuke festivals te vinden. Met 15 minuten fiets je naar natuur- en recreatiegebied Het Twiske of het landelijke gebied Waterland, waar je kunt genieten van de rust en de prachtige natuur. Wonderfully light and  well  laid out  1-bedroom apartment  of 53m2 in the  popular  Dapperbuurt. A complete house with  a  garden, separate storage room, and perpetual  leasehold! Want to see it  more quickly? Come on in.  Environment You will find this bright, well-arranged apartment in the popular Dapperbuurt in Amsterdam East. The neighborhood has undergone a major transformation in recent years. Many facilities have been added, which makes it pleasant here. For relaxation, you can go to a diverse range of excellent pubs and restaurants such as Bar Milo, Café Kuijper, PARK, Studio K, Louie Louie, and of course, Brouwerij 't IJ. You can do your shopping at various supermarkets and the daily Dappermarkt. The neighborhood also has two city parks (Oosterpark and Flevopark), a shopping area (Oostpoort), and cozy streets such as Linnaeusstraat, Middenweg, and of course, Javastraat. There are excellent public transport connections, with Muiderpoort station a few minutes away. The A10 ring road is also easily and quickly accessible. You park in front of the door. In short, a fantastic place to live!  Layout: You reach the apartment through your entrance; you step into the hall. The living room is a long and light space; the pleasing layout offers space for multiple functions. The spacious seating area has been created at the front, where you can relax. From the couch, you look into the cozy Reinwardtstraat. Next is the dining table, where you can dine with friends/family.  The kitchen is equipped with white/black color tones and is equipped with all necessary built-in appliances such as a 5-burner hob with an extractor hood, oven, refrigerator, sink, dishwasher, and storage space. You reach the balcony and garden through the kitchen, which is located on the north.  At the rear, you will find the spacious bedroom; there is enough space for a double bed and cupboard space. A lot of natural light enters through the large windows. You reach the bathroom through both the bedroom and the hall. The bathroom is designed in white/black color tones and has a toilet, shower corner, and washbasin.  The house offers access to the communal courtyard with your own terrace, where you can relax in the summer. There is also an indoor storage room in the basement, which is ideal for storing your belongings.  Owners Association The VvE called 'VvE Reinwardtstraat 33 to 51' is managed by Ymere and consists of 31 apartment rights. Meetings are held annually, and an MJOP is present. The monthly service costs are €104.34.  Ownership situation The house is on a municipal leasehold, which was bought off until April 2031. The current owner has recently made the switch to perpetual leasehold; from 2031, a perpetual canon of € 454.34 per year is therefore due.  Particularities; - Located in the popular Dapperbuurt; - Beautifully finished house; - Living area of 53m2 (NEN2580 measurement certificate available); - 1 bedroom; - Energy label C; - Separate storage room; - Service costs € 104.34 per month; - Communal courtyard with private terrace; - Transfer perpetual lease already paid (very favorable!); - Parking via a permit system, lots of parking in the immediate vicinity; - Transfer in consultation; - There is only an agreement once the deed of sale has been signed; - A civil-law notary in Amsterdam draws up purchase deed. PUUR* WONEN! PRACHTIG  LICHT  3-KAMER APPARTEMENT  VAN CA.  73 M2 MET BALKON  AAN  DE NIEUWE ACHTERGRACHT OM DE  HOEK  VAN KONINKLIJK THEATER CARRÉ  *** See English  text below  ***  Heerlijk appartement met prachtig uitzicht over de gracht. Twee ruime slaapkamers, eventueel een derde als u een open keuken aan de voorzijde maakt. Dit is een appartement met veel mogelijkheden en is zeer geschikt als u handig bent of een renovatie wilt uitvoeren. U kunt hier makkelijk parkeren en als er geen plaats is aan de gracht is er altijd de mogelijkheid tot parkeren aan de achterzijde van het appartement op de parkeerplaats. in de onderbouw op straat niveau is nog een separate berging. Het appartement is gelegen om de hoek van de Roeterstraat, Theater Carré, Artis, museum Hermitage, de Stopera, de Hortus Botanicus, UvA universiteit, cinema Kriterion en op loopafstan van de Utrechtsestraat!   INDELING: Vanuit het gezamenlijk entree bereikt u het appartement. Het entree van de woning is op de derde verdieping en geeft toegang tot de hal. De hal is centraal gelegen en stelt alle ruimtes in verbinding met elkaar. De woonkamer met uitzicht over de Nieuwe Achtergracht is aan de voorzijde van de woning gelegen en heeft drie grote raampartijen. Door de grote raampartijen is de woonkamer licht en kijk je uit op het water van de Nieuwe Achtergracht. De keuken geeft toegang tot het balkon aan de achterzijde en is separaat . De keuken bevindt zicht tussen de twee slaapkamers. Aan de achterzijde zijn twee slaapkamers waarvan de masterbedroom toegang geeft tot het balkon met vrij uitzicht tot aan de Nieuwe Prinsengracht. Een fijne plek om op mooie dagen te genieten van de borrel zon met een fijn boek en glas wijn. De badkamer is voorzien van van een ligbad en een wastafel. Op de hal is het separaat toilet met fontein en een kast met ruimte voor een wasmachine / droger opstelling.   OMGEVING: Het appartement is gelegen in een rustige straat in de mooie Roeterseiland buurt. In de directe omgeving kunt u voor de dagelijkse boodschappen terecht bij de AH op de Sarphatistraat of op de Utrechtsestraat, Weesperstraat, Wibautstraat, Waterloopplein en de Dappermarkt. Voor een heerlijk kopje koffie op het terras hoeft u niet ver te lopen, op loopafstand zijn veel cafés en restaurants te vinden zoals de Plantage, Ysbreeker en Entrepot. De befaamde dierentuin Artis en Hortus Botanicus bevinden zich op een steenworp afstand. Ook de cultuurliefhebber kan zijn hart ophalen, Carré, de Stopera en de Hermitage Amsterdam zijn dichtbij. Wilt u liever genieten van de natuur? Maak dan een prachtige wandeling langs de grachten of geniet van de eerste zonnestralen in het Oosterpark.  De woning is zowel met de auto als met het openbaar vervoer goed bereikbaar. Met de auto bent u binnen enkele minuten op de ring A10. De verbinding met het openbaar vervoer is uitstekend, zo vindt u diverse tram- en metrohaltes om de hoek en centraal station is eveneens snel te bereiken. Parkeren is hier mogelijk middels een parkeervergunning.  BIJZONDERHEDEN: * Gelegen op eigen grond; * Trappenhuis onlangs gerenoveerd; * Appartement met mogelijkheden; * Berging aanwezig op de begane grond; * Lichte woning; * Twee slaapkamers; * Balkon aan de achterzijde; * Gezonde en actieve VvE; * Servicekosten € 291,- (waarvan € 89,- voorschot stookkosten); * Oplevering in overleg.  ----------------------------------------------------------------  PUUR* LIVING! BEAUTIFUL BRIGHT 3-ROOM APARTMENT OF APPROX. 73 M2 WITH BALCONY ON THE NIEUWE ACHTERGRACHT AROUND THE CORNER FROM KONINKLIJK THEATRE CARRÉ  Lovely apartment with stunning views of the canal. Two spacious bedrooms, possibly a third if you make an open kitchen at the front. This is an apartment with many possibilities and is very suitable if you are handy or want to renovate. You can easily park here the car and if there is no place on the canal, there is always the possibility of the parking area at the rear of the apartment in the car park. In the basement at street level is another separate storage room. The apartment is located around the corner from the Roeterstraat, Theater Carré, Artis, museum Hermitage, the Stopera, the Hortus Botanicus, UvA university, cinema Kriterion and within walking distance of the Utrechtsestraat!   LAYOUT: You will reach the apartment from the communal entrance. The entrance to the apartment is on the third floor and gives access to the hallway. The hall is centrally located and connects all rooms. The living room with views over the Nieuwe Achtergracht canal is located at the front of the house and has three large windows. Due to the large windows, the living room is bright and overlooks the water of the Nieuwe Achtergracht canal. The kitchen gives access to the balcony at the rear and is separate. The kitchen is located between the two bedrooms. At the back are two bedrooms, of which the master bedroom gives access to the balcony with unobstructed views over the Nieuwe Prinsengracht. A nice place to enjoy the sun with a book and a glass of wine. The bathroom has a bathtub and a washbasin. Down the hall is the separate toilet with fountain and a cupboard with space for a washing machine/dryer set-up.   SURROUNDINGS: The apartment is located in a quiet street in the beautiful Roeterseiland area. In the immediate vicinity you can go for daily shopping at the AH on Sarphatistraat or on the Utrechtsestraat, Weesperstraat, Wibautstraat, Waterloo Square and Dapper Market. For a delicious cup of coffee on a terrace, you don't have to walk far; within walking distance are many cafés and restaurants such as the Plantage, Ysbreeker and Entrepot. The famous Artis Zoo and Hortus Botanicus are just a minutes away. Culture lovers will also enjoy themselves, with Carré, the Stopera and the Hermitage Amsterdam nearby. Would you rather enjoy nature? Then take a beautiful walk along the canals or enjoy the first rays of sunshine in the Oosterpark.  The property is easily accessible by both car and public transport. By car, you can reach the A10 ring road within minutes. Public transport connections are excellent, with various tram and metro stops just around the corner and Central Station also within easy reach. Parking is possible here by means of a parking permit.  DETAILS: * Located on freehold land; * Stairwell recently renovated; * Apartment with possibilities; * Storage on the ground floor: * Bright home; * Two bedrooms; * Balcony at the rear; * Healthy and active owners association; * Service costs € 291,- (of which € 89,- advance heating costs); * Delivery in consultation.

Completely renovated and  very  tastefully furnished  two bedroom  maisonette of approximately 83  m2  with lots of light and  fantastic  views over the Sloterplas! The shopping center "Osdorpplein" is within walking distance. Here you find supermarkets, various retail chains and specialty shops, but also, for example, the theater De Meervaart for cultural relaxation. Layout From the gallery on the eighth floor you have a beautiful view of Osdorp area and you reach the entrance of the house. Owners Association The management of the association of owners is done by a professional VVE manager. It is a healthy and active VVE. There is block heating in the complex. Unique living with  an  unobstructed view  of the  greenery in this 4-room  single-family  home of 100m2, perpetually surrendered  leasehold,  garden in front and behind, so  always  sun!  This single-family  home has many attractive details; 11 solar panels, B-Energie label, dormer window with plastic frames, new maintenance-free skylights from December 2022, up-to-date kitchen appliances, floors from 2020.  UNIQUE LOCATION Gein-3 is located in the residential area of Gaasperdam. Gein-3 village with only single-family homes is known for its atmospheric, small-scale, green character. Those who grew up here often want to come back. A child-friendly neighborhood with many pedestrian and cycling paths, playgrounds in the neighborhood and close to the Gaasperplas with park and beach. The Gaasperzoom is a green area where it is nice to walk and cycle and grazing cows roam freely. This area continues to Abcoude, Gein-Noord and Driemond. The metro station Gein is ideal in the front of the district, which takes you to the city within 20 minutes. But you don't have to go to the city because shops, market, nightlife, it's all possible at shopping center Gein, Reigersbos or Amsterdamse Poort and the Arena Boulevard with the Ziggo Dome, Afas live theater and the Johan Cruijff stadium. Weesp and Abcoude are within cycling distance. Within 5 minutes you are on the ring road to Amstelveen, Schiphol, Utrecht, Almere, Zaandam.  Layout Entrance on a wide footpath through the spacious front garden and with parking in front of the door in a traffic-calmed cul-de-sac. Hall with cupboard with sliding doors for outdoor clothing, energy meters, 1st toilet with sink.  Living room with access to the garden through a large glass sliding door over the entire width. Lots of glass and therefore pleasant light in the house and a view of the garden.  Custom-made kitchen with high beech wood worktop and accents, many drawers and cupboard space with various built-in appliances: an induction hob from 2016, dishwasher (2020), fridge-freezer with drawers (2022), combination oven-microwave (2019) From the kitchen you have an unobstructed view of the front garden, sidewalk and green area.  Stairs to the first floor with a practical cupboard underneath.  1st floor Two spacious bedrooms, one at the front and one at the rear, the latter with new skylights (2022) and extra storage space behind the knee bulkheads. Between the 2 rooms the bathroom: complete, in light colors with a washbasin with furniture, shower cabin, bath, towel radiator and second toilet.  2nd floor An attic space with the central heating system, a washing machine and dryer connection under a practical worktop and a dormer window in which a lot of storage space has been created behind the knee bulkheads. And a spacious bedroom with pleasant light through the combination of windows in the facade and the new skylights (2022). As an extra, a compact handy mountain loft.  Garden Well-kept front and back garden, both with an outside tap, a detached stone shed in the back garden with a back entrance.  Detail information: Built in 1986 Energy label B, with 11 solar panels. Mechanical automatic ventilation system (2020) Living area approx. 100 m2. Plot area 113m2. with garden in front and behind. Leasehold bought off in perpetuity. Delivery in consultation mid-May.  Worth a visit, this well-kept house is 200 meters away from the metro, within walking distance of the Gein shopping center and primary schools and 900 meters from the Gaasperplas and the greenery around it.

In the Villa  Mokum  complex, there  is a  ready-to-move-in studio on the  fifth  floor that has a high-quality  finish  and is fully equipped. It has  a  French  balcony, patio doors  and an unobstructed view. The complex from 2014 has two lifts, a bicycle shed, an inner garden and various communal sunny roof terraces.  Villa Mokum is located in the Amstelkwartier opposite the Spaklerweg metro station and within walking distance of the Amstel station. Also easily accessible by car, bicycle and public transport. At the end of the street is the beautiful recreational strip along the Amstel and behind the complex is a brand new park.  Layout Via the communal entrance with spacious hall you take the elevator to the fifth floor. The entrance of the house is not far from the elevator. When you enter the house, on one side you will find the meter cupboard with sufficient groups, the bathroom with a corner shower, washbasin and toilet, the wardrobes and a cupboard wall with storage space and a work surface. On the other side is the kitchen unit with a washing machine, induction hob, stainless steel extractor hood, fridge with freezer compartment, combi oven and a dishwasher, and the dining table and sleeping/sitting area. The living area has patio doors with a French balcony with a wonderful unobstructed view.  The space in the house has been cleverly used. For example, the dining table can easily be rotated a quarter turn (just like the lamps hanging above it) to create extra space. The bed is cleverly concealed under the custom-made seating area, with plenty of storage space. The marmoleum floor has a cork subfloor with underfloor heating. Natural materials have also been used for the wall finish.  The complex has a closed bicycle shed with 2 own bicycle places. In addition to the (covered) roof terraces, there is also a communal courtyard.  Association of Owners The Owners Association (VvE) Villa Mokum building 1 and 4 (being a subdivision) has 348 homes, 45 parking spaces and a commercial space. It is an active VvE and the professional management is done by MVGM. There is a multi-year maintenance plan (MJOP). The service costs are € 48.42 per month.  House details • Well maintained, practically arranged studio of 29 m² • Delivered in 2014 • Located on the fifth floor • French balcony on the east with patio doors • Videophone installation • Double (insulating) HR glazing • Well insulated home • Marmoleum floor with underfloor heating • Kitchen equipped with washing machine and dishwasher • Energy label A • Annual lease payments amount to € 2,178.32 and are indexed annually • The switch to perpetual leasehold with a fixed ground rent has been completed • WOZ value € 269,000 (reference date 1-1-2022)  Building details • Bicycle parking in the basement with 2 own bicycles • Two lifts available • Communal garden with various seating areas • Various roof terraces • Active VVE with a professional manager  Villa Mokum The residential building Villa Mokum was built in 2011-2014 and consists of 627 studios, 348 of which are owner-occupied homes, commercial spaces on the ground floor and an underground parking garage. Villa Mokum was designed by Kapman Architects on behalf of AM. The building has a beautiful communal courtyard and various roof terraces on the floors. In 2016, the project won the Nieuwbouwprijs from the municipality of Amsterdam.  Environment and accessibility The Amstelkwartier is an area that is still under development, but already has many hot spots that are also visited by non-residents of the district, such as the recreational strip on the Amstel with the restaurants George Marina, l'Osteria and tHuis aan the Amstel, but also the Stadshaven Amstelkwartier, Rowing Association RIC, not to mention the cycling and walking route along the Amstel, one side into the city and the other side out of the city. The new Bella Vista Park has the monumental historic water tower as its centerpiece.  The apartment is located within the ring road and is very easily accessible by both car and public transport. By car you can reach the Ringweg A10 in 5 minutes via the Spaklerweg. The metro stop is across the street and it is only 1 stop to the Amstel NS station. You can reach the center within 10 minutes by bike.  Seller tells What makes the current resident enjoy living here and why did they decide to sell the house? The seller tells.  When did you buy the house and why did you decide to buy this house? My name is Carlos and despite my Spanish name I have Italian origins. After living in Amsterdam for years in rented rooms I had the opportunity to buy a small but independent place I could call “my home”, and I took it right away.  There are not many affordable apartments in Amsterdam and not having a high budget, this studio was the best solution. The building is located near the rental studios of film lighting equipment, and since I was a freelance working in the film industry, it was perfect for me. Though from here it's super easy to get into town not having the hustle and bustle of the city centre. Most importantly, being the first owner, the studio was nearly completely empty, for me like a blank canvas that I could draw and colour following nature and functionality. Luckily I know a good Italian craftsman who helped me bringing my vision to life.  What makes it so pleasant to live in this house and in this neighborhood? It has been very pleasant to live in this studio. It took a good year and a lot of care and effort to try to make it a nice, peaceful and tidy place. The challenge was to design a studio with the Tiny House concept in mind. To make it an efficient, experimental, functional and welcoming space. I have used ecological materials, as much as possible: natural paint, wood, hay, linoleum to feel more at ease in this modern toxic world. The versatility of the sofa/bed space and the table corner allowed me to have a lot of working surfaces for my hobby projects. In spite of the compact size of the apartment having a raised and open view from the French balcony never made me feel enclosed. More over I was never confined to my studio thanks to the nice shared garden and the many big communal terraces in the building. Great to hang out with friends and meet new people. In the warm seasons I really enjoyed the park by the Amstel and the new Bella Vista park just around the corner. To be honest the only thing I am still missing in this neighbourhood it’s a big supermarket. Luckily with the metro or the bike I have plenty of choices not so far away.  Why are you leaving / why is the house for sale? After nearly two decades away from my home country, and having done some of the experiences I wanted, it’s now time for me to leave. I want to get back to my roots and live a simpler life in the Sardinian countryside.

Ruim en licht  dubbel  bovenhuis van  107m2 gelegen  op de eerste en  tweede  verdieping. Dit 4-kamerappartement ligt op  een  uitstekende locatie met vrij uitzicht en  in  een  kindvriendelijke en gewilde  wijk.  Over de buurt:  De woning ligt aan het Voltaplein op een van de mooiste plekjes van de Watergraafsmeer. Ruimte, licht, groen voor de deur en gunstig ten opzichte van vele voorzieningen. Voor de dagelijkse boodschappen winkelt u vlakbij op het Christiaan Huygensplein of in Oostpoort met een keur aan winkels. Op de Hogeweg zijn vervolgens oo nog diverse speciaalzaken gevestigd, gewoon op loopafstand! Voor wat ontspanning of recreatie kunt u terecht in Park Frankendael of het Flevopark of natuurlijk bij een van de vele sportverenigingen de omgeving. In de Watergraafsmeer zijn horecagelegenheden te over, dus voor een hapje of drankje hoeft u nooit ver. Openbaar vervoer bevindt zich op loopafstand en NS Station Sience Park is slechts 8 minuten lopen of 2 minuten fietsen. Uitvalswegen zoals de A10, A1, A2 en A9 zijn binnen een paar autominuten bereikbaar.  Indeling appartement:  Eigen entree op de begane grond, dus geen gedeelde voordeur of trappenhuis! Entree, hal, ruime woonkamer met inbouwkasten en erker aan de voorzijde en vrij uitzicht over het Voltaplein. Aan de achterzijde bevindt zich de keuken met een schuifpui naar het balkon.   Via de trap komt u op de tweede verdieping met overloop dat toegang geeft tot alle vertrekken. Er zijn twee kleine slaapkamers met dakraam aan de voorzijde en één grote aan de achterkant die toegang geeft tot het balkon. Deze slaapkamer is ook voorzien van kastenwand. Centraal ligt de badkamer met douche, wastafel en handdoekradiator.  Vervolgens is er nog een vliering waar de CV ketel is geplaatst.   Deze dubbele bovenwoning heeft weliswaar wat aandacht nodig, maar achter die eerste indruk schuilt een fantastische en super fijne woning!  Het appartement is onderdeel van de VvE Voltaplein / Faradaystraat te Amsterdam. De administratie wordt professioneel gevoerd door MVGM. Er wordt periodiek vergaderd en er is een MJOP beschikbaar.  Erfpacht: De woning is gelegen op erfpachtgrond, eigendom van de gemeente Amsterdam. De overstap naar eeuwigdurende erfpacht onder de gunstige voorwaarden van de gemeente is gemaakt, waarbij gekozen is voor canonbetaling.  Het huidige tijdvak loopt nog tot en met 31 januari 2055. De erfpachtcanon voor 2023 bedraagt € 1.157,41 Op het recht van erfpacht zijn de algemene bepalingen voor eeuwigdurende erfpacht 2016 van toepassing.  Kenmerken:  - Gelegen op erfpachtgrond, eigendom van de gemeente Amsterdam. - Energielabel E, geldig tot 24-01-2033 - 3 slaapkamers - Servicekosten € 132,03 per maand - Zeer gunstige ligging - Oplevering in overleg, maar kan op korte termijn  In de koopovereenkomst wordt onder andere een niet-zelfbewoningsclausule (de eigenaar heeft de woning niet zelf bewoond), een ouderdomsclausule en een asbestclausule opgenomen. Tevens zal worden opgenomen dat de koper de woning aanvaardt "as-is".  Disclaimer: De gebruiksoppervlakte zoals vermeld in de (verkoop)informatie en/of de aanmelding op Funda is berekend conform de branche vastgestelde meetinstructie (BBMI) afgeleid van de NEN 2580-norm. De oppervlakte kan derhalve afwijken van vergelijkbare panden en/of oude referenties. Dit heeft in voorkomende gevallen met name te maken met deze meetmethode. Bij het tot stand komen van een koopovereenkomst verklaart (aspirant) koper voldoende te zijn geïnformeerd over de hiervoor bedoelde normering.  123makelaar heeft zich ingespannen om de juiste oppervlakte en inhoud te bereken aan de hand van eigen metingen, metingen van een professioneel bedrijf en dit zoveel mogelijk te ondersteunen door het publiceren van plattegronden met maatvoering. Mocht de maatvoering onverhoopt niet (volledig) overeenkomstig de normering zijn vastgesteld of afwijken van eventuele toekomstige metingen, wordt dit uitdrukkelijk door (aspirant) koper aanvaard. Verschillen in de opgegeven maat en grootte geven geen der partijen enig recht, uitdrukkelijk ook niet met betrekking tot eventuele aanpassing van de koopsom. We are delighted  to  offer you  a VERY  EXCLUSIVE PENTHOUSE WITH ROOF  TERRACE  in the heart of Amsterdam.  This  luxury penthouse is located in a  representative  monumental  building, in  a quiet street in one of the top locations of Amsterdam, where peace and privacy are guaranteed both in the house and on the roof terrace. From the chic entrance on the ground floor, take the elevator which leads directly into the hall of the apartment. The luxury and atmosphere of this beautiful apartment provide ultimate living pleasure.  Location The penthouse is located in an idyllic part of Amsterdam in the Rapenburgerstraat, near the Nieuwmarkt, Rembrandtplein, the Stopera and Artis. For your daily shopping you can go to the organic supermarket Ekoplaza on the Waterlooplein or the Jumbo and Albert Heijn on the Jodenbreestraat. The cozy Utrechtsestraat with many specialty shops is within walking distance. For fun and relaxation you can visit the nearby Royal Theater Carré, the Hermitage, the Muziektheater, the Kleine Komedie and numerous nice restaurants. You can also take a lovely walk in the nearby Wertheim Park, located in the Plantagebuurt opposite the Hortus Botanicus.  Accessibility: Own transport: by car you can reach the Amsterdam Ring A-10 in no time via the Piet Heijntunnel, Weesperstraat or the IJ tunnel. Parking is possible with a parking permit in the street or in the Markenhoven parking garage, a large-capacity covered parking garage just a stone's throw away. Public transport: There is no better location imaginable. A well-staffed taxi rank at the Muziektheater. Tram and bus stops and the metro station at Waterlooplein provide excellent connections to the Amsterdam public transport network. Amsterdam Central Station is less than 5 minutes by bike or a 15-minute walk.  Description The penthouse reaches over the entire surface of the building on the 4th and top floor. The total net living area is approximately 149 m2. You will reach the apartment through the chic entrance on the ground floor, where you enter a spacious central entrance hall with a well-maintained staircase with carpeted stairs, marble floors and decorative panelling. From the entrance on the ground floor, take the elevator, which leads directly into the hall of the penthouse (can be closed with an extra entrance door).  Fourth floor: entrance hall, which provides access to all rooms: separate toilet with fountain, library and a spacious living room. The living room is located at the front on the Northwest. The two large windows at the front and the long windows in the hood provide extra light. There is room for a cozy living room around the fireplace and a long dining table where you can dine and talk for hours. The walls are beautifully finished and tastefully painted in Farrow & Ball and Dulux colours. Characteristic in the living room are the high beamed ceilings, a fireplace, a Jatoba wooden floor and a characteristic open truss construction. Because the windows in the hood are equipped with light and heat-resistant screens, it always stays cool inside, even in summer!  The master bedroom is located at the quiet rear and has access to the spacious walk-in closet that offers space for an extensive wardrobe, and on the other side has access to the bathroom with walk-in shower, double sink with a large mirror and lots of extra cupboard space using the sloping roof. The bathroom is also accessible to guests from the hallway. The sanitary facilities, bathroom and separate toilet are modern & warmly finished with concrete ciré.  The kitchen is handmade by traditional kitchen maker De Zeug. Every detail with regard to comfort and storage space has really been thought through here. The lovely sitting / dining table bench has storage space, the china cabinet is equipped with LED lighting and there is a cozy seat in the bay window where you can enjoy the morning sun. In addition to the china cabinet, a walk-in storage cupboard has been created so that the kitchen counter only serves for the usual storage. The Falcon stove is the eye-catcher in the kitchen block, where a custom-made chimney hood hangs above and in the corner there is a handy storage cupboard under the sloping hood. The Perron & Rowe tap provides a classic look to the solid terrazzo worktop with solid sink that was poured at location. A Novy extraction unit is built into the hood with LED lighting on remote control. The Frisian white tiles on the entire back wall, wooden knobs and the Schumacher wallpaper with an Asian theme behind the sofa complete the picture.  The entire apartment has a lot of cupboard and storage space, including a separate work area with connection for washing machine and dryer, where the central heating boiler is also located.  Fifth floor: stairs to the top, landing, 2 large bedrooms, one of which is used as an office space and guest room with plenty of cupboard space in the sloping area and the other as a TV room, which gives access to the spacious roof terrace.  The roof terrace is (11 meters) long and 3 meters wide in the middle part. It is sheltered by buildings on both sides, so that the terrace can be used in almost all weather conditions. The roof terrace is accessible through double French doors. You can enjoy the sun on the roof terrace from morning to evening. With a staircase you reach the top roof from which you have a beautiful unobstructed view over a large part of the city and you can enjoy a drink when the sun goes down.  Installations There is a video intercom at the central entrance, the front door can be opened electrically from the hall of the penthouse. Alarm system and fixed safe.  Building: The monumental complex dates from about 1890. In 2002 the entire complex was converted into houses and adapted to the requirements of today.  Insulation provision: The house has double glazing on the fifth floor, monument glass has been installed on the fourth floor.  Ownership situation: The apartment is located on private land.  Owners Association: Association of Owners "Rapenburgerstraat 167" in Amsterdam. The service costs are € 398 per month. It is a very active and healthy Owners Association  Particularities: - Luxury Penthouse - National monument; - Year of construction circa 1890; - Spacious roof terrace; - Own ground; - Energy label D: - Delivery in consultation;  The property has been measured in accordance with NEN2580. This Measurement Instruction is intended to apply a more unambiguous method of measurement to give an indication of the usage surface. The Measurement Instruction does not completely exclude differences in measurement results, for example due to interpretation differences, rounding off or limitations when performing the measurement.  This information has been compiled with the necessary care. However, we do not accept any liability for any incompleteness, inaccuracy or otherwise, or the consequences thereof. All specified sizes and surfaces are indicative. The buyer has his own obligation to investigate all matters that are important to him. With regard to this property, our office is the broker of the seller. We advise you to engage an NVM / MVA broker who will assist you with his expertise in the purchasing process. If you do not wish to engage professional guidance, you consider yourself expert enough by law to be able to oversee all matters that are important. The General Consumer Terms and Conditions of the NVM apply.

A unique and  bright  family home  in a  prime location with a  large  backyard and spacious roof terrace.  The  house is centrally located on the  Grote  Rieteiland  in a  quiet street within walking distance of the shopping center, Diemerpark and various primary schools.   The parking space in the adjacent parking lot is offered separately for € 25.000,--  Layout: Ground floor Entrance hall with fusebox, floating toilet with hand basin. Entry into the kitchen with space for a large dining table which is perfect for an evening of dining. The modern open kitchen provides the connection between the kitchen en living room. The kitchen is equipped with various built-in appliances including a dishwasher, induction hob, extractor (outwards), fridge, freezer, Quooker and combi oven/microwave. The living room is accessible from the kitchen, which has been expanded at the rear. The large windows on this floor provide plenty of light. The ground floor has underfloor heating. Through the living room through the patio doors access to the backyard with shed and back.   First floor Spacious landing with a practical storage cupboard, three well-sized bedrooms, bathroom with shower, sink and second toilet.   Second floor  Landing with storage space in the stairwell, spacious master bedroom, second bathroom with bath with shower, sink and washing machine connection. The sunny roof terrace of approx. 20 m² can be reached via the landing.   Surroundings: The Mattenbiesstraat is a quiet street on the "Grote Rieteiland". An island with only low-rise buildings and mainly homes from the higher segment. The islands are surrounded by waterways and bathing water, the primary school is withing walking distance, the Diemerpark is around the corner and in addition to numerous shops, there are also many catering establishments on IJburg. Every Saturday there is a local market "Reuring market" on Joris Ivensplein.   The accessibility of IJburg is excellent with tram line 26 you can reach Central Station in less than fifteen minutes and bus 66 runs to the Arena in about 15 minutes. By car you can reach the ring road A-10, A-1, A-2 and Schiphol Airport via various roads.   Particularities: • Surface area approx. 139 m2; • Favorable layout with four bedrooms; • Underfloor heating on the ground floor; • Asking price for parking space € 25.000; • Service costs parking space € 80,16 per quarter; • Ground lease surrendered until January 15, 2052; • Garden and roof terrace on the northeast; • Heating and hot water through district heating; • Energy label A; • 8 solar panels; • Roofs of the extension and shed are fitted with a green sedum roof; • Delivery in consultation.

Gelegen op de  vierde  en tevens  hoogste woonlaag  kijkt dit aantrekkelijke, lichte  hoekappartement  van 65 m² met twee  balkons  uit over een rustige Amsterdamse buurt.  De woning is gelegen in  een typische jaren '50 wijk, kindvriendelijk en aan een rustige weg in Slotermeer. Deze portiekflat is geheel gemoderniseerd, oorspronkelijk een appartement met twee slaapkamers (nog steeds mogelijk) maar thans met één slaapkamer en een ruime werkkamer. De sfeervolle woonkamer is heerlijk licht door een extra raam in de kopgevel en heeft zowel aan de voor- als achterzijde een balkon. De moderne keuken is uitgerust met inbouwapparatuur en de slaapkamer beschikt over een ruime vaste kast. De badkamer is voorzien van een douche, wastafel en wasmachine aansluiting. Er is een apart toilet. Het appartement heeft deels dubbel glas en is licht afgewerkt. Op de begane grond van het gebouw bevindt zich een berging. Er is voldoende parkeergelegenheid in de buurt. Op 5 minuten loopafstand bevindt zich station Sloterdijk en met 15 minuten fietsen ben je in hartje centrum. Scholen, winkels, de markt en het Westerpark zijn in de directe omgeving te vinden. De woning is goed bereikbaar via openbaar vervoer en gelegen aan uitvalswegen op korte afstand van de ring. Kortom: 'hop on hop of' van en naar je werk. De nieuwe eigenaar koopt een appartementsrecht, hetgeen eenvoudig te financieren is.   Bouwjaar: 1954 Woonoppervlakte: 65 m² Inhoud: 224 m³  Indeling: Begane grond: hoofdentree met bellenbord, trappenhuis en postbussen; 4e verdieping: entree, gang, meterkast, slaapkamer, werkkamer, toilet, badkamer, keuken, woonkamer met twee balkons.   Bijzonderheden: * mooie ligging op de 4e verdieping met berging op de begane grond * moderne afwerking * twee balkons zuid en noord  * lichte woonkamer door kopgevelraam * leuke woonomgeving * servicekosten € 145,00 per maand * Voortdurend recht van erfpacht van de gemeente Amsterdam, algemene bepalingen van 2000 zijn van toepassing. Canon bedraagt € 29,54 per half jaar, herziening per 30-4-2029

Ruime eengezinswoning in  Gein-3  met berging  en tuin  achter, op een mooie  locatie  want aan het eind van  het  loop-fietspad (600m) ben je bij het  recreatiegebied Gaasperplas  met park en strand. Een opknapper maar dit huistype is wel extra geïsoleerd door de houten opbouw en de ramen met 3-laagsglasuitvoering. De bgg en 1ste etage bestaan uit betonvloeren en wanden, de houten voorzijde is vervangen door duurzaam en onderhoudsvrij Keralit.  De wijk ligt gunstig nabij winkels, markt, sportcentrum, medischcentrum, alles is relatief dichtbij zoals ook de winkelcentra Reigersbos en Amsterdamse Poort met 10 minuten op de fiets. Door de buslijn 47 en metrostation met metro 50 en 54 op loopafstand is deze woning zeer goed bereikbaar met het openbaar vervoer.  Gratis parkeren in de straat en snelle bereikbaarheid door de goede aansluiting op de ringwegen.   Indeling De huidige indeling van de woning is 5-kamers met een ruime zolderkamer die ideaal is om uit te breiden met een dakkapel. Eventueel voor én achter en dan kunnen er zelfs twee kamers gerealiseerd worden.   Beganegrond Entree met meterkast, trap naar 1ste etage, toilet met fonteintje en entree naar de woonkamer en keuken. Ruime woonkamer voorzien van vloerverwarming, de praktische trapkast en toegang naar de tuin. Open inbouwkeuken, prettig licht vanuit het grote voorraam  Eerste verdieping 2 slaapkamers achter en 1x voor. Alle kamers hebben een groot kantelraam. Een betegelde badkamer met douchecabine, wastafelmeubel, het 2e toilet en radiator.   Tweede verdieping Een ruime etage met de cv-installatie, mechanische ventilatie en werk en bergruimte voor wasmachine en droger en een ruime slaapkamer met veluxraam. De zolder kan evt. ook ingedeeld worden in twee slaapkamers met zelfs een dakkapel voor en achter.   Tuin Tuin achter met s'morgens de zon. Voorzien van ruime berging en met een achterom.   Detailinformatie Bouwjaar: 1986 Woonoppervlakte: ca. 102 m2. Perceelgrootte: 102 m2. Aantal kamers: 5 over 3 verdiepingen. CV installatie: Intergas van 2003. Erfpacht is afgekocht tot 15 april 2036.

***English text below***   Live genieten  vanuit jouw  woonkamer van de vier  seizoenen  van het jaar? Dat kan!  Wij  bieden een prachtig 3-kamerappartement (51 m²)  aan  dat  DIRECT aan het  Erasmuspark is gelegen. De woning is gesitueerd op eigen grond en beschikt over een breed balkon gelegen op het zuidwesten.   Kortom een ideale woning en wij nodigen je dan ook graag uit om deze woning met ons te bezichtigen!  OMGEVING:  Het appartement is gelegen aan een rustige en groene straat tussen de bruisende Baarsjes en stadsdeel Bos en Lommer in. De woning is direct gelegen aan het Erasmuspark en ook het Rembrandtpark is op luttele minuten loopafstand te bereiken. Op loopafstand vind je de gezellige Jan Evertsenstraat, het Mercatorplein en het Bos en Lommerplein Voor uw dagelijkse boodschappen met een diversiteit aan leuke winkels en goede en gezellige restaurants. Amsterdam Centrum is in 10 minuten bereikbaar per fiets en binnen enkele minuten ben je met de auto op ringweg A10. Ook ten opzichten van het openbaar vervoer heeft de woning een ideale ligging!  INDELING   De woning is gelegen op de tweede etage. De royale L-vormige woonkamer is gelegen aan de voorzijde en is circa 6 meter breed. De grote ramen aan de parkzijde zorgen voor veel lichtinval en bieden een werkelijk fenomenaal uitzicht over het weidse en groene Erasmuspark. Aan de tuinzijde bevinden zich twee slaapkamers. Ook de keuken met diverse inbouwapparatuur bevindt zich aan de tuinzijde. Het achtergelegen balkon dat vanuit de slaapkamers en keuken te bereiken is, bevindt zich op het zonnige zuidwesten. Hier kunt u vanaf de vroege middag tot zonsondergang van de zon genieten. Een ruime hal, een mooie eikenhouten vloer in bijna de gehele woning alsmede een volledig uitgeruste en recent gerenoveerde badkamer (2022) maken het geheel af.  BIJZONDERHEDEN  Verwarming / warmwater Verwarming en warmwater geschieden door middel van een cv-installatie, Intergas HrE 22 uit 2023  Bouwjaar Het bouwjaar van het pand is 1932.  Onderhoud De woning is zowel intern als extern goed onderhouden.   Milieu Milieubezwarende verontreinigingen zijn niet bekend.  Eigen grond/erfpacht Het appartement ligt op eigen grond!  Vereniging van Eigenaren De administratie wordt gevoerd door een van de leden.  De servicekosten bedragen € 60,- per maand.   Oplevering  Oplevering in overleg.  ***English text***  Would you like to watch the seasons change from the comfort of your living room? Now you can! We are proud to offer this stunning 2-bedroom apartment (51 m2) boasting UNOBSTRUCTED VIEWS of the beautiful Erasmuspark. The property sits on freehold land and includes a broad southwest-facing balcony.   In short, this apartment can hardly be more perfect, and we kindly invite you to arrange a viewing so we can show you around!  SURROUNDING AREA:  The apartment is located on a quiet and leafy street between the bustling De Baarsjes and Bos en Lommer neighbourhoods. The building is right across the Erasmuspark and also the vast Rembrandtpark is basically around the corner. The Jan Evertsenstraat, Mercatorplein, and Bos en Lommerplein are within walking distance and offer a vast range of supermarkets, great shops, and trendy cafés and restaurants. The city centre of Amsterdam is a mere 10-minute bike ride and the A10 Ring is only a few minutes by car. On top of that, the apartment is perfectly located if you want to travel by public transport!  LAYOUT  The apartment is on the second floor of the apartment block. The generously sized L-shaped living room is at the front and has a width of approx. 6 metres. The large windows let in lots of natural light and offer spectacular views of the green Erasmuspark. The two bedrooms are at the back and look out onto the courtyard gardens. The kitchen, also at the rear of the house, comes with various built-in appliances. The kitchen and the bedrooms all have access to the southwest-facing balcony – a delightful spot to enjoy the sun from early afternoon to sundown. The spacious hallway, the beautiful oak flooring is nearly all the rooms, and the fully renovated bathroom (2022) make this apartment a highly attractive proposition.  SPECIAL FEATURES  Heating/hot water Heating and hot water are provided by an Intergas HrE 22 central heating/boiler unit (2023)  Year of construction 1932  Maintenance The apartment is well maintained, both internally and externally.   Environment There are no known environmental issues.  Freehold land/leasehold The apartment sits on freehold land!  Homeowners’ Association (VvE) The VvE is privately managed by one of the members.  The service charges are €60 per month.   Transfer Transfer date in consultation.

This attractive and  bright  3-room corner  apartment is  located in the lively  Erasmuspark.  It is a well-insulated apartment  (energy  label B) with a sunny southwest-facing balcony, a  modern open  kitchen and a spacious storage room/office. The house is in very good condition (completely renovated in 2014). The leasehold canon has been bought off up to and including 2063 and can be secured after this period under favourable conditions.  The apartment is located in the quiet and green Erasmuspark neighbourhood in Amsterdam West district. The neighbourhood offers several nice coffee shops, cafes and restaurants such as Mosaic, Terrasmus, Eetwinkel Buurman & Buurman, and MasMais Taqueria & Marisqueria. The nearby canal offers opportunities for having a boat or even taking a refreshing dip. In short, a wonderfully ready-to-move-in bright home in a popular, nice neighbourhood with all amenities within reach!  Layout: Second floor You reach the second floor via a shared staircase. Through the entrance, you enter a spacious hall with access to all rooms. The living room with a view of the Erasmuspark is located at the front and is a beautiful, light space due to the large windows and corner location. The open kitchen creates a cosy effect and is equipped with various built-in appliances (dishwasher, combination microwave/oven, refrigerator). The largest bedroom is located at the rear and has access to the balcony through patio doors where you can enjoy the afternoon and evening sun. There is also access to a French balcony from the second (bed) room, with two large tilt-and-turn windows. The modern and spacious bathroom has a walk-in shower, sink, connection for washing machine and dryer, and a door to the balcony. A separate toilet can also be reached from the hallway. This entire floor has a parquet wooden floor which gives the apartment a warm appearance.  Fourth floor On this floor, you will find an external private storage room of 7 m², with a (double glass) window for natural daylight and ventilation. You can use this space as a separate work/study room.  Environment: Bos en Lommer is in full swing, it is currently one of the fastest-developing parts of Amsterdam. There are all kinds of original initiatives, striking new projects and cultural festivities. The Wachterliedplantsoen is very popular among young families. Sports lessons are given here, there is a children's café with fun activities, a petting zoo and a playground. For shopping, you can walk to the Bos & Lommerweg and the Jan Evertsenstraat with its supermarkets, market, caterers, bakeries and other shops for everyday necessities. The house is located in the vicinity of the famous and popular Westerpark and Rembrandtpark. The Jordaan and the centre of Amsterdam are fifteen minutes by bike.  Accessibility: The connections to the city and beyond are particularly good, you can reach the A10 ring road in a few minutes by car, without the associated noise pollution. There are good bus connections and tram 19 stops practically in front of the door, which takes you to Sloterdijk station or, for example, Leidseplein within a few minutes. You can reach Schiphol Airport in 10 minutes from Sloterdijk station by train. You can park your car in front of the door, a parking permit is generally available immediately!  Particularities: - Built in 1940 - Corner location with sunny southwest-facing balcony - Living area 46.1m² in accordance with NEN-2580 - Spacious external storage room (work/study room) on the 4th floor of 7.3 m² - Energy label B - Two bedrooms - The building was completely renovated in 2014 - Deed of division from 2013 - Fully equipped with double glazing - No waiting time for obtaining a parking permit - Annual lease payments surrendered up to and including April 30, 2063 with the option to switch to perpetual leasehold under favourable conditions - Professionally managed VvE with a multi-year maintenance plan - VvE contribution € 143 per month - Delivery in consultation

YES! Attractive 4-room  ground  floor apartment  with large  sunny garden located in  a  popular location in the Hoofddorppleinbuurt  in  the South district. The apartment has  a  spacious,  bright living room  with open kitchen at the rear and three bedrooms. The spacious garden is located on the southeast and has a lot of privacy. The apartment is located near the Hoofddorpplein with all kinds of shops, supermarkets, cosy terraces and nice coffee shops. And not unimportant, the apartment is located on own ground!  PARTICULARITIES - The apartment was renovated in 2019; - The building was divided in 2020; - The apartment is located on OWN GROUND; - Excellent location in the popular Hoofddorppleinbuurt; - The garden offers plenty of space, privacy and is located on the southeast; - The living area is approximately 77 m² and has 3 bedrooms; - Non-occupancy clause, age clause and as is, where is clause are applicable.  LAYOUT The apartment is located on the ground floor and has the following layout;  Living spaces - Entrance hall with meter cupboard with access to all rooms; - The spacious living room is located at the rear of the apartment and provides access to the spacious garden through the imposing sliding doors; - The fine, partially open kitchen is equipped with BOSCH: refrigerator, freezer, 5-burner gas stove with extractor fan, oven and a dishwasher.  Outdoor space - Lovely spacious backyard of approx. 30 m² with lots of privacy, located on the southeast; - There is sun in the garden from in the morning until about 4 p.m.  Sleeping quarters - The apartment has 3 bedrooms; - The master bedroom is located at the front and offers an attractive view of the Woubruggestraat.  Sanitary - The bathroom is equipped with; a walk-in shower with glass wall, a double sink with mirror above and design radiator; - Separate toilet with sink.  Other - The apartment also has a separate laundry room; - A practical storage room.  OWNERS ASSOCIATION - The VvE consists of 4 apartment rights; - The VvE is under own management; - The service costs are € 119,50 per month; - There is an MJOP present.  LOCATION - Located in the popular 'Hoofddorppleinbuurt' in Amsterdam South; - A neighborhood with a village character where everyone likes to come and feel right at home; - The beautiful Vondelpark within walking distance and close to the Westlandgracht; - In the vicinity of AH, Marqt, Dirk, Stach and nice local shops; - Hip coffee shops are plentiful, such as Vascobelo, Pipes & Beans, Anne & Max; - Nice restaurants and cafés, such as Stadscafé van Mechelen, Foodbar 63, Lokaal van de Stad, Rons Gastrobar and Gent aan de Schinkel; - In short: living in a quiet neighborhood with all amenities within easy reach.  SURFACE - The usable area for living is 77,3 m²; NB. The specified surface has been measured by a specialized company in accordance with NEN2580.  BUILD VALUE & TECHNICAL DETAILS - Year of construction: 1929; - Traditional architectural style with brick facades; - Wooden frames with double glazing; - Hot water and heating through central heating boiler (Brand: Remeha, Year of construction: 2019); - Electricity: modern group cabinet with sufficient groups.  OWN GROUND The apartment is located on own ground!  CADASTER & DIVIDING - Cadastral known: municipality of Sloten, section C, number 3545, A-1; - The apartment was split into 4 apartment rights on 18-12-2020; - The apartment right A-1 is entitled to 75/229th share in the community.  ACCESSIBILITY & PARKING - The apartment is easily accessible by car from the ring road A-10 via the S-107; - Public transport is well organized here and takes you to all parts of the city: tram line 2, bus line 15 and 62 and 358; - Lelylaan station is only a 5-minute bike ride from the apartment; - Paid parking is available on public roads from 9:00 am to 12:00 pm (see also the website of the municipality of Amsterdam).

Comfortable and bright  duplex  top floor  apartment with  a private parking space  in  the popular Eastern Docklands!  The  spacious apartment includes a living floor  with  an  adjoining sunny balcony  (1.65 mtrs deep) on the West and a bedroom floor with 3 well-sized bedrooms. The leasehold has been bought off in perpetuity!  LOCATION The Eastern Docklands is characterized by spaciousness, historical and industrial accents combined with modern architecture. It is loved by (young) families, but is also very popular with people who appreciate peace, space and water with everything within reach. It is very nice living here!  For daily shopping, the Brazil shopping center is within walking distance with an organic market every Wednesday. There is also a deli on Van Eesterenlaan. Get flowers on the corner and the Javastraat with a variety of trendy catering establishments, boutiques and galleries is also quickly accessible. The range of restaurants in the Eastern Docklands is also becoming increasingly diverse: there is something for everyone: from multi-cultural to fine dining.  Also within walking distance is the green Flevopark with various restaurants, a tennis court and an outdoor swimming pool.  By bike and/or public transport, you reach the city center within 15 minutes in the center and Central Station within 10 minutes. One enters the A10 ring road within a few minutes by car via the Piet Hein tunnel.  You can park in your own parking space in the parking garage. What a luxury: no more searching for a spot in the street!  LAYOUT The entrance of the building is located on Borneolaan where you can take the elevator and / or stairs up to the third floor. You reach the apartment through a communal hall and gallery. Immediately upon entering, the pleasant atmosphere and the light catch the eye!  The spacious hall with open staircase to the bedroom floor provides access to both the kitchen and the living room and is equipped with a toilet with hand basin.  The neat yet simple kitchen is located on the gallery side and features separate equipment such as a gas stove with oven and a fridge-freezer combination. In the kitchen there is room for a cozy table by the window, for example to have breakfast in the morning.  The kitchen is now separated from the living room, but this wall is very easy to remove if you prefer an open kitchen. The living room is super bright through the large sliding doors to the sunken balcony and offers more than enough space for a sitting area and a dining table.  The balcony faces West, which means you enjoy the afternoon and evening sun.  The upper floor consists of 3 bedrooms, a bathroom and an indoor storage room.  The master bedroom at the front is spacious at over 15 m2, but the 2 bedrooms at the rear (10 m2 and 9 m2 respectively) are also very useful for children and as a work- or guest room.  The bathroom is neatly finished and equipped with a granito floor. There is a corner shower, a sink and a connection for the washing machine. The walls are provided with attractive (metro) tiles and the space is well maintained. In addition to the bathroom, the apartment has an indoor storage space that served as a walk-in closet.  The apartment is very neatly inhabited and the whole is well maintained. The concrete building floor is painted gray, the walls are plastered and the ceiling sprayed.  The central heating boiler is old and will be replaced this year (via the HOA). Seller participates in solar panels on the roof of the building.   Under the building is an external storage room of almost 7.5 m2, ideal for suitcases, tools and items that you do not need every day.  You never have to worry about parking again, you buy the apartment including its own parking space, which is located right next to the entrance door to the stairwell. Such a luxury!  All residents of the building have access to the communal courtyard, a nice place to enjoy yourself and possibly let children play.  The HOA consists of 64 apartments and 20 parking spaces and is professionally managed by VvE Beheer Amsterdam. The monthly service costs are € 218 for the apartment and the parking space together.  The leasehold situation is ideal for this apartment: the seller has bought off the leasehold for both the house and the parking space in perpetuity.  In short: a well laid-out apartment with 3 bedrooms (an exception in the Eastern Docklands in this price range!), sunny balcony and private parking. And you will never pay ground lease again! * English text  below*   Schitterend  high end  gerenoveerd benedenhuis in Oud  Zuid  van 141 M2 ( inclusief  vrijstaand  tuinhuis van ca 10 m2) met 3 slaapkamers,  2 badkamers  en heerlijke brede tuin op het zuiden van 65 m2. Het appartement is gelegen op een fantastische locatie in Zuid. U hoeft alleen nog maar uw koffers te pakken en verhuizen maar, want ook een groot deel van de meubels kunt u overnemen!  OMGEVING De Tintorettostraat, een van de meest geliefde locaties in Amsterdam Oud-Zuid. Een rustige straat met vele faciliteiten in de buurt. Zo liggen de winkelstraten als de Beethovenstraat, Olympiaplein, Cornelis Schuytstraat en de PC Hooftstraat om de hoek. Een bezoek aan het Rijksmuseum, het van Gogh museum of het concertgebouw is vanaf hier snel gemaakt en de parken als het Vondelpark, het Beatrixpark en het Amstelpark liggen op loopafstand. In de directe omgeving liggen de beste scholen van Amsterdam, waaronder een aantal basisscholen, middelbare scholen en de British School. Zowel met de auto (ringweg A10, afslag S108) als met het openbaar vervoer is de woning zeer goed bereikbaar. Het station Zuid/WTC is op enkele minuten van de woning gelegen.   INDELING Eigen entree Wat direct opvalt is de breedte van bijna 10 meter. Via de entree betreedt u de hal.  Het huis is opgedeeld met aan de rechterkant de slaapkamers met twee badkamers en aan de linkerkant het woongedeelte. De gezellige woonkamer ligt aan de voorkant. De ruimte tussen de woonkamer en de aansluitende keuken kunt u afsluiten door origineel geplaatste halfronde deuren. De keuken is het hart van het huis en bevindt zich in het midden van de ruimte, voorzien van het mooiste marmer en volledig op maat gemaakt. Ter hoogte van de keuken is een hoek gecreëerd met een bureau met ernaast de gashaard. Aan de achterzijde, aangrenzend aan de keuken bevindt zich de eetkamer. Door de sfeervolle harmonica pui, kunnen de deuren volledig open en wordt de tuin die op het zuiden ligt perfect verbonden met het huis. In de hal de garderobe en gastentoilet.  In het rechtergedeelte bevinden zich aan de voorkant twee kinderslaapkamers met inbouwkasten. De kinderen hebben een eigen badkamer met douche en wastafel. Hiernaast bevindt zich ook een prettige berging met wasmachine, droger en combi koelkast/vriezer. Aan de achterzijde de master bedroom ook weer met mooie grote inbouwkasten en eigen badkamer met bad, douche, wc en dubbele wastafel en aparte wc. Deze slaapkamer heeft openslaande deuren naar de tuin. In de achtertuin staat een tuinhuis, die nu dient als kantoorruimte.    Door het gehele appartement mooie inbouwkasten en er ligt een prachtige vloer met vloerverwarming. Lovely and well-maintained  3-room  apartment of  65 m²  with a great view  over  the Postjeswetering and the Rembrandtpark.  The  characteristic apartment is located on the  second  floor  and has  a spacious living room, 2 bedrooms, semi open kitchen, bathroom and a pleasant east-facing balcony. In addition, the apartment is located on its own ground, there is always parking and you have the option of a boat in front of the door!  Be sure to check out our virtual tour as well.  The apartment is located in the quiet and stylish part of the Baarsjes with a diversity of shops and cozy restaurants. Various shopping facilities, including Albert Heijn and a bakery, are within walking distance. A little further, the Vondelpark is just a few minutes away. In the area there are various entertainment and dining options such as: the well-known Café Edel, Café Oslo, Bar Kosta and Café Zurich. There are also several well-known gyms within walking distance, including David Lloyd. The space is very easy to reach by public transport and car. Around the corner from the Hoofdweg and within walking distance you will find various boarding points for public transport (bus 15,18 and tram 17). With 15 minutes by bike you reach Amsterdam Central where there are many train, metro, tram and bus connections. By car you are on the A10 (S106) in no time.  Layout: Through the general entrance you enter the communal staircase. Through the front door of the apartment on the second floor you enter the hall, which gives access to: the living room, semi open kitchen, bathroom, toilet and the first bedroom. The kitchen is equipped with various built-in appliances including: an oven, a four-burner gas hob, dishwasher, fridge with separate freezer and washing machine connection. The living room with bay window has a beautiful view over Postjeswetering and the Rembrandt Park, the living room also gives access to the second bedroom. The separate toilet is equipped with a wall closet and sink. Then the bathroom, which is equipped with a bath, shower, design radiator and a washbasin with furniture. The house is well maintained and is finished with smooth plastered walls and ceiling (with trim) and laminate floor with oak look. Both the bedroom at the rear and the kitchen diner give you access to the lovely balcony.  Balcony; This house has a house-wide balcony, located on the east. So it is wonderful to stay here in the morning sun.  Owners Association: Active and healthy VvE; Consisting of 4 apartment rights; MJOP present. The monthly VvE contribution € 68 per month;  Particularities: - Located on private land, built in 1936; - Living area of ??approximately 65 m²; - Fully equipped with smooth stucco and beautiful panel doors; - Beautiful location with an amazing view over the waterway and the Rembrandtpark; - Modern groups cabinet with 8 groups and 2 earth leakage switches; - Central heating boiler, Intergas HR built in 2009; - Located on the waterway in the popular West district; - Delivery in consultation.  Sellers experience: For 6 years we have enjoyed the house, the view, the park, the neighborhood and the water at the Postjeskade with great pleasure. In the heart of Amsterdam, together with neighbors and friends, swimming, BBQing and enjoying for young and old. Every day a view of the greenery, always parking in front of the door and yet in the middle of the city. We have been super happy here, first with the two of us in our twenties and later in our thirties with a family with 2 small children. With pain in our hearts we leave this nice house in a beautiful place. We hope for nice buyers who will be as happy here as we are!  In short, this apartment is definitely worth a visit! We would like to invite you to view the house!

Superleuk appartement op  een  geweldige locatie!  In het  hart van het bruisende  Amsterdam  Oud-West ligt dit sfeervolle en  goed  onderhouden hoekappartement van 54 m2 in  karakteristieke Amsterdamse  stijl. Het is gelegen op de vierde verdieping (kap verdieping) en beschikt over een dakterras. Door de vele raampartijen aan zowel de voor- als zijkanten is er veel lichtinval. Het appartement is in 2020 volledig gemoderniseerd en bestaat uit een ruime woonkamer met een open keuken (voorzien van vaatwasser, oven, inductiekookplaat, koelkast en vriezer), zitkamer en heeft nu één slaapkamer. Een tweede slaapkamer is eenvoudig te realiseren. De badkamer met inloop douche, wastafelmeubel, toilet en aansluiting voor de wasmachine en droger is praktisch ingedeeld.   *** ENGLISH BELOW ***  De indeling is als volgt: Opgang vanaf de straat met op de derde verdieping de entree van het appartement. Bijzonderheden: -    	Energielabel A; -    	Zonnige hoekwoning met veel privacy -    	Volle eigendom, dus geen erfpacht; -    	Dakterras; -    	Moderne keuken, sanitair en inbouwkasten uit 2020; -    	Laminaat vloer in heel de woning; -    	Zitkamer betrokken bij woonkamer + extra inbouwkasten  -    	Airco laten plaatsen (2 units) in 2022; -    	Professionele beheerder VvE; -    	Servicekosten VvE € 133,- per maand; -    	Het appartement is goed geïsoleerd (geïsoleerde vloer, dak en dubbel glas).  Woonoppervlakte: Conform NEN2580 meting bedraagt het inpandig gebruiksoppervlak 54 m². NB. De opgegeven oppervlakte is door een gespecialiseerd bedrijf gemeten conform NEN2580.  De Meetinstructie is gebaseerd op de NEN2580. De Meetinstructie is bedoeld om een meer eenduidige manier van meten toe te passen voor het geven van een indicatie van de gebruiksoppervlakte. De Meetinstructie sluit verschillen in meetuitkomsten niet volledig uit, door bijvoorbeeld interpretatieverschillen, afrondingen of beperkingen bij het uitvoeren van de meting  Omgeving: De Jacob van Lennepstraat ligt in het populaire Hallenkwartier (het voormalige Oud West) tussen de Hallen en het Leidseplein. Binnen een paar minuten lopen zijn meerdere supermarkten, restaurants en cafe’s te vinden. Het Hallenkwartier bruist en biedt een grote diversiteit aan hippe horeca en trendy winkels. De populaire Foodhallen en Ten Katemarkt is in de buurt en een diversiteit aan andere winkels is te vinden in de Kinkerstraat. Ook het Vondelpark is dichtbij. Bereikbaarheid: Het appartement is uitstekend te bereiken met het openbaar vervoer. Op 2 minuten lopen afstand zijn de haltes van de tramlijnen 3, 7, 12, 13, 14, 17 met onder andere een directe verbinding naar 5 verschillende treinstations in Amsterdam. In de nacht stopt op die halte een nachtbus. Via de Overtoom is er een gemakkelijke verbinding naar de snelweg (A10). In de buurt valt vrijwel altijd een (betaalde) parkeerplaats te vinden. Vergunninghouders kunnen ook in een aantal nabije parkeergarages parkeren zoals Furore.  Vereniging van Eigenaren: De vereniging bestaat uit de “Vereniging van Eigenaars Jacob van Lennepstraat 68-72 hoek Bilderdijkstraat 202A en 202 te Amsterdam”. De servicekosten bedragen € 133,38 per maand en bestaan uit: reservering ten behoeve van onderhoud, opstalverzekering en administratiekosten.   Eigendomssituatie: Eigen grond.  Oplevering: In huidige staat, leeg en ontruimd.   Notaris: De koper heeft de keuze voor een Amsterdamse notaris welke een koopakte zal opstellen conform Amsterdams Model.  Op aanvraag beschikbaar:  - VvE stukken;  - Lijst van zaken;  - Vragenlijst;  - Akte van levering; - Splitsingsakte.  Graag maken wij een vrijblijvende afspraak voor een bezichtiging met u! Aan deze informatie kunnen noch jegens de makelaar, noch jegens de verkoper rechten worden ontleend.  *** ENGLISH ***  A great apartment in a prime location! This comfortable and well-maintained corner apartment of approx. 54 m2, built in the typical Amsterdam architectural style, sits right in the heart of the bustling Amsterdam Oud-West area. A second bedroom is very easy to realise. The bathroom has a practical layout and features a walk-in shower, a washbasin unit, the toilet, and white goods connections. Surrounding area: The Jacob van Lennepstraat is part of the popular “Hallenkwartier” (formerly called Oud-West), between the Hallen and the Leidseplein. Supermarkets, cafés and restaurants can all be found within a few minutes’ walk. The Hallenkwartier is a bustling area with a wide array of trendy bars, cafés, restaurants, and shops. Popular food lovers’ paradise and cultural venue De Foodhallen and the daily Ten Kate market are basically around the corner and the Kinkerstraat offers more shops and boutiques. For outdoor activities and relaxation, you will find the Vondelpark within easy reach, as are amenities such as child daycare centres, schools, sports facilities, theatres, and cinemas.   Accessibility: The apartment is very easy to reach by public transport. Tram lines 3, 7, 12, 13, 14, and 17 have stops within a 2-minute walk and offer direct connections to 5 different Amsterdam railway stations. A night bus stops here too. If you’re driving, the A10 Ring is easy to reach via the Overtoom and you will hardly ever struggle to find a (paid) parking space near you. Residents can obtain a parking permit and can also use nearby parking garages such as Furore.  Homeowners’ Association (VvE): The VvE is registered as “Vereniging van Eigenaars Jacob van Lennepstraat 68-72 hoek Bilderdijkstraat 202A en 202 te Amsterdam”. The service charges are €133.38 per month and pay for a contribution to the maintenance fund, the building insurance, and the administration fee.   Tenure status: Freehold land.  Transfer: In its current state, empty and vacated.   Notary: The buyer has the right to choose a notary registered in Amsterdam, who will prepare a deed of sale according to the Amsterdam Model.
