Street name statement: The Haarlemmermeer is a Dutch reclaimed land and municipality of the same name in the south of the Dutch province of North Holland. In the centuries before the reclamation in the years 1849-1852, the Haarlemmermeer was an enormous expanse of water. The Haarlemmermeer is surrounded by a ring canal. Schiphol Airport is located in the northeast of the municipality.  The usable area has been calculated in accordance with the NEN2580 standard established by the industry. The surface may therefore deviate from comparable properties and/or old references. This is mainly due to this (new) calculation method. We do our utmost to calculate the correct surface area and support it as much as possible by placing floor plans with measurements. However, we would like to emphasize that no rights can be derived from any difference between the stated and the actual size.

AROUND THE CORNER  FROM  THE PURMERPLEIN  LIES THIS  VERY CHARMING, ATTRACTIVE AND  WELL-MAINTAINED  EXTENDED CORNER HOUSE OF NO  LESS  THAN 90 M² WITH A SPACIOUS  AND SUNNY GARDEN. THIS WAY,  YOU COMBINE COMFORTABLE CITY LIVING WITH VILLAGE COSINESS.   The layout of the house is as follows:  Ground floor; Entrance with spacious hall, ample wardrobe facilities, stairs to the first floor with storage cupboard and access to the living room cum open kitchen. In 2012, the house was extended on the side, creating a spacious living room with a skylight that provides plenty of light. It is the largest house in this neighbourhood and because of its corner location, there is still a spacious garden. At the rear of the living room is the modern U-shaped high-gloss kitchen with a concrete countertop, a SMEG cooker, a dishwasher and a fridge-freezer. A (fixed) crockery cupboard has been created at the side. There is also a separate toilet on the ground floor and a separate room for a washing machine and dryer. Through the double French doors at the rear, the neatly landscaped garden can be reached. The south-facing garden with a back entrance has plenty of privacy. The wooden shed offers extra storage space.  The entire ground floor has beautiful solid oak flooring.  First floor; Through the landing you reach all rooms. At the front is the white tiled bathroom with a bath and a washbasin and at the back is a separate toilet with a beautiful trapeze window. This floor has two bedrooms, currently used as children's rooms. The entire floor, apart from the bathroom and toilet, has solid oak flooring.  Second floor The second floor is accessed via an open fixed staircase. The attic is a lovely open, bright and surprising space with two spacious dormers, a built-in desk and a generous storage cupboard. Eye-catching are the wooden rafters. This floor is used as the master bedroom.  Details: - Municipal monument since 2016 and Protected Town and Villagescape; - Current ground lease right has been bought off until 01-09-2049, the perpetual ground lease has been snapped up. - Living area 90 m². Measurement report available; - Garden facing south with a back entrance; - Storage in the garden of 3.4 m²; - Delivery in consultation;  Surroundings:  The house is part of a larger urban design for Tuindorp Nieuwendam from 1925. This garden village with its many public green spaces has often served as an example for later garden villages throughout Europe. The design is by Amsterdam School architect Jan Boterenbrood, known for, among others, Huize Lydia on Roelof Hartplein. The architectural style is a culmination of the rural version of the Amsterdam School. In the late 1990s, these houses were renovated by the housing association.  A short distance away is Rural North with its picturesque scenes and nature: from nature reserve De Rietlanden, Het Buiten-IJ, the Schellingwouderdijk to rural Waterland around the corner. In less than five cycling minutes you are in the Vliegenbos with lots of walking possibilities (and tennis club Elzenhagen, among others).  The rest of Amsterdam is not far away with the North/South line and the IJ tunnel nearby. Around the corner, a bus service takes you to Central Station in 10 minutes. By bike, you can reach the ferry across the IJ to Central Station in about 10 minutes. Via the Schellingwouder Bridge, you can reach the heart of Amsterdam East by bike within 25 minutes. The A-10 ring road is less than 5 minutes away by car.

VERY SPACIOUS AND  LIGHT  HOUSE IN  AMSTERDAM NORTH  WITH LARGE SUNNY GARDEN  AND  PORCH, PRIVATE PARKING, SPACIOUS BATHROOM  WITH  WHIRLPOOL AND INFRARED SAUNA.  In  this  child friendly neighborhood Elzenhagen  is this unique house of 161m2 located with south facing garden including private parking. The environment is peaceful but very close to the bustling city of Amsterdam.    The house is within walking distance to North metro station which takes you in 5 minutes to the citycenter of Amsterdam. Characteristic in this neighborhood is the varied construction of houses and apartments, surrounded by greenery and water. The district is within walking and cycling distance of schools, stores and nature.  The house consists of 3 floors and has access to 4 spacious bedrooms, a spacious bathroom with bath and infrared sauna, a walk-in closet, a cozy kitchen and a living room with sliding doors to the lovely south facing garden. Are you curious? Call our office and book a viewing with personal tour.   Location: The house is located in a quiet new district of Amsterdam-North. This popular neighborhood is very child friendly with several playgrounds and an elementary school including childcare. With the North-South line around the corner you are within 5 minutes in the heart of Amsterdam and within 15 minutes on the Zuidas. In about 3 minutes you are by car on the A8 or A10. And within 15 minutes you can take the ferry to Central Station. Shopping center Boven 't Y is within walking distance, with famous chain stores like H&M, Decathlon, Hema & Albert Heijn, but also the necessary craft stores. Also Pathé cinema Amsterdam Noord is just around the corner. There are plenty of green spaces nearby, so in no time you can cycle to the cozy Noorderpark or Landelijk Noord (Waterland) with beautiful small villages such as Zunderdorp, Ransdorp & Durgerdam. You can also go to the Twiske recreation area where you can enjoy walking, sailing, rollerblading or swimming.   For other entertainment there is plenty to do within cycling distance, such as the Buiktuin petting zoo, the Amsterdam Tower, the EYE Film Museum or the NDSM area, where festivals are held all year round. Throughout Amsterdam-Noord are great restaurants & bars, such as: Pompet, Il Peccorino, The Skate café, Oedipus Brewery, Lazuur, De Verbroederij, Pllek, IJver, Noorderlicht, Loetje aan 't IJ, etc.  Layout:  Main floor: Entrance hall with meter cupboard and separate toilet with fountain, bright garden facing living room where there is enough space for a cozy living room. Through the sliding doors you walk into the sunny garden with veranda at the rear where you can enjoy a bit of shade or sit cozy in the evening. Even with a summer shower, you can still enjoy the garden. The open kitchen has a beautiful wooden countertop and is equipped with various appliances (including dishwasher (updated in 2020), American-style fridge (updated in 2022) oven and microwave, 5-burner gas hob and a Quooker tap). The French door gives access to the terrace at the front of the house. Parking on private property is possible here.   First floor: Landing with access to two bedrooms and a spacious bathroom; both bedrooms are of a good size and offer space for a double bed, a wardrobe and a desk. The bedroom at the rear is currently used as a treatment room, but can also be very well furnished as a study or home office. The bathroom is centrally located and is really a place for relaxation. The bathroom has a whirlpool bath, shower, toilet, washbasin and infrared sauna. Great after a long day of work to just relax.   Second floor; Landing with access to two bedrooms of good size, walk-in closet and central heating system. The bedroom at the rear is furnished as the master bedroom with the walk-in closet next to it which provides space for a complete wardrobe. The bedroom at the front is furnished as a study and gym.   Garden; The garden has a convenient sun position (southwest) and is equipped with storage and a cozy porch.   At the front there is a terrace, or the possibility of parking in private property. There is also access to a large storage room.   Leasehold:  The property is located on leasehold land, issued by the municipality of Amsterdam. The General Provisions for permanent leasehold 2000 apply until the end date of 31 October 2057. The canon, which is tax deductible for the owner/occupier is € 2856.12 per half year based on 1-year indexation. The ground lease is paid per six months or can be paid in installments. PUUR* WONEN! Dit  bijzondere  en sfeervolle  benedenhuis van  ca. 78 m2 is  voorzien  van 2 slaapkamers, een heerlijke  leefkeuken,  ruime woonkamer en een prachtige botanische tuin gelegen  aan de  Rijpgracht! Mede door haar speelse indeling en hoge plafonds is het zeker de moeite waard om te komen kijken. Bovendien is de woning met een energielabel A ook nog eens zeer goed geïsoleerd.   * SEE ENGLISH TEXT BELOW*  INDELING HAL: Vanuit de Rijpgracht arriveert u met uw eigen entree in de mooi afgewerkte hal. Hier is er voldoende ruimte voor jassen en vindt u tevens het separate toilet.  KEUKEN: De heerlijke leefkeuken is centraal in het appartement gelegen en heeft diverse inbouwapparatuur zoals een 5-pits gasfornuis, afzuigkap, combi/magnetron, koel/vriescombinatie en vaatwasser van o.a. het merk Siemens. De keuken is voorzien van veel opbergruimte, maar straalt tevens ook rust uit. Vanuit de op maat gemaakte houten bar kijkt u uit over het prachtige groen van de botanische tuin.   Aangrenzend aan de leefkeuken bevindt zich een deur die toegang geeft tot de wasruimte (plek voor wasmachine en droger, strijkplank etc.)  WOONKAMER: De woonkamer zit aan de achterzijde met zicht op de groene tuin die middels openslaande deuren te bereiken is. De grote raampartijen en het hoge plafond laten de woning ruim aanvoelen. De lichtstraten zorgen ervoor dat het binnen- en buitengevoel goed samenkomt. Met de uitbouw in 2018 is er vloerverwarming toegevoegd en zijn de kozijnen voorzien van triple glas. Aan de buitenzijde is er gebruik gemaakt van Red Cedar hout waardoor de uitbouw er zeer strak uitziet.   MASTER BEDROOM: Aan de voorzijde van de woning is de 'master bedroom' gelegen. Doordat er een walk-in closet is gecreëerd, wordt er optimaal gebruik gemaakt van de ruimte en zorgt het voor een opgeruimd gevoel.   TWEEDE SLAAPKAMER: De tweede slaapkamer dient op het moment als kinderkamer en is centraal gelegen in de woning. Door de glazen wand aan de voorzijde van de slaapkamer kijk je uit op de tuin en komt er voldoende licht naar binnen.   BADKAMER: De badkamer is functioneel met een inloopdouche en recentelijk vernieuwd wastafelmeubel.   TUIN: De botanische tuin (gelegen op het zuiden) is de eyecatcher van deze woning. Al in het vroege voorjaar is het hier heerlijk vertoeven, in maart zal de bananenplant zijn blad weer laten zien en waant u zich in de tropen. De beplanting is aangesloten op een bewateringssysteem, de tuin is hierdoor gemakkelijk in onderhoud. Voor extra opbergruimte is er een schuur aanwezig voorzien van eigen elektra.   LIGGING De Rijpgracht is een rustige straat met een breed trottoir, veel groen en bankjes om aan het water te zitten. In de winter kun je voor de deur schaatsen, in de zomer varen en suppen. Om de hoek ligt het populaire Erasmuspark waar veel wordt gewandeld en gesport. En ook het Westerpark is met 8 minuten fietsen nabij. De omgeving, met o.a. de Jan van Galenstraat, het Hugo de Grootplein en de Clercqstraat op loopafstand, biedt een grote diversiteit aan supermarkten, speciaalzaken, voorzieningen en horecagelegenheden. Op steenworpafstand zijn bijvoorbeeld horecagelegenheden zoals de Spaghetteria, traiteur Hartje Bos of Selma’s Nordic bakery en sportfaciliteiten zoals Beest Boulders, Padel Next of FemmeGym.   De woning is goed te bereiken met de auto via de A-10, afslag S105 en met het openbaar vervoer vanaf de Admiraal de Ruijterweg of de Jan van Galenstraat. Kortom een heerlijke buurt voor gezinnen, met alle voorzieningen op loopafstand. In de directe omgeving bevinden zich meerdere goede kinderdagverblijven en basisscholen.   EIGENDOMSSITUATIE De woning is gelegen op gemeentelijke erfpacht. De huidige canon bedraagt € 553,54 en wordt jaarlijks geïndexeerd. Het huidige tijdvak loopt t/m april 2058 en de overstap naar eeuwigdurende erfpacht is reeds notarieel vastgelegd.   BIJZONDERHEDEN * Ca. 78 m2 woonoppervlakte in het huis; * Prachtige botanische tuin van ca. 57 m2 gelegen op het zuiden; * Goed geïsoleerd, energielabel A; * Nieuwe CV-ketel (2021), dubbel glas voorzijde/triple glas achterzijde; * Uitgebouwd in 2018; * Twee slaapkamers;   * Moderne leefkeuken; * Ruime woonkamer met openslaande deuren naar de tuin; * Gevlinderd beton, voorzien van vloerverwarming in de uitbouw; * Mooie houten vloer door de rest van de woning; * Speelse indeling, hoog plafond; * Gelegen aan de Rijpgracht; * Fijne, kindvriendelijke buurt van alle gemakken voorzien; * De beplanting is aangesloten op een bewateringssysteem; * Gunstige ligging t.o.v. diverse vervoersmogelijkheden;  * Veel parkeermogelijkheden in de straat; * Gezonde en actieve Vve; * Servicekosten € 112,- per maand; * Oplevering in overleg.  ---------------------------------------------------------------- PUUR* LIVING! This unique and stylish ground floor apartment of approximately 78 m2 has 2 bedrooms, a lovely kitchen, spacious living room and a beautiful botanical garden located on the Rijpgracht! Also by its playful layout and high ceilings, it is definitely worth a visit. In addition, the apartment is also very well insulated and has energy label A.   LAYOUT HALL: From the Rijpgracht you arrive with your own entrance into the beautifully finished hall. In this hall there is plenty of space for coats and you also find the separate toilet.  KITCHEN: The lovely living kitchen is centrally located in the apartment and has several appliances such as a 5-burner gas stove, extractor, combi / microwave, fridge / freezer and dishwasher of various brands including Siemens. The kitchen has plenty of storage space, but it also breathes tranquility. From the custom-made wooden bar you can overlook the beautiful greenery of the botanical garden.   Adjacent to the kitchen is a door that gives access to the laundry room (place for washer and dryer, ironing board etc.)  LIVING ROOM: The living room is located at the rear with a view of the green garden which can be accessed through double doors. The large windows and high ceiling make the house feel spacious. The skylights make the indoor and outdoor feeling come together well. With the expansion in 2018, underfloor heating was added and the window frames are triple-glazed. On the exterior, Red Cedar wood was used, resulting the extension looking very sleek.   MASTER BEDROOM: Located at the front of the apartment is the master bedroom. Because there is a walk-in closet created, the space is used optimally and it creates a tidy feeling.   SECOND BEDROOM: The second bedroom currently serves as a child's room and is centrally located in the home. The glass wall at the front of the bedroom overlooks the garden and lets in plenty of light.   BATHROOM: The bathroom is functional with a walk-in shower and recently renewed sink cabinet.   GARDEN: The botanical garden (facing south) is the eye-catcher of this property. Already in early spring it is lovely to stay here, in March the banana plant will show its leaves again and you imagine yourself in the tropics. The plants are connected to a watering system, making the garden easy to maintain. For extra storage space there is a shed with its own electricity.   LOCATION The Rijpgracht is a quiet street with a wide sidewalk, lots of greenery and benches to sit by the water. In the winter you can skate in front of the door, in the summer you can go boating or supping. Around the corner is the popular Erasmus Park where there are many walks and sports. And the Westerpark is also nearby with 8 minutes by bike. The area, including the Jan van Galenstraat, the Hugo de Grootplein and the Clercqstraat within walking distance, offers a wide variety of supermarkets, specialty stores, amenities and restaurants. A stone's throw away are for example restaurants such as the Spaghetteria, caterer Hartje Bos or Selma's Nordic bakery and sports facilities such as Beest Boulders, Padel Next or FemmeGym.   The property is easily accessible by car via the A-10, exit S105 and by public transport from the Admiraal de Ruijterweg or Jan van Galenstraat. In short, a wonderful neighborhood for families, with all amenities within walking distance. In the immediate vicinity are several good nurseries and elementary school.   PARTICULARS * Approx 78 m2 of living space in the house; * Beautiful botanical garden of approx 57 m2 facing South;  * Well insulated, energy label A; * New central heating boiler (2021), double glazed front/triple glazed rear; * Expanded in 2018; * Two bedrooms;   * Modern living kitchen; * Spacious living room with double doors to the garden; * Concrete floor, with underfloor heating in the extension; * Beautiful wooden floor through the rest of the house; * Playful layout, high ceiling; * Located on the Rijpgracht; * Nice, child-friendly neighborhood with all conveniences; * The plants are connected to a watering system; * Convenient location to various transportation options;  * Many parking possibilities in the street; * Healthy and active association; * Service costs € 112, - per month; * Delivery in consultation.

Charming apartment with  a  beautiful view!  In the  most beautiful spot of  the  Haarlemmerstraat, sunny apartment with an  amazing  view over the Herenmarkt, Herengracht and  the West-Indisch Huis. The Haarlemmerstraat  is perhaps the nicest and coziest street in Amsterdam. In addition to all kinds of unique shops, there are numerous culinary hotspots in the Haarlemmerstraat and Haarlemmerdijk. Around the corner, you will find the Amsterdam Canals, Prinseneiland, and the Jordaan with the Noordermarkt, Lindengracht and the Westerstraat with weekly markets on Saturday and Monday. There are various supermarkets and specialty shops for daily shopping.  Plenty of metropolitan culture along the banks of the IJ, with the Muziekgebouw aan het IJ, the new library and the new film museum. You can do sports around the corner at Fit For Free, Squash City or in the Westerpark, where you can go for a walk, picnic, sporting activities, cultural events or a bite and a drink. The characteristic building from 1898 with beautiful tile tableaux, once a trading office for coffee, tea and cocoa, is a Municipal Monument.  Layout of the apartment The apartment has a playful layout through the front- and back house with attic floor. In the front house you will find the living and dining room, a bedroom/study room and toilet. Passages around the light court give access to the few steps lower situated back of the house, where the kitchen, bathroom and the entrance to the second bedroom are located.  Front house Through the communal staircase you reach this lovely apartment on the second floor. You enter the house through the hall, which provides a separate toilet, authentic sink, storage cupboard and access to the living room, bed/study room and passage to the back house.  Living room The spacious and sunny (south facing) living/dining room has an original stucco ceiling with ornaments, beautiful oak floor and fireplace. In the open window you can enjoy the sun, beautiful views, and life on the Haarlemmerstraat and Herenmarkt.  Bedroom/study room The bedroom/study room, with chimney and original stucco ceiling, is located on the light court and offers a view of the charming back house. In the adjacent passage to the back house is a walk-in closet with plenty of storage space.  Back house The slightly lower situated back house can be reached via both sides of the light court. Here you will find the kitchen, a second bedroom and the bathroom.  Kitchen The stylish kitchen has spacious worktops, modern appliances and ample storage space. In the kitchen there is an authentic built-in kitchen cupboard and a cosy seat for breakfast or a glass of wine while cooking.  Attic A staircase in the kitchen leads to the bedroom in the attic of the back house, with two authentic dormer windows.  Bathroom Bathroom with duo bath, washbasin, design radiator, underfloor heating and washing machine connection.  Private land The premises is located on private land / own ground.  Association of owners It is a healthy and active association of owners, consisting of 5 members. The management is carried out by the owners themselves. The monthly service costs are € 190.00 per month. The cash position of VvE on 31 December 2021 was more than € 60,000. The building is very well maintained. All windows frames at the front have been replaced (HR++ glass) and the paintwork is well maintained. The tile panels have been restored and the zinc and lead work has been replaced.   Accessibility The Central Station is a 7-minute walk from the apartment. Here you can take tram, train, North-South line, bus and free ferry service to Amsterdam North and NDSM. You can reach all popular locations by bike via the Amsterdam Canals, such as Vondelpark, Leidseplein and Stopera. By car you can reach the A10 ring road in no time via various roads. Schiphol is also easily accessible by car or public transport.  Parking/permit Parking options in and around the street, and with a residents parking permit it is possible to park for free in the nearby IJdock or Willemspoort garage. Currently there is a waiting list for obtaining a parking permit (permit area: Center 2), this will take +/- 8 months. (source: Municipality of Amsterdam dated August 2022)  Measurement certificate The house has been measured in accordance with NEN 2580 and has a living area of 83 m2. A measurement certificate is available.  In short A beautiful apartment in a prime location, with two spacious bedrooms, lots of light and space, located in the most beautiful spot of the bustling (car-free) Haarlemmerstraat, right in the center with fantastic views over the Herenmarkt, Herengracht and the West Indies House and the tranquility and the conviviality of the canal belt on the other side.  Particularities - Located near the Jordaan; - Amazing view over the Herenmarkt and Herengracht; - Municipal monument; - Fire place; - 2 bedrooms; - Healthy and active VvE; - The apartment has been renovated while retaining authentic details; - Delivery in consultation.  About this sale Viewings, brochures and bids: Became curious? Then schedule a visit! The owner as a seller will show you around himself. That has many advantages. He or she takes the time for your visit and knows a lot about his own home and living environment in a more personal way. A viewing can be requested via Funda or the website of the selling broker.  More information about bids can be found in the digital brochure.  The Measurement Instruction for homes is based on NEN2580. The Measurement Instruction is intended to apply a more unambiguous way of measuring to give an indication of the usable surface. The Measurement Instruction does not completely exclude differences in measurement results, for example due to differences in interpretation, rounding off or limitations when performing the measurement.

Is it your  dream  to have  a WATERFRONT  HOUSE WITHIN THE RING  OF  AMSTERDAM? That is possible now!  This  house is everything you hoped for,  but never thought you would  find within the Ring!  In this modern and energy-efficient house (2007) you will enjoy a perfect combination of city and nature! Bus 392 has a stop practically around the corner and takes you to metro station Noord in just 15 minutes, yet the Twiske (nature reserve) is also nearby. A very nice place to live, where you are quickly both in and out of the city!  The house of 103.2 m2 living space and 3 bedrooms is well maintained and has a sunny, south-facing backyard at the water. A lovely place where you can enjoy the sun all day! But during the cold winter days you can turn on the heater, because with energy label A, this house is super energy-efficient. This is a big advantage which, given the current energy prices, can save you hundreds of euros each month!   Such a nice family home as this is rarely seen within the Ring... So don't wait too long and get in touch with us immediately!  Location and neighborhood: The house is located in the very child-friendly and quiet neighborhood of Oostzanerwerf, North district. The house is part of a relatively new residential area with lots of greenery, ring ditches and safe playgrounds. The nearest supermarket is just 200 meters away; there are several elementary school within a radius of 1 km; and secondary schools are easily accessible by bicycle. A 10-minute bike ride away, you will find the recreation and nature park "Het Twiske", a wonderful place for walking, cycling, swimming and recreation. The NDSM wharf on the IJ, a real cultural hotspot, is also 10 minutes by bike and the city center is also easily accessible via several ferries. By car, you can reach the Ring A10 in no time and bus 392 stops almost directly in front of the door.   In short, an ideal location where you can really enjoy the best of both worlds: the greenery of Amsterdam North and the Twiske and the liveliness of the city center - all within short distance!    Layout of the house: Ground floor: Through the tiled front yard with access to a wooden shed, we reach the front door of the house.  Behind the front door we find the entrance with wardrobe, guest toilet with hand basin, staircase to the second floor and access to the bright living room with open kitchen.  The living room is oriented towards the garden and enjoys a lot of light through the large glass sliding doors. The stylish black kitchen is located at the front of the house and features high-quality M-System appliances: a gas stove, oven, microwave, refrigerator, freezer and dishwasher.  The ground floor is nicely finished with laminate flooring and tight walls and ceilings.   First floor: Through the stairs in the hallway, we reach the landing of the first floor.  Here, we find 2 bedrooms, a separate laundry/storage room and the bathroom. The bedrooms have a laminate and, just as the rest of the house, they are neatly finished.  The luxurious bathroom has underfloor heating, recessed spotlights, a second toilet, a sink with double tap and cabinet, a bathtub and a separate walk-in rain shower.   Second floor: Through the fixed staircase on the first floor, we reach the landing of the second floor with the 3rd bedroom. The ceiling is 4 meters high at its highest point, giving this room a spacious and bright ambience.   Garden:  The house has a low-maintenance south-facing backyard that enjoys plenty of sunshine. The garden features a large deck terrace adjacent to the waterfront. The garden is very private, as you don't have any direct neighbours here! There is also a second wooden shed located in the backyard and there is an additional canopy where you - for example , like the current resident - place an outdoor kitchen.  Parking:  There is public parking around the house.   Property features: - Modern living by the water, within the Ring of Amsterdam - Current leasehold has been bought off until 31-12-2056 - Application for ''spijtoptantenregeling'' to perpetual leasehold has already been made to municipality - Energy label: A - Spacious house with 3 bedrooms  - Luxurious bathroom with bath and separate rain shower - Sunny, south-facing backyard with lots of privacy (no direct rear neighbors)  - Child-friendly neighbourhood close to schools, stores, bus stop and the A10 Ring road - Close to nature reserve "The Twiske"

Home begins at  Bentinckstraat  8-H, a  lovely ground  floor apartment of approximately  34  m² with garden at the  rear.  The great location combined with garden  and fine  layout with high ceilings make this a lovely apartment. The Bentinckstraat, one of the most beautiful streets of the Staatsliedenbuurt, is wide and is within walking distance of the trendy Westerpark and the lively Jordaan.  Are you coming over to take a look? We would love to tell you more about this apartment during a viewing!  Layout: Communal entrance on the street, access to the apartment. Spacious pointed living room with 2 windows wide view of the street and passage to kitchen, which is equipped with appliances. Furthermore, the kitchen gives draft to the bathroom with shower and toilet, the garden and stairs to second floor where the bedroom is located as well as the central heating boiler.  Environment & accessibility:  The Staatsliedenbuurt has rapidly developed into a hip hotspot. For starters, you can soon consider yourself lucky to have Trattoria Bella Storia, perhaps the best pizza in Amsterdam, just around the corner. At Buurman they have delicious Falafel sandwiches. But Sabich or the Thai Pie Nong on the bridge near Nassaukade are also popular. There are cafes and restaurants within walking distance, in abundance. Established names where it's great to linger: Café restaurant Amsterdam, Primi bar, Mossel & Gin, Pendergast, Cafe Beurre, Coffee Roastery Westerpark and last but not least Café Piet de Gruijter. In addition to all this, you will soon have the Westerpark as your new front yard, with the many great spots of the Westergasterrein. You can do your daily shopping at the AH or the Dirk on the Van Limburg Stirumstraat or the Avondmarkt with a wide range of organic and other products.   The Bentinckstraat is easily accessible by public transportation. At Van Limburg Stirumplein and Van Hallstraat there are several streetcar and bus stops in the direction of Amsterdam Central Station and Leidseplein, among others. The Amsterdam Central train station is approximately 10 minutes cycling distance from the apartment. Also, the location relative to the ring road A-10 West is very convenient. By car it can be reached within minutes via the Haarlemmerweg or the new Spaarndammertunnel. Parking is via a permit system on the public road. For exact waiting times, consult the website of the City of Amsterdam.   Added value: - Very centrally located first floor apartment with garden at the rear; - Active VvE, administration is managed in-house;  - Monthly service costs are € 73,-;  - Located on private land; - old age-, asbestos and not self-occupied clause apply;  - Delivery: In consultation, can quickly.

**This property is  listed  by a  certified expat  broker.**  WHY IS  THIS  APARTMENT WORTH A VIEWING:  -  Double spacious upper house of GO  178.50 m² (NEN 2580 report  available) and GFA 215.50 m²; - Wonderfully light apartment due to the extra width and the many windows; - The apartment is 12.5 meters wide with a balcony at the rear facing West and a     licensed roof terrace of approx. 30 m2 (almost all day sun), on the South-West. - Given the layout and location, it is extremely suitable for a family with children; - Near various schools (including the British School / Lycee Français, Amsterdams Lyceum, etc.); - Childcare / nursery is right around the corner; - Very quiet location with a private entrance; - Municipal monument; - Active VvE consisting of a total of 3 members, monthly service costs € 100; - Parking via permit system (2 permits). Source: Parking and Traffic Municipality of Amsterdam; - Delivery in consultation.  DEscriptION: Beautiful, extra wide double upper house with roof terrace with an individual entrance and staircase located in a (municipal) monumental building in one of the most beautiful and quiet locations of Amsterdam Oud-Zuid. The apartment is well maintained and very light due to the many windows over the entire width (approximately 12.50 m¹) of the house.  Right of continuous leasehold. Annual canon is € 1971.34. Under the favorable conditions, the seller has ordered the canon to be fixed by 2051. Perpetual surrender is also still possible for a buyer to realize this;  LAYOUT: Individual entrance from street level. 1st Floor/Landing: On the landing of the first mezzanine floor there is a storage option for your pram, golf equipment, etc.;  2nd Floor: All rooms can be reached via the landing on the second floor. The spacious and bright living room en-suite has a solid Merbau floor with extra sound insulation. The attractive modern kitchen is equipped with a 5-burner gas stove, fridge freezer, oven and dishwasher. At the rear is also a very spacious master bedroom. This bedroom has a fitted wardrobe and an extra built-in wardrobe. The French doors in the living room, kitchen and master bedroom lead to the wide balcony (12.5 m) located on the West. The luxurious bathroom has a walk-in shower, sink and bathtub. In the hallway is a separate toilet with fountain. At the front is a spacious bedroom / study with spacious, partly built-in storage and wardrobes. One of the cabinets can be used for air-conditioned wine storage.  3th floor: On the third floor is the spacious bedroom / study of 22 m2, equipped with a built-in bookcase with access to the spacious, licensed roof terrace of approximately 30 m2 located on the South / West. This floor also has a solid Merbau floor. The newly installed modern bathroom on this floor is equipped with a toilet, shower and a sink and underfloor heating. The washing machine and dryer connections are also available here.  Attic/attic: In addition to sufficient storage space, the economical central heating combi boiler (ATAG) has been installed in the insulated attic/attic of approximately 12 m². The entire apartment is equipped with a water pressure system for the two floors.  LOCATION/ACCESSIBILITY:  The apartment is easily accessible by public transport, but also by car through the various roads. This area will continue to develop positively in the coming years, in particular due to the plans for the Zuidas. There is ample parking in front of the door and the chic shopping streets such as the P.C. Hooftstraat, C. Schuytstraat, Beethovenstraat and Van Baerlestraat are within walking and cycling distance of the apartment, as are the Concertgebouw, Vondelpark and Beatrixpark and a wide choice of restaurants/cafés. In addition to all these facilities, there are also national and international (British School and the Lycee Français) primary and secondary schools nearby. Deze eengezinswoning van  circa  68 m2  ligt op  een hoek en heeft  een  voor- en een achtertuin. We  hebben  de wanden alvast behangklaar gemaakt en  het plafond  voor je gewit. Ga je graag naar de markt dan is de Dappermarkt een goede keuze. Indeling:  De entree van deze woning bereik je via je eigen voortuin.  Direct links na de entree ligt de woonkamer met achterin de dichte keuken. Op de eerste verdieping vind je de beide slaapkamers en de badkamer voorzien van wastafel en douche en nog een apart toilet.  Met de vlizotrap kom je op de vliering. Spectacular semi-detached single-family  home  of 161m²  (energy label  A), built under architecture  in  2017, located on the popular  Steigereiland  Zuid, in the middle of the  open water  with beautiful views over the 'Zeeburgerbay'.  The house has no less than 5 bedrooms, two bathrooms, a beautiful and very luxurious finish, kitchen with island, a parking space on site, a terrace, front garden and a private boat place next to the house. The annual leasehold is very low, €659 per year and can be purchased or fixed under favorable conditions. The house can be expanded on the 2nd floor to 175m², the permit application has already been done.  In short: a great family home for water lovers who love space and views, but still want to live close to the city.  Interested? Call us quickly for an appointment!  Layout Ground floor: It starts directly in front of the house with a terrace in front of the door, where you can relax. There are two doors, one for the house and one for the storage room. From the hall hall you walk into the fantastic bright living room with large glass doors, an unobstructed view over the water and a lovely west-facing terrace with evening sun and an (electric) roof. This is equipped with sun blinds and offers enough space to enjoy a delicious meal with friends and/or family. Under the terrace, accessible by stairs, another floating terrace.  The luxury kitchen (Gaggenau appliances) at the rear has an island and is fully equipped, including a wine cooler. The living area is a wonderful place to relax with the TV beautifully concealed in a niche and a wood-burning fireplace. On the floor a beautiful parquet floor, with underfloor heating. Next to the house there is room for both a car (with charging station) and a berth for a boat. Finally, there is a separate toilet and a handy cupboard in the hall.  First floor: Hall with separate toilet and three spacious bedrooms. Very large master bedroom with a beautiful view over the water. In the middle the modern bathroom with large walk-in shower (with rain shower), double sink and bathtub. One of the bedrooms is currently used as a workplace and walk-in closet.  Second floor: From the stairs you will first find a wonderful open lounge area, ideal for watching TV or gaming with beautiful custom-made cabinets. From here access to the roof terrace with a beautiful unobstructed view. This terrace can be closed and added to the house (after a permit) and this yields approximately 14 extra m2. At the rear, bedroom 4 and 5 and finally bathroom number two with walk-in shower and sink. At the top of the stairs a separate cupboard with space for the washing machine and dryer.  Environment This unique home is located in the popular Steigereiland-Zuid, the part of IJburg that is closest to the city. This project from 2017 consists of a unique platform in the water with 14 homes, which together own this platform. Characteristic of this neighborhood is the innovative and versatile architecture. Steigereiland has all the necessary facilities; a large primary school around the corner (Montessori), various nurseries, a large general practitioner, local shops, a café/restaurant (Vrijburcht), dentists and a hairdresser.  Further on IJburg (2 minutes by bike) you will find even more primary schools, the shopping center with its traditional fresh shops, a large Albert Heijn, HEMA, nice restaurants, trendy cafes and the beach. A stone's throw away is the Diemerpark, where you can jog, skate and cycle to your heart's content. There is even a private beach and of course a football, hockey and tennis club on IJburg. You are quickly on the A10 ring road from the house. Tram 26 runs every 6 minutes and takes you to Central Station in about 12 minutes. You cycle to the center in 20 minutes and you are in the middle of Amsterdam East within 10 minutes.  Particularities - Very modern house, ready to move into; - Energy label A, equipped with 2 solar panels (can be expanded); - Outdoor space! A front garden, terrace on the water, a floating terrace, a roof terrace and a private boat spot; - Living area 161m2 (measurement report available), to be expanded to 175m2; - Berth for a boat at your own house; - Parking on site, there is a charging station; - Underfloor heating on the ground floor; - Lots of light and space throughout the house. - Very low ground lease: € 649 per year until 2056, favorable surrender conditions apply; - Contribution VvE (only platform) is € 180, - per month; - Alarm and cameras present; - Delivery in consultation.  ------------------------- The sales information has been compiled with great care, but we cannot guarantee the correctness of the content and therefore no rights can be derived from it. Located in the recently renovated 'Plan van Gool' on the perfect spot between greenery. Near the North-South line. It is an apartment with a spacious and sunny living room with modern semi-open kitchen (from 2021), good-sized bedrooms and a nice balcony which is located on the southwest. The apartment is located on leasehold, but this has been bought off FOREVER! Thanks to the North-South line you can be in the heart of Amsterdam in no time (10 minutes), but also the free nature such as the Noorderpark or the picturesque villages are around the corner, an ideal location in relation to many different facilities.  Layout:  Ground Floor/Entrance There is a communal entrance on the ground floor, where the third floor can be reached by elevator or stairs. From the gallery on the third floor you have access to the stairwell that you share with two other houses. Entering the hall, through the hall you come to the spacious living room which has a large front with lots of glass, making the living room very light and has a beautiful unobstructed view over the water and greenery. Through the living room you have access to the balcony, which is located on the southwest. The semi-open kitchen has a modern finish and has a dishwasher, combi oven, induction hob, built-in extractor and a fridge and freezer. The two bedrooms are both a good size, lots of light and access to the balcony. The bathroom has a walk-in shower, sink and washer / dryer connection. The bathroom, separate toilet and storage cupboard can be reached from the hall. Next to your own front door is a private storage room with lots of storage space where a bicycle can be parked.  Environment:  The apartment is located in the Plan van Gool in Amsterdam North. It is nice to live in this child-friendly neighbourhood, where relatively many families live. The apartment is within walking distance of the Buikslotermeerplein shopping center, where you will find a supermarket, various shops and restaurants. The van der Pekstraat has been completely renovated and equipped with markets, nice shops and restaurants. Via the Pekstraat you reach the ferry, the Eye film museum and the A'DAM tower. The arrival of the North-South metro line has contributed to the positive development of this green and atmospheric district. A nice combination of city life and the great outdoors, because you don't have to travel far for picturesque villages north of Amsterdam such as Durgerdam, Zunderdorp, Ransdorp and Broek in Waterland. But at the same time, the heart of the center can be reached by bike in 15 minutes. There are several dining options including, Pompet in the Noorderpark, the NDSM terrain with, among others: Pllek, the Noorderlicht, De IJ-kantine and Amsterdam Marina with Loetje aan het IJ. Within walking distance you will find the Nieuwerdammerdijk and cafe 't Sluisje with a large terrace on the water. And if you walk on, you can walk right into the Vliegenbos, with the terraces of the Hangar and the Goudfazant on the IJ. In short, plenty of facilities in the area.  Accessibility and parking:  Within a few minutes you are by car on the ring A10 and the IJtunnel towards Amsterdam-Centre. The North South line is also a 7-minute walk away. With public transport you are in the heart of the center in about 10 minutes and also with the free ferry you are at Central Station with all connections possible. The center can also be reached in 15 minutes by bike. The Vliegenbos, Noorderpark and Schellingwouderbreekpark parks can be reached within a 10-minute walk. Parking There is a lot of parking around the apartment complex, the parking is through paid parking and a permit system. Currently without a waiting list, can be requested for only €16.10 per six months. A second permit is also possible for €40.25 per six months.  The Upstairs Building The buildings within the 'Plan van Gool' are a mix between gallery and portico flats and are unique because of their architecture. The buildings were designed in the sixties by the architect Frans van Gool. He designed the low flats between green squares with many trees: urban living among greenery. The current residents have attached great value to the current design. That is why the current design with its air bridges and colors has been kept intact as much as possible during the upgrading and renovation of the buildings. This gives the buildings of Plan van Gool a unique character.  Particularities:  - Year of construction 1968; - Living area of ??approximately 70 m² - Energy label C; -3-room apartment on the third floor -Living room with glass front which provides a lot of light -Modern kitchen from 2021 -2 good bedrooms -Sunny balcony on the southwest -Active and healthy VvE under professional management -Contribution VvE is currently €141,39 -Ground lease perpetually bought off (there is no need to pay ground lease again) -Delivery in consultation

Fraai drie kamer  appartement  met twee  ruime slaapkamers,  een moderne badkamer met  whirlpool,  keuken met bar en twee  heerlijke  balkons gelegen op het westen.  Ligging:  Het appartement is zeer  gunstig en centraal gelegen. Vanuit de woonkamer kijk je aan de voorzijde over het water. Het complex ligt in een groene omgeving met de Sloterplas op loopafstand! Ideaal om in de zomer te recreëren. Het Sloterparkbad en het tennispark liggen praktisch om de hoek. Zo vindt u in de directe een ruim aanbod van winkels, de dagelijkse markt op plein ’40-’45, diverse scholen, kinderopvangcentra en voldoende horecagelegenheden.  Ook met het openbaar vervoer is alles goed te bereiken. Tramlijn 13 brengt je naar het centrum van Amsterdam. Liever vervoer met de trein of metro, dan zijn de stations Jan van Galenstraat met lijn 50 en 51 op 5 minuten loopafstand.  Treinstations Lelylaan en Sloterdijk zijn ook binnen een mum van tijd te bereiken. De ringweg A10 is op slechts twee minuten rijden. Voor het parkeren van de auto rondom het complex kunt u een ontheffing bij de gemeente aanvragen (blauwe zone twee uur gratis). Voor bezoekers kunnen 2 uur gratis parkeren middels een blauwe parkeerschijf.   Indeling: Via de centrale entree bereik je op de tweede verdieping dit fantastische appartement. Bij binnenkomst een zeer gezellige woonkamer met hout structuren. Dit zorgt voor een warme uitstraling. Het heeft aan de achterzijde twee royale slaapkamers. De kleine slaapkamer heeft toegang tot een balkon. Deze kamer is ook perfect te gebruiken als werkkamer. De grote slaapkamer met toegang naar de badkamer is voorzien van een mooie strakke kastenwand.   De badkamer heeft een whirlpool, inloopdouche met melkglazen deur, verwarmbare spiegel, glasmozaïek op de muren en vloer (plus vloerverwarming). Badkamer is bereikbaar via slaapkamer en woonkamer.  De trendy keuken met inbouwapparatuur heeft een moderne bar. Ideaal om gezellig te borrelen met vrienden en familie. Tevens is hier de toegang naar het tweede balkon.  De woonkamer en open keuken zijn voorzien van een hardhouten parketvloer.   Op de begane grond is er nog een berging. Ideaal om alle spullen of fiets veilig op te bergen.   Bijzonderheden: -Woonoppervlakte 76m2 - Voortdurend recht van erfpacht herziening voor het eerst per 1 april 2030 - Jaarlijkse canonbetaling 57,17 tot 1 april 2030 - Verkoper heeft aanvraag gedaan voor de spijt optanten regeling (geldig tot 31-7-2023) -Energielabel C -Bouwjaar 1957 -Twee zonnige balkons op het westen. -Berging in de onderbouw -Kunststof kozijnen met dubbelglas -VvE professioneel beheerd, meerjarig onderhoudsplan is aanwezig. -Servicekosten circa €285,48 per maand (inclusief ca. 70 euro voorschot stookkosten)  -Openbaar vervoer (tram, bus, metro en trein) liggen vlakbij het appartement en nabij  uitvalswegen  (A10) -Gunstige ligging ten opzichte van winkels en recreatiemogelijkheden -Oplevering in overleg.

*English text below*   Fraai, naar  eigen smaak  in te delen 4-kamer  appartement  van ca. 49m² met balkon  op  het westen. Midden in de populaire  en bruisende  wijk De Baarsjes, stadsdeel West. Gelegen op eigen grond!  Omgeving: Het appartement ligt aan de James Cookstraat. Een rustige straat midden in de populaire en bruisende wijk De Baarsjes in stadsdeel West. Er is een uitgebreid aanbod aan restaurants, cafés en winkels onder andere in de Jan Evertsenstraat, de Clerqstraat, de Jan van Galenstraat en het Mercatorplein. De woning ligt centraal. Het centrum en de Jordaan bevinden zich op slechts 10 minuten fietsafstand. Maar dat is niet alles; het populaire Erasmuspark en Rembrandtpark liggen om de hoek, en ook het Westerpark en het Vondelpark liggen op fietsafstand.  Bereikbaarheid: De woning ligt uitstekend ten opzichte van de openbaar vervoersmogelijkheden. Trein- en metrostation zijn in de directe nabijheid (Jan van Galen / Sloterdijk), als ook diverse trams en bussen bevinden zich op enkele minuten loopafstand. Via de S-105 is de Ringweg A10, net als de A4 en de A2 gemakkelijk per auto te bereiken.   Indeling:  Begane grond: Gemeenschappelijk entree met trap naar het appartement op de eerste verdieping.  Eerste verdieping: Hal met toegang tot alle vertrekken, lichte woonkamer aan de voorzijde. Slaapkamer grenzend aan de woonkamer. De keuken aan de achterzijde biedt toegang tot het balkon (westen). Ook de tweede ruime slaapkamers aan de achterzijde hebben openslaande deuren naar het balkon. Badkamer is voorzien van douche en toilet.  Bijzonderheden: - Gelegen op eigen grond; - Volledig dubbel glas; - De VvE wordt professioneel beheerd door Falcon VVE Management; - VvE bestaat uit 4 appartementsrechten; - Gezonde en actieve VvE; - Service kosten: € 100,- p.m.; - Projectnotaris: KB notaris Frans ten Veen; - De koopovereenkomst zal worden opgemaakt volgens het model van de Ring Amsterdam, waarin additioneel een niet-bewoners-, asbest-, ouderdomsclausule- en as is where is worden opgenomen; - Oplevering kan snel;  Toelichtingsclausule BBMI/NEN-2580: De gebruiksoppervlakte is berekend conform de branche vastgestelde BBMI/NEN 2580- norm. De oppervlakte kan derhalve afwijken van vergelijkbare panden en/of oude referenties. Dit heeft vooral te maken met deze (nieuwe) rekenmethode. Koper verklaart voldoende te zijn geïnformeerd over de hiervoor bedoelde normering. Verkoper en diens makelaar doen hun uiterste best de juiste oppervlakte en inhoud te berekenen aan de hand van eigen metingen en dit zoveel mogelijk te ondersteunen door het plaatsen van plattegronden met maatvoering. Mocht de maatvoering onverhoopt niet (volledig) overeenkomstig de normering zijn vastgesteld, wordt dit door koper aanvaard. Koper is voldoende in de gelegenheid gesteld de maatvoering zelf te (laten) controleren. Verschillen in de opgegeven maat en grootte geven geen der partijen enig recht, zo ook niet op aanpassing van de koopsom. Verkoper en diens makelaar aanvaarden geen enkele aansprakelijkheid in deze. -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  Beautiful, 4-room apartment of approx. 49m², which can be arranged according to your own taste, with a west-facing balcony. In the middle of the popular and bustling De Baarsjes district, West district. Located on private land!  Environment: The apartment is located on James Cook Street. A quiet street in the middle of the popular and bustling De Baarsjes district in the West district. There is an extensive range of restaurants, cafés and shops, including in Jan Evertsenstraat, Clerqstraat, Jan van Galenstraat and Mercatorplein. The house is centrally located. The center and the Jordaan are only a 10-minute bike ride away. But that is not everything; the popular Erasmus Park and Rembrandt Park are just around the corner, and the Wester Park and Vondel Park are also within cycling distance.  Accessibility: The house is excellent in relation to public transport options. Train and metro station are in the immediate vicinity (Jan van Galen / Sloterdijk), as well as various trams and buses are a few minutes' walk away. The ring road A10, just like the A4 and the A2, can easily be reached by car via the S-105.  Layout:  Ground floor: Communal entrance with stairs to the apartment on the first floor.  First floor: Hall with access to all rooms, bright living room at the front. Bedroom adjacent to the living room. The kitchen at the rear provides access to the balcony (west). The second spacious bedrooms at the rear also have patio doors to the balcony. Bathroom has a shower and toilet.  Particularities: - Located on private land; - The VvE is professionally managed by Falcon VVE Management; - VvE consists of 4 apartment rights; - Healthy and active VvE; - Service costs: € 100 per month; - Project notary: KB Notary, Frans ten Veen; - The purchase agreement will be drawn up according to the Amsterdam Ring model, which will additionally include a non-resident clause, asbestos clause, old age clause and as is where clause; - Delivery can be fast;  Explanatory clause BBMI/NEN-2580:  The usable area has been calculated in accordance with the BBMI/NEN 2580 standard established by the industry. The surface may therefore deviate from comparable properties and/or old references. This is mainly due to this (new) calculation method. The buyer declares that he has been sufficiently informed about the standards referred to above. The seller and his broker do their utmost to calculate the correct surface and volume on the basis of their own measurements and to support this as much as possible by placing floor plans with dimensions. If the dimensions  have not been determined (fully) in accordance with the standard, this will be accepted by the buyer. The buyer has been given sufficient opportunity to check the dimensions (or have them checked). Differences in the specified size and size do not give either party any right, nor to an adjustment of the purchase price. The seller and his broker do not accept any liability

An amazing high-end  loft  apartment with  great views  over the entire city  of  Amsterdam, located in the popular  Houthavens.  A spacious house with an amazing  ceiling height  of 5 meters. A turn key and climate neutral home of approx. 89 m2 with 2 bedrooms (with option for a 3rd bedroom). The object was built in 2016 and has been successfully arranged according to your own wishes. If you have your own boat and want to moor it nearby, you can do so soon. Overview; an extremely tasteful and original home with plenty of options that you must see!  LAYOUT The house is located on the third floor and can be reached via a communal entrance or an elevator.  Living spaces - Upon entering you will immediately be surprised by the space and the great light that you are entitled to; - It immediately becomes clear that this double house has been realized with great taste and an eye for detail; - The split-level living room has spectacular windows with a great view over the city of Amsterdam that will never get bored; - The luxurious living kitchen is a real eye-catcher, which blends wonderfully with the cast floor and the rest of the house; - The modern open kitchen is equipped with high-quality built-in appliances such as Miele oven, steam oven, large fridge with separate freezer and dishwasher. A Quooker and a Bora 4-burner induction hob with integrated extractor; - The finish of the kitchen is impressive and tasteful, both the drawers and the worktop are finished in beautiful light marble; - The balcony is reached through double sliding doors, which provides a great extension of the living space; - Luxurious and perfectly concealed fitted wardrobes; - A house with a modern look and an industrial touch, which fits in a magazine!  Outdoor space - A lovely sunny balcony with breathtaking views and privacy, this is the place to escape the daily hustle and bustle; - View over the canal, and located on the southeast; - Because of it's sliding doors, this terrace immediately becomes an extension of the living room; - There is also a communal roof terrace, where you can enjoy the sun and the beautiful view all day long.  Sleeping quarters - Via an internal staircase you reach the second floor that playfully connects the two layers; - Thanks to the split level, all rooms are connected, including the master bedroom and the second bedroom. Daylight enters from every room, and you can see through the entire house; - All areas can be closed properly with sliding doors; - There is a possibility to close the loft to create a third bedroom; - The finish of this floor gives a soft touch to the industrial character.  Sanitary - The house has a spacious bathroom on the top floor, with underfloor heating; - The luxurious finished bathroom has a double walk-in shower with glass wall, a double sink and a toilet; - Perfectly solved are the fitted wardrobes with connection for a washer and dryer, finished with a mirrored wall; - There is also a separate toilet on the living floor.  Others - The house has many custom built-in wardrobes, which completely blend in with the style of the house; - The communal hall gives access to both an extra hobby room and access to the communal roof terrace; - Due to its free span, the space offers the possibility of extending the void for an extra room. - There is a light gray cast floor throughout the house.  BUILD VALUE & TECHNICAL DETAILS - The house is located in a building that was built around 2016; - Energy label A - Solar panels (4 pieces) - The house has CO2 controlled mechanical ventilation; - Underfloor heating and cooling; - Integrated sun protection; - Hot water and underfloor heating through district heating; - Insulating glass in triple glass;  LEASEHOLD - The house is located on leasehold land; - Annual canon is € 1.625,-;   - The current owner has made timely use of the favorable conditions.  OWNERS ASSOCIATION - The VvE is managed by itself, and Mr. Klinkhamer is chairman; - The service costs are currently € 160,- per month; - There is a maintenance plan.  SURFACE - The living area is 89 m²; - The building-related outdoor space is 7,7m²; - Extra storage of 5,5 m²; NB. The specified surface area has been measured by a specialized company in accordance with NEN2580.  LOCATION - A small-scale urban neighborhood is within walking distance of the Spaarndammerbuurt; - Wide range of shops, restaurants and cafes, such as Lars, Anne&Max and Bar Hout; - Walk a few minutes and you are in the Jordaan, the Prinseneiland and the Canals; - Also a wide range of childcare, primary and secondary schools; - The new popular swimming spot of Boat&CO is just a block away; - Soon there will be the possibility to moor your own boat; - From the Pontsteiger you get on the boat towards Noord with the NDSM site, the Aám tower and the Eye-Museum; - The ring road A10 is easily accessible, and there are good connections with public transport.  ACCESSIBILITY & PARKING - The apartment is very central and is easily accessible by car from the Ring A10 via the S101; - The house is easily accessible by public transport by, among others; bus lines 22,48 and 248; - The Central Station is approximately 10 minutes by bike; - Parking space in the VvE available for rental € 195 per month; - The public road is paid parking on Monday to Saturday from 09:00 to 24:00 (source )  PARTICULARITIES - Located in the popular Houthavens; - Separate storage room on the ground floor; - Entire building built in 2016; - Spacious living room with luxurious open kitchen, which connects the split level in an attractive way; - Lots of custom made furniture and an eye for design; - 2 spacious bedrooms, with the option of a third; - Sunny balcony with breathtaking views and privacy; - Custom-made cupboard walls with plenty of storage space; - Energy label A; - Communal roof terrace, and common reading/hobby room.  AVAILABLE ON REQUEST - Deed of division - Title Deeds - Pieces of VvE - NEN-2580 measurement report - NVM questionnaire - List of movables

THIS SPACIOUS AND  LIGHT  THREE/FOUR-ROOM APARTMENT  OF 98  M2 WITH A SOUTH-FACING  BALCONY  IS ON THE 15TH FLOOR  AND  OFFERS SPECTACULAR VIEWS OF AMSTERDAM AND  THE SURROUNDING AREA.  The  beautifully designed apartment complex was built in 1998 and is centrally located on the Osdorpplein and recreational area Sloterplas. The apartment offers a wonderfully light and airy living room with an open-plan kitchen, a spacious bathroom, and two large bedrooms. The south-facing balcony is a delightful spot to enjoy the sun and the spectacular views of Amsterdam.  The Homeowners’ Association, registered as “Mirador”, is professionally managed by Adelbrecht Vastgoed Beheer and the service charges are €189 per month.  LAYOUT The lift brings you to the apartment on the 15th floor. The generously sized hallway leads to the practically laid-out living room with the open-plan kitchen at the back of the apartment. The living room offers amazing views of Amsterdam and the Sloterplas and leads to the good-sized south-facing balcony where you can enjoy the sun almost the entire day.  The kitchen is fitted out with white cupboards and drawers and a dark-coloured natural stone worktop and includes various built-in appliances, such as a fridge/freezer, a 4-burner gas stove, and a combi-microwave/oven.    The two good-sized bedrooms are accessed via the hallway and are large enough for a double bed and wardrobes.  The spacious bathroom is at the front of the apartment and features a shower, a washbasin, and a lavatory.   The second, separate toilet is accessed from the hallway.  LOCATION & ACCESSIBILITY The apartment is just across the street from the Sloterplas recreational area, around the corner of the Osdorpplein shopping centre, and a short walk from the Meervaart theatre. The Osdorpplein shopping centre is a bustling part of Amsterdam Nieuw-West and fast becoming one of Amsterdam’s latest popular hotspots. This area sees many redevelopment works, including a lively and new central area where living, working, shopping, and leisure activities all come together. Public transport connections are excellent. Trams 1, 17 and 27 stop on your doorstep and there is a direct bus link to Schiphol Airport. The apartment is also very easy to reach by car via the arterial roads off the A4, A9, A5, and A10 motorways.  PARKING The area offers paid on-street parking (Mon-Sat from 09:00 - 00:00, free on Sundays) and residents can apply for a parking permit. According to the Amsterdam municipality website, there is no waiting list for parking permits (waiting list details per 3 March 2023, permit area Nieuw-West 2). The address allows for 2 parking permits. Residents can also rent a parking spot in the underground parking garage.  SPECIAL FEATURES	 -	Year of construction: 1998 -	Located on the 15th floor -	Unobstructed views of the Sloterplas and surrounding area -	Floor space: 98 m²  -	Spacious south-facing balcony of 10 m² -	Leasehold is paid off up to 15 June 2046 -	Easy to reach -	Transfer date in consultation ( within a short term possible)  DISCLAIMER This information has been compiled with the utmost care. However, we accept no liabilities for omissions, inaccuracies (actual or otherwise), or for any result thereof. All given dimensions and surface areas are indicative. The buyer is obliged to investigate all issues that they deem to be important. The real estate agent representing this apartment acts as the adviser of the vendor. We recommend that you employ the services of an expert (NVM-affiliated) estate agent to advise you during the purchase process. If you have any specific wishes or requirements regarding the property, we advise you to make them known as soon as possible and request your estate agent to conduct an independent investigation. Should you not wish to employ professional representation, the law deems you sufficiently competent to oversee all affairs and issues that must be taken into account. The MVA General Conditions are applicable.   NEN CLAUSE The net floor space is calculated in compliance with the recognised sector standards (NEN 2580 standards). This means that the indicated surface area may deviate from similar properties and/or older reference material, which is mainly due to this (new) measurement method. The buyer declares to be sufficiently informed about the above-mentioned standard. The vendor and their estate agent have made every effort to calculate the surface areas and volume correctly, based on their own measurements supported by floor plans containing the measurements. The buyer, therefore, will not hold the vendor or their representative responsible for any (minor) discrepancies in the provided measurements. The buyer has been given ample opportunity to check the measurements by themselves or a third party. Discrepancies in measurements or volumes shall not give rise to any entitlement to any party, including any price adjustments. The vendor and their real estate broker cannot be held liable for any of such issues.

KOMT NIET VAAK  VOORBIJ!  ECHT KLASSIEK  FAMILIEHUIS (118M2)  IN DE WATERGRAAFSMEER. BOVENHUIS  MET  3 VERDIEPINGEN & DAKTERRAS (14M2)  EN  MAAR LIEFST 5 SLAAPKAMERS, AAN AUTOLUWE  STRAAT.   Bekijk ook de  exclusieve woonvideo en woningwebsite van deze heerlijke woning!  Bijzonderheden: - Klassiek 3-dubbel bovenhuis in de Watergraafsmeer - Woonoppervlakte 118 m² (NEN2580 gemeten) - Dakterras van 14m2 - 5 Slaapkamers!! - Prachtige Master bedroom - Mooie parketvloer door de gehele woning - Eigen trapopgang - Autoluwe straat / kindvriendelijke straat - Vergunde dakopbouw uit 2021 - Master bedroom voorzien van Airconditioning - Erfpacht afgekocht t/m 2056!  - Gunstige voorwaarden erfpacht aangevraagd via Spijtoptantenregeling - HR++/HR+ beglazing overal in de woning - Energielabel C - Energiekosten per maand € 80,- - 11 Zonnepanelen ter overname, waardoor geen elektriciteitsrekening - Actieve en gezonde VvE - Servicebijdrage per maand € 120,- - Ouderdomsclausule van toepassing - Oplevering in overleg - Notaris binnen ring Amsterdam  Op een prachtige autoluwe locatie in de Watergraafsmeer, bevindt zich een klassiek driedubbel bovenhuis met 5 slaapkamers en een dakterras. Deze goed onderhouden, in 2021 uitgebreide, woning heeft een heerlijk ruime (doorzon) woonkamer met een open keuken met inbouwapparatuur. Op de eerste verdieping bevinden zich 4 goede slaapkamers en een ruime badkamer met een ligbad. Hier bevindt zich ook een aparte kast voor de wasmachine en droger. De trap op, op de tweede verdieping ligt de master bedroom en nog een heel fijn dakterras voor de heerlijke zomerse dagen met de familie. Deze 'Master' is bovendien voorzien van grote ingebouwde opbergkasten. De straat aan de voorkant is autoluw vanwege het eenrichtingsverkeer en heeft een brede stoep. Hier kunnen kinderen zonder supervisie spelen. Door de hele woning ligt een prachtige parketvloer. Muren en plafond zijn allen strak gestuct. De woning verkeert in een goede staat van onderhoud en is helemaal klaar voor een nieuwe eigenaar!  Omgeving: Het appartement is gelegen in een rustige kindvriendelijke wijk in de gewilde Watergraafsmeer, gelegen tussen het Flevopark en Park Frankendael.  De woning bevindt zich aan een autoluwe eenrichtingsstraat met een brede stoep, waardoor kinderen in de straat kunnen spelen. Binnen handbereik liggen speeltuin Mariotteplein en Kinderboerderij De Werf, erg populair bij respectievelijk iets oudere en jonge kinderen. Naar school kan lopend.  Gezelligheid is op loopafstand te vinden op de kade van het winkelgebied Oostpoort of op de Linnaeusparkweg. Op de Wethouder Frankeweg kan er gebruncht worden en voor culinair hoogstaand dineren is het prachtige restaurant De Kas dichtbij. Daarnaast is de Watergraafsmeer natuurlijk bekend om de vele sportvelden in de buurt en de Jaap-Edenbaan om te schaatsen.   Tot slot een zeer goede bereikbaarheid: Openbaar vervoer is op loopafstand te vinden, middels bus 65 naar het Amstel Station of Station Zuid. Op loopafstand ligt station SciencePark. Het Amstel station is ook met de fiets makkelijk te bereiken en heeft een beveiligde fietsenstalling. Met de auto is de RING A10 op enkele minuten afstand.   Onderhoud: De woning verkeert zowel van binnen als van buiten in goede staat van onderhoud en kan desgewenst zo worden betrokken. In 2021 is een nieuwe dakopbouw geplaatst.   Technisch: Verwarming en warm water d.m.v. een HR cv-ketel. De meterkast is voorzien van 5 groepen met 2 hoofdschakelaars. De woning is voorzien van een natuurlijke ventilatie. Op het dak liggen 11 zonnepanelen. Deze compenseren het volledige stroomgebruik en zijn ter overname voor de duurzame koper.  Vereniging van Eigenaren: Er is sprake van een actieve vereniging van eigenaren. De servicebijdrage is € 120,- per maand. In de servicebijdragen zijn o.a. opgenomen de opstalverzekering, administratiekosten, elektra trappenhuis, onderhoudskosten en reservering groot onderhoud. De VvE heeft een meerjarenonderhoudsplan opgesteld.  Eigendomssituatie: Voortdurend erfpacht met een afgekochte canon t/m 31-05-2056! Voor de periode hierna is de Spijtoptantenregeling aangevraagd voor de overstap naar het eeuwigdurende erfpacht.   ******************************English Translation***********************************  DOESN'T COME ALONG OFTEN! REAL CLASSIC FAMILY HOUSE (118M2) IN WATERGRAAFSMEER. UPPER HOUSE WITH 3 FLOORS & ROOF TERRACE (14M2) AND NO LESS THAN 5 BEDROOMS, ON LOW TRAFFIC STREET.  Also check out the exclusive home video and home website of this lovely home!  Details: - Classic 3-double upper house in Watergraafsmeer - Living area 118 m² (NEN2580 measured) - Roof terrace of 14m2 - 5 Bedrooms!!! - Beautiful master bedroom - Beautiful parquet floor throughout the house - Private staircase - Low traffic street / child friendly street - Permitted roof construction from 2021 - Master bedroom with Airconditioning - Ground lease bought off until 2056!  - Favourable ground rent conditions requested via Spijtoptantenregeling - HR++/HR+ glazing throughout the house - Energy label C - Energy costs per month € 80, - - 11 Solar panels to take over that covers the complete electricity bill - Active and healthy VvE - Service contribution per month € 120, - - Old age clause applicable - Delivery in consultation - Notary within ring Amsterdam  On a beautiful low traffic location in the Watergraafsmeer, is a classic triple upper house with 5 bedrooms and a roof terrace. This well maintained, in 2021 extended, house has a lovely spacious (sun through) living room with an open kitchen with built-in appliances. On the second floor there are 4 good bedrooms and a spacious bathroom with a bathtub. Here is also a separate closet for the washer and dryer. Up the stairs, on the second floor is the master bedroom and a very nice roof terrace for those wonderful summer days with the family. This 'Master' also has large built-in storage closets. The street in front is low on traffic. Here children can play without supervision because of the wide sidewalk and one-way traffic. Throughout the house is a beautiful parquet floor. Walls and ceiling are all tightly plastered. The house is in good condition and is all ready for a new owner!  Surroundings: The apartment is located in a quiet child-friendly neighborhood in the sought-after Watergraafsmeer, situated between the Flevopark and Park Frankendael.  The house is located on a car-free one-way street with a wide sidewalk, allowing children to play in the street. Within easy reach are playground Mariotteplein and petting zoo De Werf, very popular with older and younger children respectively. You can walk to school.  Sociability can be found within walking distance on the quay of the Oostpoort shopping area or Linnaeusparkweg. On the Wethouder Frankeweg you can have brunch and for culinary dining the beautiful restaurant De Kas is nearby. In addition, Watergraafsmeer is of course known for the many sports fields in the neighborhood and the Jaap-Edenbaan for skating.   Finally, very good accessibility: public transport is within walking distance, via bus 65 to the Amstel Station or Station Zuid. T The Amstel Station is also easy to reach by bicycle and has a secure bicycle parking. By car, the RING A10 is a few minutes away.   Maintenance: The house is in good condition both inside and outside and can be moved in as soon as desired. A new roof structure was installed in 2021.   Technical: Heating and hot water by means of a HR central heating boiler. The meter cupboard has 5 groups with 2 main switches. The house has both mechanical and natural ventilation. On the roof are 11 solar panels. These compensate the entire power consumption and are available for acquisition for the sustainable buyer.  Owners Association: There is an active association of owners. The service contribution is € 120, - per month. The service contributions include property insurance, administration costs, stairwell electricity, maintenance costs and major maintenance reservations. The VvE has drawn up a multi-year maintenance plan.  Property situation: Leasehold with a purchased canon until 31-05-2056! For the period thereafter, the Spijtoptantenregeling applied for the transition to the perpetual leasehold.

Deze 3-kamer eengezinswoning  van  circa 70  m2 heeft  een voor- én een  achtertuin.  Je woont hier in een  rustig  gedeelte van Amsterdam Noord om de  hoek  van  het NDSM-terrein  en de pont naar Amsterdam Centraal Station.  Het NDSM-terrein krijgt steeds meer een eigen karakter met diverse leuke horecazaakjes.  Ga je meer richting het noorden dan vind je daar het uitgestrekte recreatiegebied 't Twiske waar je heerlijk kunt wandelen, fietsen en in de zomer zelfs zwemmen.  De bereikbaarheid is uitstekend.  Je bent met diverse buslijnen zo richting het centrum van de stad maar je zit ook zo met de auto op de ringweg A10. Parkeren op straat is hier gratis!  Indeling: Op de begane grond bevinden zich de hal, woonkamer en dichte keuken.  Op de eerste etage zijn de twee slaapkamers en de badkamer met wastafel en douche. Hier is ook het toilet.  In de achtertuin is nog een eigen schuur.   Bijzonderheden: Projectnotaris: notariskantoor Spier & Hazenberg Erfpacht afgekocht tot 16-04-2055 Watermeter aanwezig Wasmachineaansluiting in keuken De woning heeft geen eigen aansluiting maar een gedeelde aansluiting op de riolering In deze woning heeft een asbestinventarisatie plaatsgevonden. Het saneringsplichtige asbest is verwijderd. Er is sprake van erfdienstbaarheid (recht van overpad).  Er geldt een zelfbewoningsclausule van twee jaar.

AM for sale!   Krugerplein 22  1A 1091  KZ Amsterdam  Well  laid  out and bright 2-room apartment  of  approx. 37 m2, freehold, along Krugerplein  in the popular Transvaalbuurt in  the east of Amsterdam. The apartment was extensively renovated in 2011 and has an open-plan kitchen, a balcony and a spacious bedroom. The apartment is positioned at the rear of the building and is therefore lovely and quiet.  Layout: Ground floor:  well-maintained communal stairwell.  First floor: entrance, wardrobe cupboard, bathroom with walk-in shower, washbasin and toilet. The open-plan kitchen has a microwave, a dishwasher, a gas cooker (4 burners) and a connection for the washing machine and is next to the living room. The bright and airy living room is located at the rear of the apartment building and has French doors to the pleasant balcony. The large bedroom is accessible from the living room.  The location: The apartment is located along the charming Krugerplein, within a stone’s throw of Transvaalkade; the perfect place for a summer picnic along the waters of the Ringvaart. The low-rise houses, the merlon-style roofs and the porch way are truly unique, and give you the feeling that you are entering a village or fortress. There are ample great bars and restaurants nearby, including Bar Bukowski, Reisel, De Vergulde Eenhoorn, Eddie Spaghetti and the bustling Beukenplein and Weesperzijde. Shopping can be done at the various shops and supermarkets along Pretoriusstraat, in Oostpoort shopping centre or Beukenplein. You don’t  have to go far to enjoy the outdoors; Park Frankendael, Oosterpark, the Amstel river and Weesperzijde are all within walking distance.  The area has excellent public transport links (Amstel train station, Wibautstraat metro station and tram 3) and the city centre, De Pijp (Albert Cuyp market) and Zuidas business district are all just a 10-minute bike ride away. The street has ample parking space and 4 electrical charging stations. The area is easily accessible by car; the A10 motorway, A1, A2, A4, A9 and Schiphol airport are in close proximity and leaving and entering the city is easy via Gooische Weg.  Specifics: - Freehold, no ground rent! - The active Owners’ Association has 11 members and is professionally managed by Velzel VvE Diensten; the multi-annual maintenance plan is available. The current monthly service fee amounts to € 109.63; - NEN- measurement report available: 37.30 m2 living area and 2.60 m2 outdoor space; - Central heating and hot water generated by own central heating boiler; - High ceilings of up to (approx.) 2.88 meters;  Asking price: € 320.000,- costs payable by the purchaser. Spacious 3-room apartment  (approx.  98 m²)  situated on  the fifth floor, with  a  sunny balcony. The complex is  located  in Amsterdam West and is equipped  with  a lift. There is  a parking space and storage belonging to the flat in the substructure.   Location/Accessibility: The residence is located in the Laan van Spartaan neighbourhood, in Bos en Lommer (Amsterdam West). This is a new residential area in an ideal location, close to the centre. There are plenty of sports amenities in this neighbourhood, which include football pitches, tennis courts and swimming pools. There are also several parks, shops and places to eat and drink in the neighbourhood for young and old.  The neighbourhood is also provided with various public transport amenities. Bus, metro, tram, and train are within easy reach and easy to use. The A10 ring road also lies a few minutes away by car.   Layout: The communal entrance with intercom offers access to the central hall on the ground floor. This also accommodates the closed car park with your own parking space and separate storage area. The apartment itself is situated on the fifth floor and may be accessed by the staircase or the lift.   Fifth floor: Gallery with entrance. When you enter the long hallway there is immediate access to the two bedrooms with their large (tilting) windows, separate toilet and the bathroom that is fitted with a shower and a vanity unit. There is a storage area next to the bathroom where the connections for the washing machine and tumble dryer may also be found. The enormous and light living room is situated at the end of the hall. The large windows provide the space with a lot of light and a sliding door offers access to a small balcony, which is south-facing. The open kitchen is fitted with a stone counter top with various built-in appliances such as a dishwasher, fridge, freezer, 4-ring induction hob and a combination oven and microwave.
